58
moh*** asks:

Question

SUBJECT: Final warning for operating a parallel business. You were notified verbally on two occasions (July and Dec) about the parallel business you are operating which is against the company policy .On both occasions you admitted your mistake and promised that you will not repeat again. Someone reported us that on 14 march 2014 you inform one of our customers to buy Honda unicorn parts from you in front of him on the company premises .This time again you admitted to have committed this offence that you did not know it was against the company policy. This letter is a final warning to you that is you are caught doing this parallel business again then you will be automatically dismissed from the company. Mo envie coner ki banne condition kine meter dans sa lettre la eski li supporter par shariat?

Answer

Li paraite ki ou pe travail dans ene compagnie, mais ou pe faire ou propre business aussi ki li pareille couma business ki compagnie-la faire. Alors compagnie la pas gagne droit mette ene condition pareille. cependant li ena droit pas continue garde ou comme employé si li jugé ki ena conflit d'interet.
Financial Transaction
59

Question

Do we have to be in state of wudhu while doing zabah of an animal?

Answer

It is a recommended and an appreciable way of slaughtering.
Qurbaani
60

Question

If we have missed some rakaats with Imam in salaat, please inform if we have to wait both salaams to be completed before getting up to complete remaining rakaats?

Answer

One should start completing the remaining salaat as the Imam begins with the second salaam. This is only to assure that there is no sajdah sahw to be performed with the Imam.
Congregation
61
Ano*** asks:

Question

If in the 3rd or 4th rakaat of a faraz namaz, I forget and read a surah after surah Alhamd, do I need to make sajdah sahu?

Answer

Normally after Surah faatihah we are not supposed to read any other surah in the 3rd and 4rth rakaat of a fardh salaat, this is the right procedure for fardh salaat. If one happen to read it, then too it does not necessitate sajdah sahw and the salaat will stand good.
Daily

Knowledge
71

Question

If we have missed the salaat conducted by Imam, can we do a small jamaat afterwards in the mosque?

Answer

It is not advisable as this will lead to diminishing the importance of the official jamaat. Hence everybody should do it individually just to avoid to give way to the occurrence of many jamaats in the mosque.
Congregation

74
you*** asks:

Question

aslm dans larticle la fraternite en islam eski ban dimounes ki fer bid"a et shirk trouve ladans?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Chaque en dimoune bizin être traité dans ene façon approprié. En principe ene musulman bizin sincère envers so lot frère musulman. La sincérité concernant ene frère ki dans l'erreur c'est ki bizin tire li depi sa l'erreur la. Nabi (s.a.w) fine dire " Aide to frere ki zaalim ou bien mazloum (oppresseur ou bien opprimé). Aide ene zaalim c'est empêche li faire zouloum. coumca même aide ene bidati trouve dans empêche li faire bidat etc.... Sa c'est saki nous fine comprend depi ou question, sinon ou capave pose ou question dans ene façon plis claire pou nou capave reponne ou pli bien.
Social life
75
Ann*** asks:

Question

Assalaamualaikum. Eski ou capave elabore un peu concernant Itekaaf pour dame? (i.e. ki arriver si gagne haiz,...)

Answer

Madame kapave faire i'tikaaf dans so la caze dans ene place retiré et si pena alors bizin fixer ene place. Etant donne ki bizin en état de roza pou capave faire i'tikaaf alor ene madame bizin discontinié so i'tikaaf quand li gagne so haiz parceki li pas pou kapave garde roza, lerla pou bizin remplace ene jour i'tikaaf ensame avec roza. Pou remplace sa li bizin rentrer l'heure maghrib et sorti le lendemain maghrib. Mais seulement li pli meilleur si li remplace tous les dix jour so i'tikaaf.
I'tikaaf
76
Ano*** asks:

Question

How should one place his hands in sajda whilst seated on a chair for salaat? Jazakalla

Answer

When a person performs sajdah on a chair due to being unable to do so on the ground in the correct method, he should place his hands on his thighs and simply move his abdomen forward. It is necessary to move more in sajdah in comparison to ruku.

aslm eski gagne droit dire asalato assalamu alaika ya rasulullah ya habeeballah ya noorallah

Answer

Sa li ene formule pou adresse Rasoulullah ( Sallallaahu alaihi wa sallam). Sa façon adressé-la li permette seulement divant Rawzah (tombe) Rasoulullah ( Sallallaahu alaihi wa sallam).

Answer

kaki fruit in itself is permissible. The boycotting of any country for its aggressions against Islam by boycotting its products is something which has nothing to do with the permissibility and non-permissibility of any products. In fact Rasoulullah ( Sallallaahu alaihi wa sallam) consumed cheese coming from kuffaar country and even he and his companions consumed food given to them by a jew lady.

Answer

81
Abo*** asks:

Question

Assalam o alaikum.The waiving of arms during salat?rifladaine,is this permissible,did any of the 4 imam practice this, where does this practice come from? is it sunnah?

Answer

According to Imam Shafi'ee (Rahimahullah), and Imam Ahmad bin Hanbal (Rahimahullah), it is sunnah to raise hands before going to ruku and before going to sajdah. Whereas according to Imam Abu Hanifah (Rahimahullah) and Imam Maalik (Rahimahullah) it is abrogated. And it is sunnah only in the beginning of the salaat whilst doing the Takbeer Tahreemah. For more details you may refer to our Al Haadi Publication on the following link. http://www.jamiat-ul-ulama.org/node/719
Daily

Answer

We know it as reliable, but we don't know the details about conflict between MAJLIS and SANHA
Halaal Certification
83
ano*** asks:

Question

Slm. Did SANHA pronounce anything regarding cadbury chocolates?

Answer

Yes, The Following was published by SANHA on their E-Bulletin....... BOOGEYMAN GOES HIGH ON CHOCOLATE ....... Remember the boogeyman from your childhood? Although you never ever saw him, he came out at night, lurking somewhere nearby ready to strike. He was in the tree in the backyard, in the basement, in the cupboard or by the fence in the neighbour's yard, in fact everywhere, away from your immediate protective zone. He was scary and always had you looking over your shoulder. But the good thing was that if you obeyed your parents and went to sleep on time with the light switched, he could never get you. One morning you grew up and realized that the boogeyman was a delusion that existed only in your head. It was put there by parents to frighten you into good behaviour and it worked to good effect too. Planted in our minds by others, reinforced and nurtured, fear can be very consuming, controlling and motivating until it is perceived as a very real threat. This lesson has been seized upon by governments and people over the centuries who realised the value of applying this psychological principle to minimise threats to their existence, exercise control and subjugate the thought process of others into subservience to their will. They needed a boogeyman. We can go to ancient history or the Romans for examples but the more recent ones would not have escaped our reader’s attention, such as communism and the Cold War where the threat of the Soviet Union incinerating all with nuclear weapons presented the United States with the excuse to pursue a 30 year arms race on the pretext of this boogeyman. When Communism fell another boogeyman viz international terrorism was seized upon to replace the “red menace” leading to various regional wars, regime changes and losses of millions of lives which continues unabated. Then not to be left out, we have the boogeymen of Haraam, scare-mongering and sowing confusion with pronouncements of Haraam at every opportunity on products such as meats of all commercial poultry, cattle and sheep, soft drinks, biscuits and chocolates to mention a few. The chocolates is an interesting recent one. Reports first surfaced on social media in Malaysia a fortnight ago that two samples of Cadbury chocolates were found to have porcine ingredients which evoked widespread reaction from many quarters. This shockwave reaction was understandable as the consumption of Halaal is a fundamental and mandatory article of the Islamic faith. This reaction was further exacerbated by the fact that the revelations arose in a majority Muslim country whose government prides itself on the world stage on matters of Halaal. The reactions ranged from the Ministry asking for caution whilst further tests results were being awaited, food technologists expressing reservations and citing possible contamination, wholesalers calling for boycotts and by activists calling for Jihaad. SANHA opined that the call for a jihad was inappropriate and only served to stoke the flames of Islamaphobia with the anti-Muslim brigade. Most importantly this call was being made on evidence that was not conclusive. Furthermore, SANHA’s experience during the horsemeat scandal showed how easily DNA results give flawed reading through contamination. Subsequently, this week in a blow to the Haraam boogeyman brigade, Malaysia's Department of Islamic Development, or JAKIM, confirmed that eleven samples removed and tested from the Cadbury plant did not test positive for pork. JAKIM pointed out the Health Ministry’s previous samples were not taken directly from Cadbury’s factory, suggesting that this resulted in possible contamination and flawed test results. In addition to this, the National Fatwa Council of Malaysia ruled that products were Halaal under the Islamic Sharia law. Cadbury has years of experience in the Malaysian market with Malaysian Muslims in their highest echelons of Management and at operational level and is well aware of this religious imperative. They have maintained that their products are Halaal and have now been vindicated. The undisciplined knee-jerk reaction and emotional outbursts means that Cadburys have gained incredible worldwide coverage and benefited immensely from free testing of the products in other countries as well such as Indonesia and Saudi Arabia. The Health Ministry is now on the hunt for the party who leaked a preliminary report prematurely before the findings could be corroborated, according to Deputy Minister Datuk Seri Dr Hilmi Yahya. We hope that they are found out, exposed and drummed out, for the institution of Halaal is a Divine gift and not an instrument of the Haraam boogeymen to sow disunity and dissension in the Ummah. (Extracted from Sanha E Bulletin / June 2014 :: Shabaan 1435)
Chocolates
84
Ano*** asks:

Question

Are food from Quicken or elizabeth burger n grill halaal suitable?

Answer

Elizabeth Burger & Grill has been certified by JUM. However it should be noted that the Jamiat-Ul-Ulama of Mauritius certifies only those enterprises that request to be certified. Halal Certificates are given to enterprises only after verification and inspections under specific conditions. As these criteria were not met in some of these restaurants, hence we cannot pronounce anything.
Outlets-Restaurants
85
Ano*** asks:

Question

Ass. 1. Si nou namaaz finne casse pendant qui nu pe faire ene namaaz nafil,eski nu bizin remplace namaaz la si nou pa finne refaire li de suite.Dans sa cas la, eski nu cpv remplace li nimporte qui lheure,par exemple,nu cpv remplace namaaz tahajjud dans la journee. 2. Pour namaaz tasbih,si li finne casse lors troisieme ou quatrieme rakaate,nu bizin refaire ou remplace tous les 4 rakaate. Jazaak Allah

Answer

Wa alaikoumus salaam 1. Namaz nafil malgré li ti optionel mais quand fine commence li alors li vine obligatoire. Donc bizin termine li. Si namaz la fine cassé, pou bizin remplace li. Capave remplace li n'importe quand mais bizin pas remplace li dans banne l’heure cote li pas permette pou faire namaz couma : a) Quand soleil pé levé, b) Quand soleil lors la tète et c) Quand soleil pé couché. . En ceki concerne namaz tahajjud, si ene dimoune habitué faire et li fine ratte li dans ene certaine l’occasion, alors li bon ki li faire 12 rakaat dans la journée avant zawaal. En realité li pas ene qaza ça mais seulement ene moyen pou rattrape ceki fine raté. . 2. Oui bizin remplace tous les 4 rakaat.
Sounnah-Nafl
86
Ann*** asks:

Question

Eski gagne droit dire ''Jummah Mubarak''?

Answer

D'apres nous connaissance Nabi (s.a.w) pas fine dire sa, ni so banne sahabah (r.a) et ni banne Tabi'een (a.r) fine pratique sa. akoze sa li paraite pli bon pou pas pratique li ki pratique li.
Jummah
87
you*** asks:

Question

aslm 2 talons bizin zoin dans sajda laquel lipied asak fois bizin deplacer?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Si nous diboute d'apres sunnat, c'est a dire distance a peu pres 4 doigts entre deux li pied, alors tous les deux li pied pou zoine avec ene simple mouvement dans sajdah sans faire grand zeffort. Aster si ene dimoune ena probleme ki li pas kapave diboute dans sa facon la alors li bizin risse tous les deux li pied ensame au millieu pou faire zoine.
Daily
88
Ano*** asks:

Question

I need your advise regarding my nikah. My nikah was done on papers. i mean only one witness came to me and advise where i have to sign on nikah contract. verbally i was not asked about my consent so is my nikah valid? Same day i informed my mom that y didnt wakeel or witness asked me about my consent. why proper islamic procedure was not followed?? She simply smiled and said nikah process was conducted. please clarify in accordance to the light of sunni muslim islam say in this regard? Few months later me and my husband had arguments on phone. He was extremely angry and he gave me 3 divorces on phone before ruksati .. later he told me that he was not aware about 3 divorce considered 3 for girl who has no physical relation with husband. he thought three talaq at one time is considered as one divorce. So kindly advise if my marriage is over. Can i remarry my husband without halala? Me and my husband really dont want to end our marriage. Note: We didn't spend any time together (in a closed room), not even ten minutes. His exact words were: mein talaq deta houn. He said this 4 to 5 times

Answer

The Fact that you did not oppose the nikah, but only was not asked for consent the nikah was valid. As mentioned by you that you and your husband did not meet anywhere that might have given you the chance to have physical contact, so khalwat-e-saheehah (valid retirement) is not established. Your husband gave you talaaq by saying 4 to 5 times " Mein Talaaq deta houn", so the first time he said "Mein Talaaq deta houn" was effective as talaaq and the nikaah was broken without having necessity to observe Iddat as it was given before being in seclusion with him. The remaining talaaqs are not effective as it was given when you were already completely out of his nikaah without any need to observe Iddat. According to Shariat in this case you may resume conjugal life by renewing your nikaah without any need for Halalah. But your ex-husband will have the power of only two remaining talaaqs as one talaaq is already pronounced.
Talaaq
89
Abo*** asks:

Question

Assalamoualaikum-the practice of chanting darood salam aloud,standing in group,what are your thoughts of this practice?any idea of its origin.

Answer

The Hadith of Nabi (s.a.w) does not specify any posture to read durood and salaam. One may do it whilst standing, walking, sitting or even lying position. However it is recommended to do it in sitting position like in qa'dah, facing the qiblah, with concentration and love for Nabi (s.a.w). Reading Durood Shareef in chorus whilst standing in group was not the practice of the noble Sahabah (r.a), Taabi'een and Tabi' Taabi'een. We have no idea of its origin.
Bidati
90

Question

assalamualaikum,what is the best time for tahajjud,10min before fajr or at midnight?

Answer

To get an idea about the best time to perform tahajjud, one should divide the night into six portions as from the time after Esha till Sehri time. According to hadith the best time will be the fourth and the fifth portion of the night. But normally we do not advise the beginner to do it in this time, as it is very risky that one may miss the Fajr salaat with jamaat. Therefore it is advisable to wake up 30 or 45 minutes before subh saadiq which will enable one to perform tahajjud and Fajr salaat as well. In this way there is no need to wait for too long for fajr salaat.
Sounnah-Nafl
91
Sha*** asks:

Question

Assalamu'alaikum. I just want to ask if in Islam a husband has the right to betray his wife behind her back? Normally a good wife is supposed to trust her husband, obey him, look after him and so on but what if the husband is hideously betraying the wife? What if the wife finds out later? What is she supposed to do?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. As a principle BETRAYAL is a haraam and shameful act. We would like to know what do you mean by betrayal in your case before we can reply to your query.
Social life
92
Kaw*** asks:

Question

Assalamoualaikum. I'm a married woman and a mother also. Since a long time i feel i'm unable to make my hubby happy. My hubby is most of the time in a bad mood or angry but he never tells me the reason. I just want to know if there's an action or special dua that i can make to make my hubby happy and to become a good wife also?

Answer

Waalaikumus salaam warahmatulahi wabarakaatuh. You may recite 786 times Bismillaahir Rahmaanir Raheem and blow in the prepared meal before serving. But the main thing is sincere dua with Allah Ta'aala. We should know that hardships are the results of disobedience of Allah Subhaanahu wata'aala. So we should make sincere tawbah and istighfaar and abstain completely from sins. Nothing better than this.
Social life
93
Abo*** asks:

Question

Assalamoalaikumwarahmatullahwabarakatoho.The blessed month of Ramadan is upon us again,my douah that we all will benefit from the Rehmat of the Almighty ameen. My question-The water company in England has a dedicated team that caters for the welfare of the poor and needy all over the world,they are currently working on a project to supply fresh water to isolated villages in Asia,Africa and other countries,it is not a Muslim organisation or of any other denomination,it is just part of a big corporation, am I allowed to donate zakaat money towards this project? zajakumula kher

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. There are rules, regulations and conditions that should be strictly observed whilst giving zakaat for the zakaat to be valid. Even Muslims and Muslim Organizations are not fully aware of these conditions. So it is necessary and incumbent upon you to remit your zakaat to those Ulama or Muslim Organizations who will observe the conditions for the validity of zakaat. Non-Muslim Organizations are out of question even if they know the rules and regulations. For your information the beneficiary of zakaat should be Muslims. Zakaat given to non-muslims are not valid. You may help them with voluntary donations.
Zakaat

98
Ano*** asks:

Question

Aslm.si mo nani p paye so fidya, est ce ki li permissible pu ki moi mo pren li.mo marier et mo pu bizin boire medcine pu ki mo gagne tou roza.mo ena dette.mo pa tire zakaat mo pena nisab,mo pena l'argent ramasse.mo bolom li tire zakat acoz li ena 1 magasin mai li osi ena dette.plz reply quickly.urgent

Answer

Pas gagne droit donne fidyah a ou ascendant et ni descendant, c'est a dire pas gagne droit donne papa mama, dada dadi, nana nani et ni sa banla gagne droit donne zotte zenfant et ni zotte ti zenfant.

99
Ano*** asks:

Question

Aslm Eski ggn droit met soulier bottine? Jazakallah.

Answer

Li paraite ki bottine li ene imitation de Ghair Qawm (Non-musulman). D'apres Quraan et Hadith nous pas gagne droit imite banne non-musulman ni nous gagne droit imite banne musulman ki devié.
Dressing-Appearance
100
Naw*** asks:

Question

assalamou'alaikum, can we apply nail varnish? is it permissible if we do not have wudhu or after doing the wudhu? jazakallah khair.

Answer

It is forbidden for two reasons. Firstly it is an imitation to Kuffaar (Non-muslims) which is strictly prohibited in Islam. Secondly it does not allow water to penetrate to the nail whilst doing wudhu and ghussal. Thus wudhu and ghussal become invalid. Consequently the namaz of such a person is not valid. Somebody may pretend that there are alternatives that do not prevent the penetration of water but still we can't deny the existence of the first reason. So it will not be allowed.
Woudhou
101

Question

Aaslm eski gagne droit met bague dan le doight index?

Answer

Li recommandé pou mette li dans ti le doigt la main gauche. Malgré ki li permette pou mette li dans nerporte ki le doigt mais faudrait pas mette li avec l'intention pou imite banne non-musulman ou bien banne ki pena deen.
Dressing-Appearance
102
Ano*** asks:

Question

Asalam si ene madam li fr pardah mai devan so ban cousin ek bofrere li pa fr eski li ggn pecher pu sa?

Answer

Oui li gagne peché parceki d'après Shariah ene madame bizin faire pardah avec so banne cousin aussi. Au contraire bizin prend pli boucou precaution avec banne cousin.
Dressing-Appearance
103
Ano*** asks:

Question

Assalaamualaykum, Is it permissible to contribute ones zakaat money towards the building of wells in poor parts of India?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Zakaat should be given in such a way that it becomes the soul and private property of the entitled beneficiary. As far as building of wells is concerned it does not become the property of anybody or even the poor, because it will not become something that will be given into inheritance of the poor. It remains as a waqf which can be used by everyone. Even the donors and the rich will have the right to use it as beneficiaries. So zakaat should not be given in such venues.
Zakaat
104
Ano*** asks:

Question

Aslm.Si ene dimoune li chronique et li bizin servi so la pompe a chaque fois, couma li pou faire pou garde roza?

Answer

Si li pena aukene moyen apart la pompe veut dire ki li impossible pou li kapave garde so roza. Donc li vine dans catégorie de banne dimoune ki zot maladie pas permette zotte garde roza. Dans ce cas li bizin donne fidyah. Fidya c'est la valeur ene fitra ki capave change changé chaque l'année. Pou sa l'année la (2014) li Rs 75/-
Ramadhaan

Ano*** asks:

Question

Ena ene diffuseur electrique. Dedans, ou mette un peu d'huile essentielle. So but c'est quand sa propage dans l'air, li purifier li de bannes microbes, comme sa ou respire l'air frais. Utiliser par bane ki ena probleme allergie. Quand mette diffuseur la dans ene la chambre avec so de l'huile, li degage ene parfum. Mais pena la fumee. Maintenant, si ene personne li roza et li reste dans sa la chambre en question et li respire sa, so roza casser?

Answer

En principe roza pas cassé parceki li pas pe respire aukene la fumee

a unknown asks

Question

Ene dimoune ena 13 camions ki li p servi pou travay, li ena loan 7millions rupee ki li p payer Rs70000 par mois, loan la pou 2 camions sa. 1. Eski li pou bizin compte sa banne camions la pou zakaat? 2. Kan li pou retire debt depi so total, li pou retire Rs7millions ou bien zis quantite ki li ena pou payer dan 1ans (Rs840000)?

Answer

1. Lor banne camion la pena zakaat pou tiré. 2. Si après avoir déduire tous banne dette ki li ena si li ena nisaab alors li bizin tire zakaat sinon perna zakaat lor li.

Answer

1. Lor banne camion la pena zakaat pou tiré. 2. Si après avoir déduire tous banne dette ki li ena si li ena nisaab alors li bizin tire zakaat sinon perna zakaat lor li.

a unknown asks

Question

Ene ti garcon 8 ans ena ene compte dan la bank ki so papa ti ouvert pou li depi longtemp. Ena Rs50000 dan compte la. Garcon la zakat pa faraz lor li a coz li pa baaligh mais eski papa la bizin tir zakat dan compte garcon la a coz li depasse nisaab?

Answer

Bizin guetté casse-la pou ki sanla sa, si li pou garçon la pena zakaat. Si li pou papa la li bizin tire so zakaat. D’après saki nous pe comprend casse la li pou garçon la. Alors pena zakaat.

119
Ano*** asks:
120
a unknown asks

Question

Lor marchandise ki prix bizin consideré quand pe tire zakaat. Prix ki fine acheté ou bien prix ki sa marchandise la pour vendé?

Answer

Bizin considere prix ki ene marchandise pe vendé lor marché. Par exemple si fine gagne ene marchandise lor Rs 100/- et pe vanne sa a Rs 125/- lor marché, alors bizin calcule li lor Rs 125/- quand pe calcule so zakaat.

Question

Lor marchandise ki prix bizin consideré quand pe tire zakaat. Prix ki fine acheté ou bien prix ki sa marchandise la pour vendé?

Answer

Bizin considere prix ki ene marchandise pe vendé lor marché. Par exemple si fine gagne ene marchandise lor Rs 100/- et pe vanne sa a Rs 125/- lor marché, alors bizin calcule li lor Rs 125/- quand pe calcule so zakaat.
Zakaat
121
a unknown asks

Question

Ki veut dire prix lor marché ki bizin consideré dans calcule zakaat?

Answer

Prix lor marché c'est sa prix ki banne commercants vendé a banne consommateurs. Et ça même prix ki li uniforme et stable plus au moins. Ça prix ki ene individu li capave gagné pour ene objet ki li ena dans so possession c'est ene prix fictif ki pas capave être consideré. Donc prix ki bizin prend en consideration c'est ça prix ki banne commercant vendé.

Question

Ki veut dire prix lor marché ki bizin consideré dans calcule zakaat?

Answer

Prix lor marché c'est sa prix ki banne commercants vendé a banne consommateurs. Et ça même prix ki li uniforme et stable plus au moins. Ça prix ki ene individu li capave gagné pour ene objet ki li ena dans so possession c'est ene prix fictif ki pas capave être consideré. Donc prix ki bizin prend en consideration c'est ça prix ki banne commercant vendé.
Zakaat
122
inc*** asks:

Question

As salamu aliakum Mo question li concern kaffara pu roza.Kan mo ti jeune environ 16 ou 17 ans souvent mo ti p casse mo roza.Aster mo fine regreter pu sa et mo ena lespoire ki Allah pu pardon moi. Kiken fine dire mwa ki bizin garde 60 roza a suivre pu chaque ene roza ki mo fine casser alors mo trouve sa boku difficile parceki mo pena sa la force la et mo fine casse boku roza plisure laner.Alors kuma ou conseils moi pu accomplir sa kaffara la?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. D'abord ou pou bizin remplace tous banne roza ki ou fine cassé ensuite garde 60 roza consecutif comme kaffaarah ( compensation) pou tous sa banne roza ki fine cassé la. Ene seul fois kaffaarah li suffit malgré si ou fine casse plizir l'année so roza.
Kaffaarah

124
Zah***@hotmail.com ;jrmotorsco@gmail.c asks:

Question

Assalamoualaikum! 1. What is the nisab a person should possess in terms of Mauritian rupees for him/her to be zakatable? 2. It is said that zakat should be calculated on the selling price of the goods not cost price but what about lots of spare parts & accessories of vehicles (over 500 items with different values). Note that the spare parts do not have a fixed selling price. They are always sold at discounted prices determined at the time of selling. 3. What about zakat for a workshop doing servicing and repairs of vehicles?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam ! (1) Nisaab in term of Mauritian rupees is Rs 30.000/- for the year 1435 / 2014. (2) The selling price should be estimated for these spare parts & accessories then calculate the zakaat accordingly. (3) The tools used in workshop are not zakatable.
Zakaat
125
sha***@live.com asks:

Question

what is Mahar Fatimi ?

Answer

It is the sum amounting to 500 dirhams that Hazrat Ali (r.a) gave as dowry to Hazrat Fatimah (r.a) the beloved daughter of our beloved prophet Muhammad (s.a.w).

Bismillahir ra'hamaanir ra'heem Assalaamu 'alaikum wa ra'hmatullah Dear Mufti Saheb, I would just want to confirm the validity of the halal certificates issued by the Jummah Mosque with regards to certain restaurants such as Debonnairs, Steers, etc. Please kindly advise if based on information available to the JUM, whether these halal certificates can be taken in to consideration. Jazaa kAllah Wassalaam Khalil

Answer

wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. As precautionary measure the JUM is reluctant about certifying non muslim's outlets specially where non-halal stuffs including meat are sold. We don't know about other organisation's stands and principles. So it is imprudent to pronounce about them.
Halaal Certification

Li pas empeché si li tiré. Li capave tiré mais li pas obligé tiré.

136
tas*** asks:

Question

Is it prohibited for women to participate in Eid salaat? Is there any proof for it?

Answer

Firstly we should understand that it is not waajib for them. Secondly the permissibility for them was conditional to the safety and security which is not available in our days. That's why according to the Jurists they are not allowed. Moreover it is not wise to endure hardship for something not recommended.
Eid
137
Ibr*** asks:

Question

What is the general Islamic ruling for a Muslim to eat in a non Muslim snacks or restaurant which is not certified by any halal authority?

Answer

Halaal food is very essential for the acceptance of our good actions and duas. Even if we are not taking alcoholic drinks we are not allowed to sit around a table where these drinks are being served. So for the sake of our Imaan and A'maal and for the acceptance of our duas we should keep away from similar restaurants. This rule is applied to foods and stuffs that need to be verified and certified. Otherwise we should be very cautious about meat products. A halal certification from a reliable halal body will be very helpful to identify halal from non-halal, but reliable halal body will give certificate to these similar restaurants with very strict conditions such as appointing a reliable Muslim as supervisor etc.
Outlets-Restaurants
138
adm*** asks:

Question

Ki veut dire mahram ?

Answer

Ene mahram pou ene madame c'est ene zomme ki ça madame-là pas gagne droit marié avec li jamais couma madame-là so papa, so garçon, so banne ti zenfants, so frère, so neveu, banne zenfants so neveu ou bien banne zenfants so nièce, so nana, so dada, so mamou, so chacha. Ça li appliqué pou tous madame en general. Quant à ene madame marié, alors soit li accompagné de so missié ou bien ene dans ça banne-là. A noté ki beau-frère, poupa, kalou, cousin, cousine ou bien zenfants cousin cousine zotte pas mahram. Coumsa même banne grand dimoune ki ou appelle zotte nana, dada, mamou, chacha ou bien frère par l’amitié ou par respect, zotte continué reste étranger. Zotte pas vine ou mahram. Couma ene zomme li vine mahram pou ene madame par relation du sang, coumsa même li capave vine mahram par relation du lait aussi. C'est-à-dire quand ene ti baba boire du lait avec ene madame, alors ça missié-là vine ça ti baba-là so papa du lait. Ça madame-là vine mama du lait. Madame-là so banne zenfants et banne lezot zenfants ki li fine faire boire du lait vine ça ti baba-là so banne frère sœur du lait. Coumsa même madame-là so frère vine ça ti baba-là so mamou du lait. Donc couma ene madame li gagne droit voyagé avec so propre garçon du sang, coumsa même li gagne droit voyage avec so garçon du lait. Mais dans tout ça-là li important ki ça ti baba-là fine boire du lait quand li pas ti encore gagne deux ans. Si jamais li boire du lait avec ene madame dans l’age après deux ans, alors ça boire du lait-là pas pou faire li vine garçon du lait ça madame-là. Ene mahram couma li bizin ene personne ki majeur, coumsa même li important ki li sain d’esprit. C'est-à-dire ene garçon mineur pas capave servi comme ene mahram dans voyage pou ene madame. Coumsa même ene personne ki pas sain d’esprit pas servi comme ene mahram.
Female Issues
139
moh*** asks:

Question

What answer can be given to those who say: how keeping the beard to a fist length can be classified as the Sunnat while even the jews, hindus etc wear long beard? Please give a jami' answer.

Answer

The fact that they do some practices which coincide with sunnah cannot be used as a criteria to disqualify these practices as being sunnah. The normal practice concerning beard is to keep it at least one fist length. According to a Hadith in Bukhari Shareef, Hazrat Abdullah Ibn Umar (r.a) used to hold his beard with his fist and trim the exceeding beard to make it a fist length. And also Nabi (s.a.w) always emphasized on keeping the beard in an orderly manner which is rarely seen in non-muslims. So according to sunnah the beard should be in an orderly manner to the length of at least one fist in every direction.
Dressing-Appearance
140
Ano*** asks:

Question

Assalamoualaikoum, Actually i heard that at the times of sahaba the women too used to ride camels.is it true? Futhurmore, i heard that women should not drive cars.If this is true can you guide me with reference why women should not drive,please.and if possible can u post the name of the aalim or mufti answering this question too( just in case i'll have to share this information with friends they'll obviously ask who said that?or whose fatwa it is) Jazak Allah Khairan

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. All activities which necessitates the emerging of women in public is forbidden in the light of Shariah. Allah Ta'aala says in the Quraan addressing women " And remain inside of your home ........". The riding of camel and driving of car lead to her coming in public, so it is forbidden. This applies to normal circumstances. If there are cases in those times regarding women riding camel it may be because there was necessity of it. And something happen at time of necessity cannot be generalized. ( Fatawaa are conducted by a panel under the supervision of Jamiat-Ul-Ulama).
Female Issues
141
sad*** asks:

Question

Slm.. Is it permissible for a woman to read salaah in sitting position and breastfeed her child at the same time?

Answer

Wslm. Breastfeeding is considered as an excessive movement (Amale katheer) in salaah and it is a factor that nullifies salaah.
Daily

D'apres ene hadice ki trouve dans " Haakim " et " Musnad Ahmad " li pou servi ene bourik.

In terms of information at our disposal the said product is Halaal suitable. The ethanol content is not from a Haraam impure khamr source. (Replied by SANHA)

Yas*** asks:

Question

Eski E322 (Soya Lecithin) Halaal?

Answer

E322 en li meme li douteux, tous depane lor lecithin la so source. Si lecithin la fine extracté depi la graisse animale pou bizin verifier si zanimo la li halal avant, sinon li pou HARAAM . si li ene extrait de plante li pou HALAL. Si ensame avek E322 fine ecrire "soja lecithin" alors li pou halal.
Miscellaneous

Question

Eski "Dextrose" li ene ingredient Halaal?

Answer

Oui.
Miscellaneous
146
Ali*** asks:

Question

Lors ki sanla qourbaani waajib ?

Answer

Qourbaani li waajib lors ene musulman ki majeur, sain d’esprit et ki ena le moyen pou faire li et ki li pas en voyage.
Qurbaani
147
Ais*** asks:

Question

Ki l'age banne zanimo bizin ena pou faire Qourbani?

Answer

Si nou faire Qourbani avec grand zanimo couma taureau, bœuf etc. alors li bizin ena deux ans. Si fine faire Qourbani avec ene ki ena moins ki deux ans, alors Qourbani pas pour compté. Ti zanimo couma bouc cabri mouton bizin ena ene banané. Si jamais ene mouton de plis ki six mois li assez portant ki faire li paraite couma ene an alors sa aussi li pour permette. Ca exception-la li applique pour mouton seulement.
Qurbaani
148
Ano*** asks:

Question

Are we allowed to adopt children in Islam? If yes, what are the conditions?

Answer

Yes adoption is allowed if the following conditions are taken into consideration. (1) If they are adopted without changing the name of their biological and legitimate father. (2) If they are not given rights to inheritance. (However the adopting parents may draw a will in favour of the adopted child to the extent of one third from their estate). (3) If the rules of pardah are observed. (i.e. in case of a male the adopting mother should make pardah from him and in case of a female, she should observe pardah from the adopting father etc) However rendering mahram can be achieved by breastfeeding within 2 years. For example if the child is a boy it should be fed by the daughter, sister or the niece of the adopting mother. In case of a girl feeding should be done by a mahram of the adopting father.
Tarbiyat
149
Sar*** asks:

Question

Ki moyen ene dimoune bizin possedé pou Qourbami vine obligatoire lor li?

Answer

Pour qourbaani vine obligatoire ene dimoune bizin ena 200 dirham dans so possession en plis de so banne nécessités de base et so banne dettes. Ça 200 dirham-là li évalué à environ 612 gramme l’argent.Ene personne ki pena 200 dirham dans so possession, mais li ena la valeur de 200 dirham en forme la monnaie liquide alors li aussi pou etre consideré comme ene dimoune ki ena le moyen.( pou l'anneé 2014 so valeur li 30 mille roupies)Coumsa même ene dimoune ki ena ça valeur-là en forme marchandise de commerce aussi li reconnaite comme ene dimoune ki ena le moyen.Similairement ene dimoune ki ena impé l’argent (chandi), impé la monnaie liquide et impé marchandise ki vine dans valeur 200 dirham quand évalué zotte ensam, alors par ça aussi ene dimoune li vine ene dimoune ki ena le moyen. apart sa tout banne kitchose, objets ou banne zeffets ki ene dimoune ena apart so banne nécessité de base, bizin évalué pou conné si li ene dimoune ki ena le moyen ou bien non. Par exemple ene dimoune capave ena ene banne meubles ou banne ustensiles ki pas servi et ki li gardé zisse pou faire décoration. Alors ça li pas évalué pou le besoin de zakaat mais bizin évalué li pou le besoin de qourbaani.Donc tout banne kitchose ki ene dimoune ena en plis de so banne nécessité, bizin prend en considération quand pé évalué le nisaab de qourbaani.
Qurbaani
150
Abd*** asks:

Question

Est-ce ki dans qabarastaan li permettre pou ene personne lève so la main pou dimanne duaa après L’enterrement et aussi au moment de ziyaarat (visite)?
151
Nou*** asks:

Question

Whilst in menstruation the husband is forcing his wife to have intercourse with her. When the wife told him that it is not permissible to do so, he replied that it is halal to do such. In this case what should the wife do?

Answer

Sexual intercourse in haiz is haraam and considering it halal may tantamount to kufr and invalidation of nikah. He must make tawbah, read kalima and renew his nikaah.
Menstruation
152
Naw*** asks:

Question

Eski ena qourbaani lors ene dimoune ki endetté ?

Answer

Si ene dimoune ki ena ene dette ki dépasse ceki li possédé ou bien ene quantité ki pas laisse la valeur de 612 grammes d’argent dans so possession, alors ça dimoune-là pas obligé faire qourbaani. Par exemple ene dimoune ena Rs 50,000 et li doit Rs 10,000. Alors li pou bizin faire qourbaani parceki après avoir rembourse so dette, li pou continué ena Rs 40,000 et ça somme-là li plis ki la valeur de 612 grammes l’argent. Par contre si li doit Rs 30,000 là-dans, alors li pas obligé faire qourbaani parceki après remboursement dette, li pou reste ene quantité ki moins ki la valeur de 612 grammes l’argent.
Qurbaani
153
you*** asks:

Question

Aslm si cheville couvert ski ibadat accepter

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Couvert cheville li ene pêché mais li pas empêche validité ene ibaadat quand fine observe so banne condition et banne élément essentielle. Oui ! Appréciation et Maqbooliyat dans lizié Allah li ene kitsoz apart ki li trouve dans so discrétion.
Sins
154
adm*** asks:

Question

Anonymous 1. I am a teen and want to do all the Salaats which i haven't done since puberty. Is there any way other than do all the salaats again? 2. And if i have to do all the salaats again, can i read suras like wal Asr in the firts rakaat and Inna 'Athuaina in the second? 3.I don't want to go to school because of the teachers'(female) indecent clothes and i'm therefore atracted to them, and by looking at them and their body, i make zina. So what can i do? 4. Is watching football permitted in Islaam? 5.If i have backbitted, do i have to ask for forgiveness from them or can i just give sadqah on their name?

Answer

1. All missed namaaz should be replaced. 2. Small sourats may be recited. 3. You should stop schooling in case you are given the choice to pursue your studies or indulging in zina. If there is a possibility you should move to another school. 4. Watching football is not allowed essentially because it is a waste of time without any concrete benefit. 5. As far as backbiting is concerned you should just make tawbah and no need to make the victims aware of it in case they don't know.
Akhlaaq-Tasawwuf
155
Saf*** asks:

Question

Ene madame ki ti dan pope fine change so la vie, li fine commence mette jilbaab. So misier pas fine content kan madame la fine mette sa et li fine dire madame la mo envie vomit lor toi kan mo trouve toi ar sa. Eski madame la bizin arette met jilbaab zis pou fer so misier kontent. Eski missier la gagne droit dire ene parole pareille?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam ....Madame-la bizin pas arrête mette jilbaab. Li pé faire ene bon travail, Allah Ta'aala pou aide li. En principe ene madame bizin obéir so missié, mais sa li appliqué seulement dans ene kitsoz ki permette. Quant a banne kitsoz ki haraam madame la bizin pas obéir so missié la dans. Déclaration ki missié la fine faire, si li fine faire li dans ene l'état normale alors ena ene grand possibilité ki so nikaah aussi fine cassé, alors li bizin faire tawba, lire kalimah et renouvelé so nikaah.
Dressing-Appearance
156
a unknown asks

Question

ASlm. Si ene kiken rejette ene l'ordre ki Allah fine donner dan quran, eski li enkor reste ene musulman? eski ena kit difference si li fine fer li par oublie ou bien par ignorance? Si li ene dimoune marié eski sa affecter so la vie mariage?

Answer

Rejette ene preuve de deen ki prouvé par ene preuve catégorique sans kit ambigüité li ene action de kufr ki annule tous banne actions ki ene dimoune fine faire et aussi so nikaah cassé. Ene dimoune pareil li bizin faire tawba, lire kalimah et renouvelé so nikaah. Si li ena le moyen li bizin refaire so Hajj quand même li fine déjà faire Hajj.

Question

ASlm. Si ene kiken rejette ene l'ordre ki Allah fine donner dan quran, eski li enkor reste ene musulman? eski ena kit difference si li fine fer li par oublie ou bien par ignorance? Si li ene dimoune marié eski sa affecter so la vie mariage?

Rejette ene preuve de deen ki prouvé par ene preuve catégorique sans kit ambigüité li ene action de kufr ki annule tous banne actions ki ene dimoune fine faire et aussi so nikaah cassé. Ene dimoune pareil li bizin faire tawba, lire kalimah et renouvelé so nikaah. Si li ena le moyen li bizin refaire so Hajj quand même li fine déjà faire Hajj.

you*** asks:

Question

Aslm ki fer surah towba pa commence par bismillah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam.... Lik fine revelé coumsa, alors banne sahabah (r.a) fine laisse li couma li fine revelé. Sa li ene de banne preuve de l'autencitité de Quraan ki banne Sahabah (r.a) pas fine servi zotte logique.
Quraan
159
You*** asks:

Question

Asalm si cheville couvert r linge eski ibadat pas accpter?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam......Ene ibaadat ki faire avec cheville couvert li capave valable mais li pas appréciable. Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) fine qualifié sa de ene signe de l'orgueil. Ene dimoune ki ena l'orgueil dimension ene la grain moutard dans so le cœur pas pou rente dans jannat. Et li bien pas bon si ene Imam faire namaz avec so cheville couvert. D'après principe sa namaz la bizin répété et si ene dimoune par l'habitude faire li alors li vine faasiq.
Daily

Muh*** asks:

Question

Aslm.. Eski li permissible pou mange chocolat "KitKat" ?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. KITKAT ki sorti l'Afrique du Sud fine certifié halal par SANHA. Voici la liste: Kit Kat 1 Finger (8 x 24 x 13g) , Kit Kat 11 F Dark (24 x 150g) , Kit Kat 11 F Milk (24 x 150g) , Kit Kat 11 F White (24 x 150g) , Kit Kat 1F (130g) Bag , Kit Kat 1F (250g) Funbag , Kit Kat 2 F Dark (36 x 21g) , Kit Kat 2 F White (36 x 21g) , Kit Kat 2F (36x21g) , Kit Kat 2F Multipack (24 x 6 x 21g) , Kit Kat 4 F White (48 x 45g) , Kit Kat 4 F Dark (48 x 45g) , Kit Kat 4F (48x45g) , Kit Kat Chunky (24x45g) , Kit Kat Chunky Cream (24 x 45g) , Kit Kat Chunky Menthol (24 x 45g) , Kit Kat Chunky Mint (24 x 45g) , Kit Kat Chunky Multi pack (5 x 45g) , Kit Kat Chunky Yogurt (24 x 45g) , Kit Kat Cool (40x45g).

Close relatives like parents, own children, brothers and sisters can be visited.

Ano*** asks:

Question

Is smoking makrooh or is haraam, DR zakir naik says in his videos that it's not makrooh, it's haraam and i have learnt that it's makrooh?

Answer

According to the Jurists it is authorised but to perform salaah without removing it's smell is makrooh and it may become haraam by doing it persistently and regularly. This verdict applies as long as it does not become detrimental to health.

168
Ano*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum. What to do when a person died in the foreign country in terms of funeral? Do we have to bring the corpse to Mauritius or better to bury it there as soon as possible?

Answer

It is makrooh (abominable) to transfer the dead body from one place to another. So in your case as well it should be buried in the foreign country.
Janaazah
169
ano*** asks:

Question

Assalam ou alaikum,If a man does not want to give talaq to his wife,I understand that the woman can ask an imam or somebody of similar stature to grant her a talaq,Is that right?and if the talaq is granted what is the position with the man,can he still live at the house or would have to move out,what if he has not got any where to go?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam.Talaaq lies solely in the hand of the husband. Nobody is authorised to give it to her. In some cases where the wife is undergoing hardships the nikaah can be dissolved by a committee composed of competent Ulama if the committee find solid ground and concrete evidence to do so. Eventually if the woman is separated by dissolution or by talaaq, they won't be allowed to live together in the same house. If the house belongs to the husband then the wife will have to move out after her iddat. And if it's her house then he will have to move out.
Talaaq
170
zbm*** asks:

Question

si ena 1 monsieur li ena magasin et li pa encore tire so zakaat pu sa lannee la.li ena bocou dette,li doi banne supplier.li pena cash in hand.so mme ena bijou mai li osi li pena cash in hand.mo ti deja demander 1 mufti ti dir mme la cpv pren 1 par dan linde. mai monsieur la ki bizin fer?et eski mme la p bien fer?mo ine tender bizin vendre bijou mai fer qurbani?

Answer

Si ou pe prend ene part dans l'inde comme qourbani alors ou responsabilité qourbani pou aquitté. Si madame-la so missié so dette li couvert so capital et so marchandise ou bien après avoir remboursé li pas retse valeur de Rs 30.000/- alors li pena qourbani pou faire. Si li continié reste Rs 30.000/- ou bien plis alors li bizin faire qourbani comme ene facilité li aussi li capave prend ene part dans l'inde.
Qurbaani

Question

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Ena certaine dimoune avec ki li bizin garde bon relation, Couma certaine catégorie dimoune li pas bizin zoine zotte même. Par exemple banne dimoune ki kapave induire li dans l'erreur ou bien kapave influence li faire banne kitsoz ki pas bizin alors li bizin pas zoine zotte di tout.

Ano*** asks:

Question

174
Sal*** asks:

Question

Assalamu alaykum, What is the latest time to pray namaaz Dhuhr and namaaz Asr ?

Answer

Istiwaa is the mid way between sunrise and sunset. Zawaal starts immediately after istiwaa. The shadow which appears at the time of istiwaa is called "Fai". Zuhr starts from zawaal and remains until the shade of everything becomes twice the height of any standing object plus the shade at the time of istiwaa. For example, The shade of an object of 25 centimeters is 5 centimeters at the time of istiwaa, so zuhr time will remain until its shade becomes 55 centimeters. Immediately after that asr time will start and it will remain untill sunset. But it is Makrooh (undesirable) to delay asr namaz untill the sun turns yellow. The sun is said to be yellow when one may fix his gaze towards it.
Daily
175
Sal*** asks:

Question

Asalaamualaikoum warahmatullahi wa barakaatuhu, Sa l'annee la dans Hajj, Arafaat pe tombe ene jour vendredi. Dans la tente cote banne mauricien pour ete, si ena ene imaam ou an aalim, eski capave faire Jummah dans la tente ou soi bizin faire zohr meme? Jazak Allah Khair

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Hajj ki Nabi (s.a.w) ti faire, so jour Arafaat ti jour Jumuah, D'après nous connaissance nous pas conné quelque part fine mentionné ki Nabi (s.a.w) ti faire Jumuah. Akoze sa banne Juristes dire ki perna Jumuah dans Arafaat pareil couma perna namaz eid dans Mina.
Hajj

ano*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikoum, Ene membre de Jamiat ul Ulama de Maurice, Mufti A Mackoojee, fine certifié restaurant Chop Wok ki trouve dans St Pierre et Port Louis. Chop Wok so proprietaire c'est banne Bhageloo ki reste St Pierre. Ena beaucoup dimoune dans St Pierre et dans les autres l'endroit pe temoigner ki banne Bhageloo dans St Pierre, c'est banne Qadiani. Eski gagne droit certifier ene restaurant ki so proprietaire ene Qadiani? mo prefere reste anonyme et mo pour lire reponse lor zotte site meme. Jazak Allah

Answer

Jamiat Ul Ulama de Maurice en li même pas fine certifié sa restaurant la. Mais ziska l'heure d'après nous renseignement la personne concerné li ene musulman. Nous pou continié nous recherche et nous pou faire ou ene réponse pli tard. Li bon ou rappelle nous pli tard.
Outlets-Restaurants

Abd*** asks:

Question

Aslm Ene dimoune fine faire accident, li ti en raison. Li fine proclame Rs100000 avec l'assurance. Après tous bane démarche li fine recevoir cash la. Normalement dommage de Van li Rs100000 mais la personne coner ki dans Rs 50000 li pu kave repare van et l'autre Rs 50000 pu vine pu li. Eski sa Rs 50000 la halaal pu li ?

Answer

Si en réalité so endommagement li évalué a Rs 100,000.00, mais li pe répare li dans pli moins ki sa, alors dans sa cas la li pou permette. Si sa somme la li plis ki saki fine endommagé alors li pas pou gagne droit prend saki en plis.

180
Ano*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum. Please inform when to fast for arafah in Mauritius?

Answer

The Moon was sighted on thursday the 25th day of September in Mauritius. Hence the 9th day of Zhul Hijjah will be on Saturday the 4th day of October in Mauritius. Therefore the fast will be on saturday the 4th.
Ramadhaan
181
akh*** asks:

Question

Assalaam Respected Scholar I was gifted a book by someone where reference was made to "Ahad Namah" and it says that when somebody dies you write the Ahad Namah on a piece of cloth and put it with the Kafan etc. It also made reference of the benefits to it like getting sawaabs of messengers etc. (i) I want to know the authenticity of the above if it has been referenced in any Hadith. (ii) Is the above permissible? Your reply will be highly appreciated. Jazak Allah Akhmez

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh, According to Shaami ( An authentic book in fiqh), " The Ulama-e-kiraam are not in favour of such a practice because it would be a means of messing up the names of Allah Ta'aala with the impurity of the mayyit at a later stage. However they allow it to be written on the forehead and chest of the mayyit by using merely the finger in such a way that no writings would be visible.
Janaazah
182
akh*** asks:

Question

Assalaam Respected Scholar (i) Is Health insurance permissible in Islam? I have heard that it is not but we see many muslims taking benefit of this health insurance by making small monthly contributions and benefits from health facilities. Again if it is not permissible, I strongly suggest awareness should be created towards this. (ii) One further suggestion - regarding halaal certificates etc, i would suggest that the process and procedures are made public so that this can create a better understanding and act as a watchdog as well to places we are eating where halaal certicates have been given. Jazak Allah Akhmez

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahamatullahi wabarakaatuh, (1) Exchange of a given amount of money for a specific service or for a define period of time is known as Ijaarah (Leasing) in Shariah. In the light of this definition the medical insurance as presented by you would be permissible providing it does not include any material thing such as medication.(2) Please refer to our latest halal booklet to see whether it satisfies your suggestions.
Financial Transaction

Miscellaneous
187
a unknown asks

Question

Question: Eski gagne droit avoye zakaat de ene l’endroit à ene l’autre l’endroit ?

Answer

En principe li makrouh pou avoye zakaat de ene l’endroit à ene l’autre l’endroit. Quand nou dire ene l’endroit à ene l’autre l’endroit, ça pas veut dire de ene pays à ene l’autre pays seulement. Ça li aussi applique de ene l’endroit à ene l’autre l’endroit de ene seul pays. Par exemple d’après ça principe-là li pou makrouh pou avoye zakaat de Port-Louis à Flacq et vice versa. Mais si jamais ene dimoune li ena so famille proche ki mérité et ki reste dans ene l’autre l’endroit, alors dans ça cas-là ça principe-là pas pou appliqué. C'est-à-dire li pas pou makrouh pou avoye so zakaat dans ça l’autre l’endroit cote li ena so famille proche. Coumsa même li pas makrouh pou avoye dans ene l’autre l’endroit cote zotte pli dans le besoin ou bien cote ça zakaat-là capave servi dans ene façon pli efficace et pli profitable. Similairement li pas pou makrouh si li envoye li avant ki so l’année de zakaat complété.

Question

Question: Eski gagne droit avoye zakaat de ene l’endroit à ene l’autre l’endroit ?

Answer

En principe li makrouh pou avoye zakaat de ene l’endroit à ene l’autre l’endroit. Quand nou dire ene l’endroit à ene l’autre l’endroit, ça pas veut dire de ene pays à ene l’autre pays seulement. Ça li aussi applique de ene l’endroit à ene l’autre l’endroit de ene seul pays. Par exemple d’après ça principe-là li pou makrouh pou avoye zakaat de Port-Louis à Flacq et vice versa. Mais si jamais ene dimoune li ena so famille proche ki mérité et ki reste dans ene l’autre l’endroit, alors dans ça cas-là ça principe-là pas pou appliqué. C'est-à-dire li pas pou makrouh pou avoye so zakaat dans ça l’autre l’endroit cote li ena so famille proche. Coumsa même li pas makrouh pou avoye dans ene l’autre l’endroit cote zotte pli dans le besoin ou bien cote ça zakaat-là capave servi dans ene façon pli efficace et pli profitable. Similairement li pas pou makrouh si li envoye li avant ki so l’année de zakaat complété.
Zakaat
188
moh*** asks:

Question

Assalam.. Is it permissible to make qurbani with such an animal that has only one ball in the testicle?

Wa alaikumus salaam. Yes it is permissible.

yak*** asks:

Question

Assalaamou'alaikoum.. Is it allowed to spread the legs towards the kaaba(qibla) whether while sleeping or sitting in the masjid?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. It is Makrooh (reprehensible ) for a person to spread his legs towards the Qiblah in which ever way it may intentionally done.
Masjid
191
moh*** asks:

Question

Assalam.. Eski li Mustahab pou repete sa namaz ki fine lire derriere ene faasiq (ene celui ki rase ou taille so la barbe moins ki ene poignet) ? Si mustahab sa, alors donne moi la raison et refference s'il vous plait? jazak..

Answer

Dans Shaami fine mentioné ki li makrooh pou faire namaz derriere ene faasiq. Normalement quand servi le mot "karaahat" en generale veut dire makroohe tahreemi. Et ene l'autre place fine mentioné ki si karaahat la li tahreemi alors li pou waajib pou repette namaaz la et si li tanzeehi alor li pou mustahab pou repette li.
Congregation
192
yak*** asks:

Question

Assalaamou'alaikoum.. eski capave leve la main faire du'ah dan namaaz witr? eski li prouver depuis Rasulullah(saw) ou banne sahaabah(r.a)??

Answer

Selon ene hadice rapporté par Imam Bukhari dans so livre "Juz Raf'il Yadain" avec ene chaine naration ki autentique, Hazrat Abdullah bin Mas'oud (r.a) ti pe leve so la main pou faire qunoot avant li alle dans ruku. Dans ene l'autre hadice fine mentioné ki avant qunoot ena takbeer. Donc, D'apres nous pratique, nous leve la main pareille couma nous leve la main dans takbeer tahreema ensuite nous attache la main et apres sa nous lire dua qunoot.
Witr
193
han*** asks:

Question

aslm,eski lamousse noire ki sorti depi la chine gagne droit bwar?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Normalement sa la mousse la li sorti depi plante et ena plizir qualité la mousse noir ki importé depi la chine. Apparemment dans zotte banne ingredient nous pas trouve narien negatif. Mais pou certaine raison nous pas pou kapave prend la responsabilité pou dire ki zot halal tanque ki nous pas gagne satisfaction a traver ene institution halal dans la chine. Si ou ena kit marque specifique ki ena so la liste ingredient et so numero contact ou kapave envoye nous li pou nous kapave faire ene suivi. Jazaakumullahu khairaa
Beverages

Ano*** asks:

Question

AslmWrWb Hon Ulamas On occasion of Ramadhan many muslims brothers and sisters used jelly ("La Mousse") Agar Agar. Since this product is originated from China I have a doubt on whether it is Halal or not. Can please advise. Jakazakallah Khair

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Agar Agar itself is of plant origin and therefore halaal for consumption. We do not have any information whether anything haraam is added to it. On the basis of doubt it may not be considered as haraam, however in this case one may abstain from it.

196
yam*** asks:

Question

Assalamoualaikoum, I would like to know if the following products can be eaten: (i) Nonnine( product of Doria) from Italy (ii) Crostata( product of Nastrecce) from Italy (III) ROUGE (Sorini)from Italy. Hoping to hear from you soon, Jazakallah Khair.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. According to Halal International Authority (HIA) a halal organisation in Italy, these products are not certified by any halal organisation in Italy. Therefore they recommended us not to consume any of these products unless they are Halal certified by an internationally recognized Halal Certifier.
Biscuits
197
Ano*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum, is Thorntons chocolate cakes halaal? It is made in UK.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Thorntons Chocolate cakes contain E471, which is doubtful. We are therefore advising you to stay away from it for the time being. Emails was sent to the Manufacturer and also few halal organizations in U.K. Their replies are awaited.
Cakes-Pastries
198
naw*** asks:

Question

assalamoualaikoum, i wanted to the the rulings in regard to the use of tampons and mooncups. jazzakAllah khairan

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. (1) Tampon is a plug which is used as a feminine hygiene product. Its is normally inserted into the vagina during the menstrual period to absorb the flow of blood. According to some Jurist, Islamically it is disliked because it is something that is inserted in the internal part of a woman’s vagina and this resembles masturbation. (2) The same ruling applies to Mooncup ( A flexible cup or barrier) as it is also worn inside the vigina during menstruation to collect menstual fluid.
Menstruation
199

Question

Assalamualaikoum, Mo ene muswalli masjid la rue desforges, depi longtemp moi et buku les zotte dimoune faire namaz lor chaise. tous les temp nous fine mette nous chaise dans coin avec muraille excepté quand ena tigite dimoune lerla nous mette chaise la cote saf fini. Mais depi quelque mois ena ene mufti ici cot nous, line commence fer namaz lor chaise et li mette so chaise n'importe cote sa au millieu dans saf. meme ena encore dimoune pe vini, zotte continuer debouter apres so chaise. Mo ena 2 questions. ene eski gagne droit mette chaise au millieu saf meme si ena dimoune juska muraille? deuxieme si gagne droit eski nous aussi nous capve mette nous chaise au millieu saf quand nous pe faire namaz? Jazak Allah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Ene dimoune li gagne droit mette so chaise cote li envie, pourvi li pas embarrassant pour banne lezot mussalli. Si gagne l'occasion mette dans la fin saff quand saff la li connecté sa li pli bon. Mais si saff pas connecté alors pas pou gagne droit exige kikene pou faire namaz lor chaise dans ene coin retiré parceki pou connecté avec saff depi commencement namaz li waajib.
Congregation
200
Nas*** asks:

Question

Does pepsi contain alcohol?

Answer

This is a controversial issue. According to some research it was found with traces of alcohol but yet refuted by some manufacturers. It may be dependable on places where it is being processed. To be on the safe side the best is to abstain.
Beverages
201

Question

Salam, Couma capave dans ene seul organisation de Jamiat ul ulama, nous gagne different verdict lor banne masla? par exemple: Jamiat ul ulama dire ki nisaab de Qurbani li Rs30000 et Mufti Makoojee ki aussi ene membre de jamiat ul ulama dire ki nisaab qurbani li Rs 7000. Coumsa meme dans Ramadhan, Jamiat ul ulama ti dire ki bizin tire zakat lor valeur bijoux et lor retail price de banne stock mais Mufti makoojee ki aussi ene membre dans jamiat ul ulama ti dire ki bizin tir zakat lor poid de bijoux et lor wholesale price de banne stock. eski pena ene concensus entre zotte dans zotte organisation? ki sanla ki nous pou bizin suivre dans sa situation la car zotte tous forme parti enbas ene seul organisation. Merci

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. D'apres nous calcule nisaab pou Ramadhan 2014 et Qourbani li toujour Rs 30,000.00 et sa li ene consensus de tous banne Ulama ki ti present au moment de calculation . Nous fine rentre en contacte avek la personne concerné pou dire li revoir so calcule. Ziska l'heure nous pas fine gagne aukene explication avec li. En ceki concerne zakaat lor bijoux et marchandise nous fine deja reponne avant ki sa point ki la personne concerné fine avancé pou dire ki " bizin tire zakat lor poid de bijoux et lor wholesale price de banne stock" cest ene declaration incohérent ki pé mette la masse dans confusion et li contre ceki fine mentionné dans banne livre de fiqh (jurisprudence).
Zakaat
202
Ars***@gmail.com] asks:

Question

Is it permissible to consume products that sponsor Zionism and support oppression? In particular, the following ones Coca-Cola Nestle McDonald's L'Oreal Disney Danone Johnson & Johnson Barclays Starbucks Marks & Spencer Intel Motorola Hewlett Packard General Electric Caterpillar Sara Lee Estee Lauder

Answer

It is allowed to consume a product that is lawful in itself no matter where it was produced, unless the (Muslim) government commands that we should boycott something for some benefit to Islam or the Muslims. As this is a strategical move to weaken them economically as to protect ourselves. This move is not only allowed but in some instance it will be compulsory as well.

204
Abo*** asks:

Question

Assalamoalaikum--when performing Salat behind an Imam,do we follow the imam when he moves to go in rukhu/ sizda or do we wait for him to say takbeer, because there is this particular imam who takes his time to say takbeer after he has carried the action-rukhu/sijda.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. You should follow the takbeers rather than the imaam's movement. By the way the correct procedure is that the Imam should say takbeer whilst moving for ruku and sajdah etc.
Congregation

Abo*** asks:

Question

Assalamoualaikum--I have some Hindu neighbours and during their Divali festival we were given some cakes and mitthai,we were also invited for meals. Is this allowed?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. It is not allowed. A muslim should not participate in such gatherings and should also abstain from everything that is religiously or ritually connected to non-muslim.

Si zote fine deja reste ensame couma missié madame, alors 3 talaaq fine porté. Dans sa cas la madame la bizin observe iddat pou ene periode de trois mois.Madame la pas pou gagne droit remarié avec sa missié la akoze ki li fine donne 3 talaaq.

Ano*** asks:

Question

Assalaamu alaikum. Is it allowed to make massah on socks made of nylon or cotton etc? what is the rulings?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. It is not allowed. Namaz performed with such a wudhu is not valid. It is also not allowed to perform namaz behind an imaam who makes massah on ordinary socks instead of washing feet. Hos*** asks:

Question

Aslm. Eski ena kit restaurant ki certifié halal dans la croisette?

Answer

Apart Angel Berry nous pas fine certifié aukene restaurant dans la croisette. Faire attention a banne ki pe servi fausse certificat. Pou ene certificat valable (1) Li bizin originale, si li ene photocopie veut dire li ene fraud. (2) Li bizin porte meme noms de sa l'entreprise cote li fine affiché la. (3) Li bizin affiché dans ene facon ki li visible divan publique.

Answer

Parfois nous voter pou amene ideale et parfois pou evite le pire. Pou Maurice le deuxieme ki appliqué. Donc li permette. Nous bizin comprend ki pas voter aussi en quelque sort li deja ene vote. Mais li ene vote decontrollé. Donc si nous voter li pou ene zeffort de nous par pou evite le pire et minimise le degat.

Ann*** asks:

Question

aslm, eski banne madames gagn droit al voter?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Voter pour ideale ou pour evite le pire li permissible. Pas voter li deja ene vote parceki ene dimoune li capave sanctionne le plis mauvais par so vote. Au cas contraire li possible ki le pire vine a la tete du pays ki peut etre li ti capave empeché a travers so vote. Si voter li benefique pour la comminauté musulmane, alors li pour reccommandé pour ene madame aussi. Sa recommendation la faudrais pas li faire li neglige so obligation de purdah.

228
A.R*** asks:

Question

Assalaam...Eski li ti obligatoire lor banne peuple avant pou faire travail da'wah? Ena dimoune dire ki sa Ummat la ena privilege lor banne ummat avant akoze ki li fine gagne gagne travail da'wat comme so responsabilité. Akoz sa, sa ummat la pou rente dans jannat en premier.Eski vraiment li coumsa?

Answer

Da'wat ti ena lor Ummat avant pareil couma ena lor ummat aster-la. Seule difference ki ena c'est banne derapage ki ti ena auparavant fine corrigé par banne Ambiyaa (Alaihimus salaam) ki fine vini de temps a haut. Quant a sa ummat la pena aukene Nabi ki pou vini aprés, Donc pour corrige banne derapage li repose uniquement lor sa ummat la.

Moh*** asks:

Question

Assalaamu 'Alaikum wa rahmatullah, Suite a mo suggestion precedent pou ban 'Ulama reuni lor ene platform commun concernant ban certification 'Halaal ek 'Haraam, mo ti ena ene ti reflexion pou faire: Pendant ki nou ban frères p engage zot dan ban discussions (ki parfois fini par la haine) concernant ban différences d’opinion ki exister entre nous, entretemps ban fléau couma la drogue, prostitution ek l’injustice p fer ravage dan la société musulmane. Couma nou kapav reste insensible a sa banne problem la, kan c’est nou ban frères, sœurs ek zenfants ki p soufferts?? Combien ban familles musulmane pe detruire suite a sa ban problèmes la?? Faudrer pas ki nous laisse nou ban divergence d’opinion vine ène barrière entre nous! Nou bizin conscientise ban frères ek ban sœurs lor l’importance de l’unité parmi nou. Nou aussi fer ene humble appel a nou ban respectable Imams ek ‘Ulamaa pou zot koz imper plus lor l’importance de l’unité dan zot ban causeries. Anou regrouper ensem lor pou nou adresse ban problèmes ki la communauté musulmane pe fer face en general. (Ene Allah…Ene Prophete…Ene Qiblah…Ene Deen…Ene Ummah) JazaakAllah Khair Wassalaam Mohammad Muslim Ummah Reunited https://www.facebook.com/muslimummahreunited (Share ek Like)

Answer

Wslm Union ena so banne parametre ki banne Ulama Alhamdulillah zotte prend en consideration. Union li pas ene kitchose ki permettre a tout prix. Divergence tolerable c’est ene divergence ki basé lor preuve. Quant à ene divergence ki fondé lor ignorance ou manque de connaissance ou negligence, bizin denoncé si la personne concerné refuse pour retracté. Vaut mieux la haine à cause Allah ki l’amitié pour so propre l’avantage personnel.

Wslm Non

zai*** asks:

Question

Slm. Eski JUM fine certifié tous banne grand abattoir?

Answer

Wslm, Parmi banne grands Abbatoir, le Jum certifié seulement Arc en Ciel juska l'heure. Le Jum faire ressortir ki li pena narien a faire avec le HRC. Prend beaucoup precaution, pas nec accepter tous kalité certificat halal parceki ena ki pe donne certificat sans verifier couma bizin. Jazak Allah Khair
Meat-Poultry
238

Answer

Should be avoided

241

Question

I have a friend who i esteem a lot. She was a hindu but later reverted, However she reverted to Ahmadiyyat/ Qadianiyat. Most probably to get married to the man she loved. She now has four children (the last one is just born). However I am afraid for her (and her children as well) and would want for her to be guided to true Islam. Can you advise me how to proceed with this? Any literature or video i can send her will be helpful as well. Please understand she left everything for Qadianiyat perhaps not because of conviction but maybe mostly i think for love. I dont think an abrasive talk of manner will be able to win her, especially since she now has her 4 kids with her. Perhaps had i known her back then it may have been easier. I hope you can guide me or at least elp me with this process Insha Allah.

Answer

First talk to her and give her your opinion. If you feel she is interested then you can proceed to find a suitable book. Otherwise we advise you to cut off with her.

Moh*** asks:

Question

Assalaamu 'Alaikum Wa Ra'hmatullaah Plusieurs parmi nou fine surement remarquer ki dan vendredi apres salaat Jumu'ah, ena banne madames (veuves agees pour la plupart du temps) ki amasser devant banne masjids pu demande chariter. Malgre tou le respect et soucis ki nou bizin ena envers zot, n'empeche ki li pas parait korek ki nou bane mamans/soeurs en Islam bizin vinne demande chariter devant masjid....ce qui malheureusement donne l'impression ki nou societer finne neglige sa banne dimoune la, alors ki nou koner ki ena Baitul-Maal ki operer un peu partou dan banne masjid et zot suposer resoude sa banne types de problemes la. Li navrer pou faire ressortir ki des fois ena banne cas d'abus c'est-a-dire ki parfois sa banne dimounes la pe deja beneficier d'ene aide de zot masjid mais quand meme zot al mendier devant masjid dans ene lot region! (1) Eski nou pa ti kapav implemente/trouve ene solution a sa problem la? (2) Par example eski la direction de banne masjids respectif pa ti bizin renseigne avek sa banne dimoune kine vine demande chariter la pou koner si zot pa pe deza beneficier du service Baitul-Maal? Et par la suite trouve ene solution si vraiment zot pe bizin ene aide (3) Eski li pa ti necessaire ki nou ena ene base de donnee national kot responsables de banne Baitul-Maal kapave gagne acces pou koner sipa ene dimoune pe deza beneficier de Baitul-Maal depuis ene certaine Masjid ou non? Sa aussi pou permette resoud problem d'abus ou meme mieux canalise l'argent du Baitul-Maal! Mo conscient ki sa sujet la imper sensible et mo demande excuse en avance si ena erreur dans mo jugement ou facon penser. Jazaak-Allah khair Wassalaam Mohammad

Answer

Wa'alaikumussalaam, Nou fini faire tout seki ou fine proposé. Alhamduillah c'est banne proposition assez valable mais malheureusement sa banne dimoune la pas envi corperé. Donc couma dire zotte content sa la vie la.
Social life
246

Question

Assalaamu Alaykum wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakaatuhu Eski kit ummahaatul mumineen ti pé sorti pou alle masjid dans l'époque Rasoulullah ( S.A.W ) pou kit namaz?

Answer

Wslm, Dans Kitaabul Umm, Imaam Shafi R.A fine faire ressortit ki li pas conne apropos kikene parmi banne Ummahaatul Mu'mineen ti pe alle faire namaz avec Jamaat ni ti pe sorti pour alle faire namaz Jum'ah.
Female
247
Ano*** asks:

Question

Aslm. Je une question stp. Quand un homme dit 2 fois je te quitte puis 2 heures plus tard le repete encore. Est ce que ca compte comme talaaq? et si oui pour combien?

Answer

La Formule " Je te quitte" étant ambiguë, nécessite l'intention de talaaq pour être effective. Donc en disant "Je te quitte" pour la premier fois un talaaq est compté. S'il a répété la formule avec l'intention pour un deuxième, donc deuxième talaaq sera effective. Similairement la formule répétée après 2 heures sera valable comme talaaq s'il avait prononcé avec l'intention pour effectuer 2eme ou 3eme talaaq.
Talaaq
248

Question

Answer

D'abord dire nous, eski ou faire pardah quand ou marché dans la rue?

Question

aslm. mo ene missié mo fini marié mai selmen mo senti ki mo ena l'amour pu ene madam endehor plis ki l'amour ki mo ena pu mo madam. souven de fois mo neglige mo madam acoz sa lot madam la. kan mo encoler avec mo madam pu mo tire sa colere la dan moi mo coze avec lot madam la. eski mo bizin fer mo madam coner ki mo ena sentiment pou ene lot madam? parceki mo senti ki pu moi mo madam li nepli narien apart ene madam ki p faire travay et p cuit manger pu moi et p guet mo zenfant. mo nepli attirer avec mo madam e mo extra attirer enver lot madam la.

Answer

Saki ou pe faire li haraam. Faudrait pas garde kit contacte avec kit madame en dehors. Faire Tawbah et arrêté toute suite et pas nécessaire faire ou madame conné. Si ou arrête mange gonaze dehors ou pou trouve mangé la caze pli bon.

253
Abu*** asks:

Question

It is my dua that you are well. What is the ruling regarding women driving? The reason I ask this question is many times I am out in jamat etc and whole lot of arrangements have to be made. So if the wife can drive as a backup because many times the arrangements don't pan out. Kindly advise

Answer

Driving necessitates emerging in public which is forbidden for women according to Quran and Hadith. However emergencies can be taken into consideration as it is in every case. The issue should be treated on an individual basis and cannot be generalised.

257
Ann*** asks:

Question

asslm, can u please explain how property should be divided to wife and children.how much share should each get? any reference would be appreciated.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. In the presence of children wife will inherit one eighth of the estate and when there is no children she will receive one quarter. As for children generally male get double to the share of a female. (Surah Nisaa, Verse No 11,12). Please forward us more details to work on your particular query.
Inheritance

264
Ann*** asks:

Question

how to make a decision when you have 2 options? how to know which way is best?

Answer

One may perform salatul istikhaarah, i.e. two rakaat salaat, after which the dua of istikhaarah is recited. It is not necessary to see anything in dream after doing it. One may feel more inclined towards the best option. if nothing is felt the istikharah salaat may be continued for 7 days .
Sounnah-Nafl

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh, Ou deduire ou dette de Rs 125,000 depi ou stock de Rs 350,000. Ou pou reste ene balance de Rs 225,000. Donc, ou ena pou tire ene somme de Rs 5,625.00 comme zakaat quand ou l'annee de zakaat completé.

mou*** asks:

aslm si la nouvelle marriee li ene converti en islam et li porte ene nom musulman mais ene surnom (nom famille non musulman. Quand imam pe mentionne so nom pou so nikah devant l'assemble, eski li meilleur pou mentionne zis so ti nouvo nom musulman ou li pli meilleur pou mentionne so nom famille aussi? jazak...

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahamatullahi wabarakaatuh. Bizin mentionne so vrai nom et après sa faire dimoune conné ki nom li porté comme musulmane. Par exemple: Jaqueline Allias so nouveau nom c'est Fatimah Allias.

ano*** asks:

Question

aslm.normalement mo haiz mo gagne li pendant 10 jours et après mo reste paak pu environ 18 jours.tou les mois li cumsa c mo l'habitude.mai sa foi la mone boire 1 comprime hormonale mais mo pa pu re boire sa comprime hormonale la parce ki li pa p alle avec moi.mone boire li juste 2 jour au lieu de 10 jours sa ine debalace moi et lor mo 13 jour paak mone coumence saigner.sa ti conte istihaaza alor lor 15 jour mone coumence conte haiz mai la kan mo bizin pren ghusl 10 jour mem comme d'habitude ou pli avan?merci

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Sa jour apartir lequel ou fine commence compte li haiz, si li continué pendant 3 jour ou plis ki trois jours, alors sa quantité jour la li pou haiz. A moin si li depasse 10 jours a ce moment la ou compte ou haiz 10 jours seulement et apres sa li pou istihaazah.
Menstruation
281
mou***@gmail.com asks:

Question

aslm, eski bizin faire mention mehar pendant nikah devant l'assembler. Parfois ena imam mentionner et parfois non. Ki supposer faire? Jazak...

Answer

wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Sans mentionné aussi nikaah compté, mais sa li capave creé problème concernant mehr si arrivé ménage la pas marché plitard. Le deux partie capave gagne dispute concernant le montant de mehr akoze ki zotte pas ti ranne li officielle au moment de nikaah. Si mehr la li deux ou trois mille roupie sa pas dire narien, mais li pou ene gros problème si sa mehr la li ene centaine de mille roupie ou bien ene bijoux ki so valeur assé élevé. akoze sa préfère tanne li officielle au moment de nikaah pou pena dispute plitard.
Mahr

Wa alaikumus salaam. Facilite zotte pou faire zotte gagne jumu'ah li ene bon l'idée.

Assalamualaikum, Ene person cki pencor marye e ki fine conten ene madam ki deja marye eski li gng droit deman dua pu sa madam la vine en so nikah?e eski li permisible pu sa madam la osi demande sa dua ki li vin madam de sa peson la?eski zot dua pu acepte?e eski sa madam la pu gng gunna si li deman sa dua la?

Muh*** asks:

Question

Aslm... Eski gagne droit faire kit namaaz nafil (par example tahyaatul masjid ) aprE namaaz Assr? Eski gagne droit faire sajda tilaawat aprE assr? Mo ti bizin ene explication detaillE lor sa sujet.. jazaakallah..

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. (1) Quand fini faire namaz assr pas gagne droit faire aukene namaz nafil. (2) De préférence faire sajdah tilaawah dans ene l'autre l’heure, a moins si fine lire sa verset cote ena sajdah la dans sa l'heure la même.
