Ann*** asks:

Question

Aslm. Is there janaazah namaz for someone who has commited suicide? Someone told me that Nabi (s.a.w) didn't perform janazah namaz for such people. jzkl

Answer

Wslm. Ghusl has to be given to and Janaazah has to be performed upon every Muslim even if he has committed suicide, as mentioned in Shaami. Allamah Shaami rahmatullahi alaih states that the Fatwaa is upon this opinion. As far as Rasulullah sallallahu alaihi wasallam not performing Janazaah upon a person who committed suicide, that was to teach and impress upon the minds of the Ummat the gravity of the sin of committing suicide. (See Shaami vol.1 pg.584). Therefore, Ulama state that the Muslims should give Ghusl to and perform Janazah Salaat upon a person who commits suicide. However, as a lesson for others, prominent Ulama, Muftis and influential Deeni people should not attend such a person’s Janaazah. (See Fatawaa Rahimiyyah vol.1 pg. 367).
Janaazah
293
abu*** asks:

Question

Aslm eski la farine moulin de la concorde li halaal? Parki avant mo ti tender ki ena doute la dans.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. D'apres information ki nous fine gagné, Dans "Type A Flour" ena amylase (E1100) comme ingredient. Sa li ene enzyme ki kapave sorti depuis animale et couma kapave végétale aussi. Le 07 Nov 2013 La compagnie fine rassure nous ki so d'origine li pas animale et donc halal.

298

Question

asslm, dairymaid magine cone contains halal stamp from halal research comittee..can we eat it???

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh.Halal Research Committee (HRC) was a branch of Jamiat-ul-Ulama of Mauritius (JUM) before, which has been dissolved long ago. Therefore any HRC certificate issued under the supervision of JUM should be considered invalid. Hence it should be renewed from JUM.

adm*** asks:

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. So madame pou gagne ene huitieme (1/8) de sa heritage la, et saki resté (7/8) pou divisé en six portions. Chaque garcon pou gagne 2 portions et chaque ti fille pou gagne ene portion.

It is a great problem for JUM to infirm and confirm without knowing their halal standard. (2) Mufti Mackoojee officially is a member of JUM, until now we could not understand why he should do something parallel to what JUM is doing on national basis. Our feedback and experience show that at times he issue halal certificate before inspection and verification. These facts render the matter very doubtful.

303
Ann*** asks:

Question

Aslm.Eski kan pe faire namaz derrière imaam bizin lire surah faatiha?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. D'après hadith ene dimoune ki lire namaz derrière imam pas gagne droit lire narien comme Quraan tanque ki li derrière imam. Sa li applique pou tous banne namaz. Namaz ki lire fort et namaz ki lire doucement. Quant a banne hadith ki dire ki namaz pas compté sans surah fatihah, sa li applique pou imaam ou bien ene dimoune ki pe faire namaz tousel. Li pas applique pou banne ki pe faire namaz derrière imam. Nabi (s.a.w) fine dire: Celui ki ena imam alors imam so qiraat li compté de la part de sa personne la.

305
a unknown asks

Question

My friend's husband uttered talaaq to his wife whilst in anger in the following manner "I'm hereby giving you talaaq, talaaq, talaaq." later on proclaimed that he uttered these words by mistake and it was not his intention to give talaaq. What is the ruling?

Answer

When one uses the word talaaq which is explicit and clear,the talaaq takes effect even without intention or in a state of anger.

Question

My friend's husband uttered talaaq to his wife whilst in anger in the following manner "I'm hereby giving you talaaq, talaaq, talaaq." later on proclaimed that he uttered these words by mistake and it was not his intention to give talaaq. What is the ruling?

Answer

When one uses the word talaaq which is explicit and clear,the talaaq takes effect even without intention or in a state of anger.

311

Question

Talaaq
313
zeb*** asks:

Question

If a deceased person had unpaid debts.is it possible for his parent to take zakat money to pay the debts?the parents don't give zakat as they don't have nisaab amount

Answer

Zakaat money cannot be used to reimburse a deceased person's debts, as it is essential for the zakaat to be fulfilled that it comes in the possession of somebody who is eligible to take zakaat. A deceased person does not have the ability to be an owner. However the deceased poor relatives can receive zakaat on their own behalf and then pay off the debts of the deceased person.
Zakaat
314

An art teacher is forced to draw animate objects, is his revenue halal?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Normally the art teacher does not draw only animated objects, therefore the revenue is not haraam. But he is not allowed to draw animated objects or to teach it.

Salaat performed with a handkerchief stained by blood, measuring less than one dirham is valid. However its sunnat to remove it.

Ann*** asks:

Question

My husband and I had a fight recently on a minor issue and whilst discussing about a specific topic in the fight he denied what he said. To prove him right he said to me that if I said that sentence then one talaaq is effected. I wanted to know if the talaaq is counted as according to me he could have had hundreds of other ways to prove his innocence apart from talaaq. Kindly advise as I am confused. Thanking you in advance.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahamatullahi wabarakaatuh. If you are sure having heard him saying what he is denying now, then one talaaq will take effect. You can still resume conjugal life and continue to live with him as only one talaaq has taken effect. But your Husband and you should keep in mind that as from now he will have the right of the remaining two talaaqs instead of three.

Ann*** asks:

Question

aslmkm mo ena ene soeur ki fine inteqaal. li ena ene portion la terre pou li meme. mo papa, mama, mo frere et moi nou ine envie donne mo soeur la so missie et zenfant sa la terre la en cadeau. eski gagne droit donne zotte la terre la cadeau si nou tous heritiers daccord? et si gagne droit, eski mo obliger demande mo missie permission pou mo donne mo part la terre?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Ceki nous comprend c'est ou sœur ki fine intiqaal la ti marié et li ti ena zenfant. Donc d'après sa so banne héritier c'est so missier, so banne zenfant et so mama papa. So missier pou hérite ene quart dans sa la terre. So mama pou gagne ene sixième. So papa aussi pou gagne ene sixième. Et le reste pou vine pou banne zenfant. Banne sœur frère perna narien a gagné. Si ou mama papa envie cède zotte droit de ene sixième chakene en faveur ou sœur so missier et so banne zenfant alors zot pou endroit.

Si kan pe faire wazou ena chaussette ordinaire dans li pied, eski gagne droit faire massah lor la en place lave li pied la ?

Answer

Pas gagne droit faire massah lor banne chaussette ordinaire ki faire avec la toile ou bien nylon ou bien banne tissue pareil. Bizin tire chaussette et lave li pied, sinon wazou pas pou compté et namaz aussi pas pou compté. Et faudrait pas faire namaz derrière ene imaam ki faire massah lor ene chaussette pareil.

Noo***@yahoo.fr asks:

Question

Assalamou Alaykoum ! Mo ti oler coné si ça Douah habituellement qui nou lire kan trouve la lune Rajab la (Allahumma bariklana fi rajaba...) eski li éna so source ou pas ? Djazakumullahu Khairan Wassalam

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahamatullahi wabarakaatuh. Sa dua la fine mentionné dans plusieurs livre hadice . (10) Shu’abul-Iman: hadice numéro 3534. (2) Ibnu Sunni : hadice numéro 660. (3) Mukhtasar Zawaid Bazzar: hadice numéro 662. (4) Al-Azhkar : hadice numéro 549. D'après banne ulama de hadice couma Allama Nawawi et Ibne Rajab Hambali (Rahimahumallah) et le zotte banne ulama, sa hadice la de part so la chaine de naration la li ene ti peu faible mais li ene hadice ki kapave pratiqué.

Inheritance
332
Ann*** asks:

Question

asslm.... is it true that it is not permissible to dye one's hair or beard black? can i get a reference on that plz. jazakallah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Under any circumstances a person is not allowed to dye his hair black. Very severe warnings are narrated in the Ahadeeth for those who use black dye. Imaam Abu Dawood rahmatullahi alaih narrates on the authority of Abudullah bin Abbaas radhiallahu anhu that Rasulullah sallallahu alaihi wasallam said: “At the end of time there will be people who will use this black dye like the crops of doves, who will not experience the fragrance of Jannah. (Sunan Abu Dawood vol.2 pg.222) This Hadeeth clearly illustrates the prohibition of the usage of black dye. It’s usage is prohibited whether the white hair grows due to old age or any type of illness or abnormality. Under all circumstances it is not permissible. This is substantiated by the following Hadeeth: Hazrat Jaabir radhiallahu anhu reports that the day the conquest of Makkah took place, Abu Kuhaafah radhiallahu anhu was brought into the presence of Rasulullah sallallahu alaihi wasallam. His hair and beard was extremely white. Rasulullah sallallahu alaihi wasallam said: “Change this (i.e. the whiteness) with something, but abstain from using black (dye).” (Sunan Abu Dawood vol.2 pg.222) Therefore, Mufti Abdur Raheem Lajpuri damatbarakatuh states in an answer to the very same question you have posed that it is a great sin to dye the hair black. (Fataawa Rahimiyah vol.6 pg.290) Imaam Nawawi rahmatullahi alaih says that it is Makroohe Tahrimi. (See Awnul Ma’bood- commentary of Abu Dawood vol.4 pg.139).However, if a person wants to dye his hair he may do so by using Mehendi or a plant called katam.
Dressing-Appearance
333
Noo*** asks:

Question

Can we trust Halaal Certificates issued by Jummah Masjid?

Answer

We are unable to reply as we don't know their halal standard and their criteria to issue a halal certificate as yet.

Ann*** asks:

Answer

Oui , Dada/nana zot frère li mahram, mais beau-père so frère pas mahram.
Nikah
335
a unknown asks

Question

Assalaamu alaikum. Is it permissible for a person to sell goods which are not in his possession at the time of sale? Jazaakumullahu khairan

Answer

It is not permissible to sell goods that haven’t come into one’s physical possession. However those things which are immovable i.e. land, house, garden, farm, well etc there is no need for a physical possession to take place due to the fact that it is very rare for immovable assets to be destroyed in a short term, therefore they will enter into the constructive possession and the liability of the buyer by merely purchasing them.As for movable items i.e. goods, cars, furniture etc they will not enter into the liability of a person by merely purchasing them, therefore it necessitates physical possession since there is a possibility of them being destroyed before delivery takes place.Thus if anyone sells a movable item which is not in his possession as yet then this transaction is cancelled due to the fact that if that item happens to get destroyed then the first transaction is void. Once the first transaction is void (because of the destruction that occurred in the item of the first transaction) then the second transaction will automatically be cancelled since it is based on the first transaction.

Question

Assalaamu alaikum. Is it permissible for a person to sell goods which are not in his possession at the time of sale? Jazaakumullahu khairan

Answer

It is not permissible to sell goods that haven’t come into one’s physical possession. However those things which are immovable i.e. land, house, garden, farm, well etc there is no need for a physical possession to take place due to the fact that it is very rare for immovable assets to be destroyed in a short term, therefore they will enter into the constructive possession and the liability of the buyer by merely purchasing them.As for movable items i.e. goods, cars, furniture etc they will not enter into the liability of a person by merely purchasing them, therefore it necessitates physical possession since there is a possibility of them being destroyed before delivery takes place.Thus if anyone sells a movable item which is not in his possession as yet then this transaction is cancelled due to the fact that if that item happens to get destroyed then the first transaction is void. Once the first transaction is void (because of the destruction that occurred in the item of the first transaction) then the second transaction will automatically be cancelled since it is based on the first transaction.
Financial Transaction
336
moh*** asks:

Question

aslm, is it a minor or major sin to commit an act of makrouh tahrimi.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Sin means to disobey Allah. In this context there would be no minor or major sin. However in gravity one may be minor in comparison to another one. Therefore a makrooh tahreemi act may be minor in comparison to haraam and if it is done persistently it becomes haraam. Technically speaking makrooh tahreemi in itself is forbidden as well, although to a lesser degree than haraam.
Sins
337
ann*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum. Concernant habillement , eski linge rouge interdit pu banner missiers?? (Uniform LA ce ene chemise rouge ek pantalon noire)jazakallah.

Answer

wa alaikumus salaam. En principe pure rouge li makrouh, c'est–à-dire li déconseillé et dégoutant. En Cas oblige capave mette li ziska gagne ene l'autre alternatif cote pas bizin mette li.

Ann*** asks:

Question

Aslmkm si mo aster ene kitsoz cash a ene prix mais credit a ene diferent prix eski li l'intérêt? Ex. Mone guet ene moto rs25,000 mais mo dire li mo pou prend li lor credit lerla line dire si credit so prix changer li pou rs30,000, eski li correct sa transaction la? Jzklh

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. En principe li correcte, pourvu pas fine fixé 2 prix a la fois. L’acquéreur et revendeur zotte bizin fini tombe d'accord lor ene seul prix avant séparation. Et ene fois fine fixé pas capave augmente prix la akoz retard dans payée.

Aslm.si 1 dimune line rev sura wad duha et 1 explication ki p dire ki Allah p dire coumence fer li lerla dimune la so someil ine casse ti 6hr du matin.ler li sorte dehors ti ena 1 groupe corbo lahaut so lacaze p ale et vini pendan 10 minute...p fer tapaz.et pa habituer ena corbo.ou cpv die moi ki sa veu dire. Dream
343

Question

ASLM chewing gum Mentos Eski li halaal?

Confectioneries
344

Question

Slm I want to know that the tablighi jamaat activity, if we do it within the Shar'ee limits then will it become fardh, sunnah or mustahab to do it?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. To propagate something which is fardh or waajib or sunnah or mustahab to those who are unaware of it, is respectively fardh, waajib, sunnah or mustahab. For example if the propagator is the only one who is concerned by propagating a fardh, then it is fardh a'in upon him. Meaning that if the propagator is the only person who is in the position to carry out this task of propagation and besides him there is no one else who has the ability to do it then it will be compulsory upon him to carry it out , and if he leaves it out he will be considered as someone who has neglected his responsibilities and he will be accountable for that in the sight of Shariah. But if there are other people who can also do it then it will be a means of dispensation for the others. In this context it will be Fardh alal kifaayah. Same ruling applies to Waajib, Sunnah and Mustahab.
Dawah-Tabligh
345
Ann*** asks:

Question

Has Rasoulullah(SAW) observe i'tikaaf in the whole month of Ramadwaan? Can you clarify please ! Jazaakallah!

Answer

Hazrat Abu Saeed Al-Khudri (Radhiyallahu Anhu) Narrates that Rasulullah (Salallahu Alaihi Wasallam) would perform i’tikaaf of the first ten days of Ramadhan, then he would perform i’ttikaaf of the second ten days in a Turkish tent, then he would take his head out (of the tent) and say “I performed i’tikaaf of the first ten days looking for this night (lailat-ul-Qadr), then I performed i’tikaaf of the second ten nights, then someone came to me, so then I was told that it is in the last ten nights.......(Muslim)” (Mishkaat Shareef Vol 1 Page 182) It is mention in Bukhari Shareef as well (Chapter: Performing sajdah on mud). In this hadith it is proven that Nabi (s.a.w) performed i'tikaaf for the whole month in that particular year.
I'tikaaf
346
Muh*** asks:

Question

Mo Fine fini avoy zotte ene photo de sa duah de itikaaf nafil la lor: jamiat@intnet.mu Mo p atane ene reponse de zotte part!

Answer

Nous reconfirmé ki nous pas fine trouve sa dua la dans Sharh Muslim de Imaam An-Nawawi (Rahmatullahi Alaih). li paraite ki ou fine tire sa depuis ene l'autre livre. Au contraire dans ene place Allama Nawawi (Rahmatullahi Alaih) fine écrire ki "Pena aukene zikr spéciale ni ene lot action appart reste dans masjid avec l'intention I'tikaaf. (Sharh Muslim de An-Nawaawi Vol.1 - Pg 371). Si ou fine gagne sa dans ene lot livre contacté auteur de sa livre la pou gagne éclaircissement. Sinon ou kapave contacté lor 2400439.
I'tikaaf

ano*** asks:

aslm.si 1 mama li rev so garson ki fek mort en realiter. dans rev la li rever ki li p guete so garson p fer wudhu li p lave so lipied dans so lacaz mem, mama la ek 1 lot famille p guete li zot p cozer.sil vou plait.ou cpv dire moi ki veu dire sa et fer 2 eme foi li rev sa mem famille la dan rev ki ena so garson ensam. merci

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Wudhu c'est ene signe de propreté et ene moyen pou pêché effacé. Nous ena l'espoir ki Allah Ta'aala fine gracier li.

asslm, What are the rulings on women wearing gloves??

Dressing-Appearance
349
zya***@hotmail.com asks:

Question

asslm...ki mouthwash ki kapav servi ...ki brand halaal?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. La plupart banne mouthwash (bains de bouche) zot contenir ene dose éthanol (alcool) bien fort. Ena concession pour servi sa banne mouthwash (a base lalcool la) si servi zot pour hygiène oral (Sans consomme zot) ou bien si banne mouthwash sans lalcool pas assé efficaces pour faire sa traitement médicale la ou bien zot pas disponibles.
Medical Products
350

Question

Aslmkm Mo fine lire sa dans ene livre. Eski li ene pratique ki fine prouver et eski nou capave pratique li? < li fine repete pareil et li fine embrasse so le doigt (l'index) et li fine passe lors so deux les yeux, Rasoulullah (Sallallahu Alaihi Wa Sallam) fine dire celui ki pour faire pareil comment mo camarade (Khalil), alors mo intercessions (Shafa'at) approuvable pourr li. [Al-Maqaasidul Hasanah No.1021] Base lors l'amour, Sayyiduna Sinaan fine deja boire du sang Rasoulullah (Sallallahu Alaihi Wa Sallam), alors ici qui faire besoin discuter qui embrasse pouce gagne droit ou bien non?>> Jazakallahu Khaira

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahamatullahi wabarakaatuh. La pratique pou embrasse le doigt quand tanne Rassouloullah (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) so nom dans azaan, jamais ti dans la pratique de banne Sahaba-e-Kiraam et banne Tabeines. Ena banne livres ki fine rapporte hadice lors ça sujet-là mais ça banne hadice-là zotte pas authentique. Zotte banne hadice ki bien bien faible. Zotte tellement faible ki pas capave servi zotte comme ene preuve et ene base pou soutenir ça pratique-là. Allaamah Jalaaluddeen As-Souyouti (R) fine qualifié ça banne hadices-là de banne hadices fabriqués. Donc embrasse le doigt quand tanne Rassouloullah (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) so nom li pas sounnat ni moustahab. Dans so livre ‘Abrul Maqaal’ Maulana Ahmad Raza Khan Barelvi fine autorise la pratique embrasse le doigt quand tanne nom moubaarak de Rassouloullah (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) dans azaan avec 4 conditions : (1) Premièrement faudré pas considère ça comme ene sounnat. (2) Deuxièmement faudré pas croire ki ena kit hadice authentique ki soutenir ça pratique-là. (3)Troisièmement faudré pas critique banne ki pas pé faire li.(4) Quatrièmement servi li comme ene traitement pou lizié (pas comme ene principe dans Deen). La vérité li pas plis ki ça mais malheureusement la pratique « embrasse le doigt » et « pas embrasse le doigt» fine divise la communauté. Et pourtant tout d’accord ki pena narien authentique ki soutenir ça. Mais nou fine donne ça pratique-là l’importance à tel point ki ça fine vine symbole de certaine groupe. Li couma ene tempête dans ene verre de l’eau. L’amitié sincère pou Allah Ta’ala li trouve dans suive Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) Si vraiment ou content ou la vie dans aakhirat, ou pou bizin préparé pou capave sacrifié quelque part dans ou dounia.
Bidati
351
Ann*** asks:

Question

Is Maynard Jellies of Beacon from South Africa Halal?

Answer

The following is a reply from the South African National Halal Authority (SANHA):

The said product is NOT approved by SANHA as it contains gelatine derived from non-Halaal slaughtered animals.Regarding Bovine gelatine, some Ulama contend that a drastic metamorphic change occurs in the non-Halaal animal material used in gelatine manufacture thereby rendering the impure collagenous protein into Halaal gelatine.

Majority of the Ulama and International Halaal certification bodies are of the view that such metamorphic change does NOT occur and therefore they do not accept this view and have adopted a very holistic position on gelatine and other such ingredients of non-Halaal animal origin used in food production.

SANHA's Theological Committee holds the latter view and we reiterate that it is not acceptable to use non-Halaal raw material in the manufacture of food products due to the fact that abundance of Halaal raw material is available and Muslims should not look for technical loopholes (metamorphosis etc.) to legitimize the use of raw materials sourced from Haraam animals in food production.

Therefore SANHA recommends that all products containing non-Halaal gelatine be avoided.Jazaakumullahu khairan

Confectioneries
352

Question

Aslmkm wr wb Eski copyright li permette d'après Islaam? Ki so preuve? Mone déjà tanne ene personne dans deen et ena l'éducation deen dire ki li pas permette.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. D'après nous banne Ulama e Kiraam couma Maulana Ashraf Ali Thanwi (a.r) et Mufti Mohammad Shafee' (a.r) li pas ene droit ki kapave acheté vendé. Si ou envie plis renseignement ena ene livre en anglais ki disponible, nous kapave envoye ou ene copie de sa. S.V.P Contacté nous lor 2400439 (Office Hours) ou bien mail nous ou l'adresse lor jamiat@intnet.mu / jamiathalal@myt.mu. Jazaakumullahu khairan
Miscellaneous
354
ano*** asks:

Question

aslm.si mo pa suivre 1 de sa 4 imam la est ki mo ene gunegaar?base lor 1 example hanafee mazhab dire ki crab li haraam et shafeeri li pa haram....quand ou consome kitchose haram ou p fer guna.b mo pa compren.kot ine mentionner clairement ki bizin suivre zot

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Ene dimoune ki pas suivre ene parmi sa 4 mazhab la automatiquement li pou alle joué avec deen. C'est a dire li pe ouvert ene la porte pou suivre so nafs (désire) et suivre nafs li haraam d'après Quraan. Faire négligence de ene kitsoz ki pou débouche vers ene kitsoz pareil aussi li pou haraam.
Taqleed-Mazhab

356
ano*** asks:

Question

Aslm.ki difference ena entre un kutba creole(ki ena certain masjid pratiquer) ou kutba en arabe?ki hadice ki dire ki bizin fer en arabe?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Depuis tous le temps khutbah ti en langue arabe, Donc bizin garde li couma li ti été. Akoze sa pas bizin gagne ene hadith ki dire bizin faire li en arabe. Au contraire banne ki faire li en créole ki bizin amene preuve ki dire kapave faire li en créole. Pou ou l'information ene sahabi ti traite ene personne de Khabees ki signifié "malpropre" et cela zisse akoze ki li ti pe assizé pou faire khutbah.
Jummah

Financial Transaction
359
Adi*** asks:

Question

Someone asked me how to perform Salat Qaza Umri ??.. i told him to perfom awabeen, as i have no idea on the other one anyone can show me the way to this salat pls thanks

Answer

Qaza Umri means to replace all the salaat missed in the past. It is a debt on the one who missed it. Therefore it should be replaced in order to discharge the obligation of salaat. How to replace it ? Firstly, one should get an estimate amount of salaat missed, then whilst performing it, one should specify the exact date and year of that salaat he is replacing. For example " I am replacing the salaat of 01-jan-2013 etc. If they are too much and he is unable to remember, then it would be suffice if every time he just mention " I am replacing the first fajr salaat i missed " or he may also say " I am replacing the last fajr salaat i missed". In this way he may replace all his missed salaat.
Qazaa
360
zya*** asks:

Question

Wa alaikumus salaam ..Ena bane place ecrire ki destiny ecrire dans lanuit de 15eme shabaan et ena dir lanuit de laylatulqabr ....which one is authentique? can we get some details on this?

Answer

Assalaamu alaikum warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. The night of Destiny is Lailatul Qadr, this is clearly understood from the text of the Quraan Kareem. There are some other views as well which tell us that it starts from the 15th of Sha'baan and ends in Lailatul Qadr.
Aqeedah
361
zya*** asks:

Question

assalamualaikum ....ki difference ena avec destiny ki Allah fine ecrire avant we were born et destiny ecrire dans le 15em shabaan ou laylatulqadr?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam.... In the night of destiny the angels are being informed regarding their responsibilities for the whole year, however the destiny itself is already written well before the child is born. According to some , when the child is four month old in his mother's womb and this is with regard to his entire life.
Aqeedah

Non pas kapave. Faire li ene l'autre place. Parceki sa li capave avec passage le temps diminué l'importance de sa premier jamaat officielle ki fine ena.

zya*** asks:

Question

assalamualaikum ......Ena banne imaam aprer chaque leur namaz farz zot fer dua ,aster ena fer fort et ena doucement net ki ou pas tane zotte ,ki le vrai facon de fer le dua?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Apres namaz faraz ena dua. Sa dua la li hautement recommandé, au contraire d'après hadice sa ce ene de banne moment pli propice pou dus accepté. Mais en principe dua bizin faire a voix basse et individuellement. Si imaam la parfois li lire ene de banne dua ene ti peu fort avec l'intention pour enseigne banne mussalli alors sa kitsoz la li tolérable. Mais sa pratique cote imaam lire fort et banne mussalli dire ameen fort sa pas existé.

Ann*** asks:

Question

Assalamu alaikoum wa rahmatoullahi wa barakaatuh si ene dimoune passe côte ene place ki pé brûle kitchose et li fine alle respire la fumé, eski so roza cassé?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Si li respire li intentionnellement so roza pou cassé. Mais si la fumé fine rentre par li même li pas pou cassé.

Question

Aslmkm Ene personne ki fine gagne zisse 2 dernier rakaat taraaweeh avec jamaat bizin faire witr avec imam lerla remplace so taraaweeh ou bien li faire so taraaweeh avant lerla faire witr tousel? Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. li faire witr derrière imaam avec jamaat après sa li remplace so banne rakaat taraaweeh ki li fine manqué. Pena pou re faire witr après sa.

Ann*** asks:

Question

Aslm Ene personne ki fine casse plusieurs roza sans kit raison valable eski li pou bizin garde 60 Roza pou chaque ene Roza? Ki li bizin faire si li ena trop meme beaucoup et li pas capave garder?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Ene seul Kaffarah de soixante roza li suffit, mais si jamais après avoir faire kaffaarah li fine re casse ene roza alors li bizin garde soixante roza de nouveau.

Question

Assalamualaikum ...is it a shart (condition) that a hafiz reading tarawee in a specific place should read esha at the same place?Is it okey if he reads his esha somewhere else and tarawee somewhere else?

Answer

No it is not a shart. It is rather permissible to read esha elsewhere but should be in congregation.

mcc***@ asks:

Question

Salaam Mufti. i know that home loan is not allowed due Riba which is haram. But in the context of no Islamic banking in Mauritius, and also to prevent myself to be conflict with other members of family, i had to take a loan to construct a house. I am in all means and ways trying to settle it off? what do you advice in such. Thanks

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. We advise you to settle it off as soon as possible to avoid further conflict with shariat. In the same way we won't advise you to contract any dealings implying Riba as it is highly nefarious to deen and imaan.

381
mcc***@ asks:

Question

Salaam Mufti.. I had been victim of Internet Hacking and it involves negligence of a Uk bank in it. I have through Mauritius and UK solicitors seek answers with the concerned Bank, but its been more than a one and half years, bank still not respond. I am requested to take legal action via court against bank.. in doing so, if i won the case, i will be entitled to compensation over lost of business (not worked for 8 months), moral and stress damages caused. etc.. all legal things that can be claimed.. Is that Halal or Haram to sue a bank? it concerns a lost of Business worth Millions. salaam

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. You have the right to sue the bank. In case you win and compensated you will be entitled only to money you spent in suing the bank and not for any intangible loss, damages or expected advantages.
Financial Transaction

Muh*** asks:

385
Ann*** asks:

Question

eski ene seule dimoune capave recevoir plusieur dimounes zotte Zakaat ou bien Fitra?

Answer

Oui tanque ki li pas accumulé ziska ki li vine valeur nisaab. (Valeur nisaab li Rs 30.000 pou Ramadhaan 1436 / 2015). A noter ki sa nisaab la li pas nécessaire ki li en forme la monnaie liquide. Si li ena dans so possession banne objets ki plisse ki so besoin ki évalué ene dans l'autre ensame avec so la monnaie liquide et li arrive la valeur Rs 30.000, alors dans sa cas la aussi li pas gagne droit prend zakaat. Non seulement li pos gagne droit dimandé, même si kikene donne li sans dimandé aussi li pas gagne droit prend.
Zakaat
386

391

Question

Assalamu alaikoum wa rahmatoullahi wa barakaatuh Eski ena kit hadith ki avoy malédiction lors ene celui ki pas fine gagne pardon Allah dans Ramadwaan? Ou capave mentionne hadith là entier avec so référence et authenticité?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Nous nous pas gagne droit avoye malédiction. Hadice la neque li dire ki Malheur lor ene celui ki li gagne le mois de Ramadhaan mais li pas comporte li dans ene façon ki kapave faire li être gracié.
Ramadhaan

fad*** asks:

Question

Assalamoualaikoum There is a medecin named 'Eau de Melisse des carmes'. It is for stress, fatigue, digestions issues etc. But it is also written on it that it contains 80 % alcohol. I am confused to which alcohol is this referring to. I have cross checked it on the internet but i have no clarification on this. Can you please let me know if it is halal and which can actually use this. It is for my mom and she wants to use this during the ramadan. Awaiting your fastest response please. Jazakallah. Fadil.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. We would not know which alcohol they referring to. Please send us manufacturer's contact details to contact them. As a principle we should abstain from all product containing alcohol unless it is indispensable with no alternatives. Jazaakumullahu khairaa
Medical Products

Ann*** asks:

Question

Aslm... si dans masjid kot moi jour jumma imam la fair khutba en créole eski mo kapav fair jumma ou soi mo bizin fair zohr si mo pa kapav ale ene lot masjid?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Alle faire namaz dans ene l'autre masjid.
Jummah

402
Moh*** asks:

Question

Dua collectif apres taraweeh et Witr nabil asks: Question Aslm mo ene habitant de l'est.Ene mawlana ine vine lire tarawi kot nu c'est la premier fois ki line vini.Apres tarawi li faire dua et kand witr fini la osi li faire dua.C'est ene kitchose ki jamais nu fine trouver.Eski li correct sa? Chaque lanee ene nouvo mawlana vine lire tarawi alors ena ene nouvo kitchose ki zot faire et malheureusement nou pena ene imaam pu guide nou.plz advise. JAZAKALLAH Answer En principe pena aukene dua ni après taraaweeh ni après witr. Celui ki envie li kapave faire so dua individuellement. (ki ou p mean par'en principe pena....')?

Answer

Pena aukene source dans Shariat ki prouve sa.

Ann*** asks:

Question

ASLM... Mufti Saab dan nu lendroit ena ban tawheed fin ouvert ene masjid ek astere pou eid zot pou fair namaz dan eidgaah cote capav ban madame tou pu vini alor etant donné ki pou ena eidgah astere eski nu si nu bizin fair namaz eid labas meme ou nu capav fair dan nu masjid. Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Faire namaz dans eidgah li sunnat et grossir la foule banne ki pas lor la verité li haraam. pas capave comette haraam pou mette en pratique ene sunnat. Donc faire ou namaz eid dans ou masjid.

moh*** asks:

Question

a person bought a vehicle from a company. He has not receive the car till now. how will he calculate his zakat?

Answer

There is no zakaat on the money paid nor on the vehicle if it is for personal use.
Zakaat
406
moh*** asks:

Question

a person passed away and he has 2 or more wifes. what is the share of each one.

Answer

If the deceased person has left behind him children, the wives will share one eight of the whole estate. And in the absence of children they will share one quarter in common.
Inheritance

Un *** asks:

Question

Following a dispute with his wife due to an illegal mobile relationship with another woman, the wife took control of everything at her home. Her husband's money is in her hand, that is bank card, id card etc. However, the husband has a debt towards an Islamic Institution, but he cannot have access to his money nor can he tell his wife about it, bcz the latter will think that he will give the money to other women etc. this is continuing since more than a year. In light of the above, can the husband take zakaat money to return tothe Islamic Institution. Please send reply to abse8768@hotmail.com. JazakAllah.

Answer

No. He can't do it. He has to take his responsibilities in his house as a husband, as well as to be obedient to Allah in all matters.
Zakaat

Ann*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum... Im in purdah alhamdulillah... however when i got married i insisted for purdah between oposite sex... my parents agreed though they did not like it because of society issues... even my husband was for the purdah however his family was against it... when they discuss it with my parents even my parents became against it.... i tried hard to convince then but to prevent family conflicts i had to give up... lhr manger pa ti ena separation but alhmdulillah i wasnt there mai still ti ene mix gathering ek during receptionn i was there mai par lord Allah pa ti ena boku missier present ek zot ti alarier net... m ti met m purdah... mai is it good??? Eski m in fer kit gunnah??? Koz m misie ti monte lor 'cobar' ki moi ek li nu pas ti like sa dutou mai only to avoid family issues. I knw pena obeissance dan desobeissance Allah mai still i obeyed them...

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam... Make tawbah and Istighfaar. Allah ta'ala is ghaffaar. And take a firm resolution that in the future you are not going to be influenced by any person in the matter of deen. Allah is with you.
Akhlaaq-Tasawwuf
410
zaa*** asks:

Question

Is it permissible to use perfumes containing alcohol of denat? Is candia skimmed milk halal?

Answer

(1) There is a stage which is known as istihaalah whilst processing a substance. Istihaalah means the complete transformation of something from one nature to another. Maybe the denat is an abbreviation of denature, which more or less can be taken to mean this stage of istihaalah (Transformation). If something which is impure is transformed into something which is pure, then it will be considered as pure. Just like a donkey that happen to fall in a mine of salty water and happen to transform into salt. In this case the salt will be pure and halaal. This is a technical explanation. So if the perfume containing alcohol has gone through such process then it will be pure and halaal. However we advise people to abstain from such doubtful products as far as possible specially when it is not indispensable. (2) As far as Candia Skimmed Milk is concerned we are presently in communication with the concerned company. The outcome will shortly released.
Dairy-Egg Products
411
Ann*** asks:

Question

Aslm ou kpve conseil moi apropo century bank? Suposser islamic banking sa Apres ena vacancy laba.. Eski kpve apply ousa non? Jzk

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Nous pas conne façon li opéré. Ziska preuve du contraire nous pou déconseille ou alle la bas.
Financial Transaction

mrs*** asks:

Question

assalamoalaikum is colouring E163 permissible to consume? it is found in the product "coulis de fraise" .the brand is dia and made in portugal?jazakalla khair may allah reward u for guiding us

Answer

This E-Number is doubtful. Alcohol may be used in its process.
Sauces-Creams
413
Ann*** asks:

Question

Assalamu alaikoum wa rahmatoullahi wa barakaatuh I saw this hadith on the net. Can you explain it to me please: Hazrat Ali (R.A) then narrated as follows. I heard Prophet (S.A.W) as saying that as the Day of Qiyaamah approaches there will appear a group of youths with a low mental capacity and understanding, apparently they will talk good but their Imaan will not go beyond their throat and they will leave the true Deen like an arrow leaves the bow. Wherever you find them, you should make Jihaad with them. (Bukhaari)

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. According to some Scholars this hadith is talking about the Khawaarij. It is a deviated sect which appeared in the time of Hazrat Ali (Radhiyallahu anhu) with unbalanced way of practicing Islaam. Their main feature is to vilify our ancestors specially the Sahabah (Radhiyallaahu anhum) and they declare Muslim as Non-Muslim. They appear to be good Muslim by their outlook, but in fact they are not. They have nothing to do with Islam just as an arrow bears no trace of the arc once gone out.
Bidati
414

Aslm.eski candy up de candia cpv boire?li vine dan brik 1lt et petit osi ena differen flavour.almond etc...

Dairy-Egg Products
415
moh*** asks:

Question

Aslm, for those people who work in company to install parabol etc, is their salary halal?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Normally when something can be used in different ways, both in Halal and Haraam, so installing and repairing of such device can be tolerated to certain extent, unless it is used predominantly in Haraam ways. As far as parabol is concerned, in our opinion it is installed widely for activities not conforming to Shariah. So in the light of the above we advise you to abstain. However you may query again if you have any important information which did not mention or perhaps we may be not aware of.
Financial Transaction
416
zya*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum ...pendant ramadan ena masjid dernier 10jour zot pou fer ene namaz ki apel Shabina? cest quoi namaz Shabina? eclairecissement lor la slvp.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam .... Shabeenah normalement li signifié lire ene Quraan entier dans namaz nafil dans le mois Ramadhaan. Namaz nafil avec jamaat li tolérable si li ene jamaat de deux dimoune apart imaam. Si ena trois alors li controversable ena dire capave ena dire pas capave, mais li makrooh si ena plis ki sa d'après nous banne Ulama.
Sounnah-Nafl
417
zya***@hotmail.com asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum is fitra compulsory or is a sunnat or nafil? and what if a family which consist of 5 people wasnt aware of fitra and aftr 20 years they find out that we should give ..so whats the hukm? must they make qadhaa for the 20 years?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam... Sadaqatul Fitr is waajib. Waajib means a degree of obligation which is higher than Sunnah Muakkadah and somehow below farz. If it was not given in the past, it should be estimated and given to the poor.
Zakaat

if someone is committing sin (major sin) like fornification he/ she wants to stop but he/ she's not being able to do so, even when the latter is doing its best to do good deeds ( doing all his salat and even doing salat ul taubah) he/she cant stop. Please give a solution concerning this matter

Answer

He / She should make sincere tawbah continuously

Menstruation
420
muh*** asks:

Question

assalamoualaikum. eski li permissible pou taille cheveu deux longueur?eski ena kit preuve dan quran ou hadith lor la?svp mo ti capav gagne ene reponse detaille.jazakallah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Nabi (s.a.w) ti ena trois façon ki li ti pe garde cheveux. Ene-la appelle Wafrah ki ti pe batte cote la moitié zoreille. Et ena encore deux ki appelle Jimmah et Limmah, ene la dans ti ziska boute zoreille et l'autre la cote z’eppaule respectivement. (Shamaail- Tirmizi). Nabi (sallallaahu alaihi wassallam) fine approuve raze cheveux aussi. En principe nous pas gagne droit modifié aukene parti dans nous le corps excepté cote ena preuve. Taille deux longueur pena preuve. Banne ki dire sa, bizin amène preuve pou prouve li.
Dressing-Appearance

ano*** asks:

Question

si 1 tifi avk 1 garson contan , tifi la envi fer nikkah mais garson la pas senti li pre. tous les 2 decide pu fer namaz istekhara, tifi fer bon rev mais garson la res fer cauchemar. zot tou le 2 envi aret fer zina mais zot pas envi separe, ki zot supose fer?

Answer

Tifi la bizin mette so famille au courant et li alle de l'avant avec nikaah. Si garçon la pas d'accord alors vaut mieux li discontinué.

Question

Assalaamoualaikum Swiss arabian perfume brand sprays from dubai contain alcohol denat.can they be used? Jazaakallah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. There is a stage which is known as istihaalah whilst processing a substance. Istihaalah means the complete transformation of something from one nature to another. Maybe the denat is an abbreviation of denature, which more or less can be taken to mean this stage of istihaalah (Transformation). If something which is impure is transformed into something which is pure, then it will be considered as pure. Just like a donkey that happen to fall in a mine of salty water and happen to transform into salt. In this case the salt will be pure and halaal. This is a technical explanation. So if the perfume containing alcohol has gone through such process then it will be pure and halaal. However we advise people to abstain from such doubtful products as far as possible specially when it is not indispensable.

423
ani*** asks:

Question

Assalaamoualaikum. I have an yves rochers edt"mure sauvage"plaisir nature which contains:alcohol denat,aqua water rubus fructicosus (blackberry fruit extract),limonene,ethylhexyl methoxycinnamate, butyl methoxydibenzoyl,ethylhexyl salicyclate,linalool,propylene glycol,geraniol,citral,CI172000(red33)CI14700 (red4)CI42090 (blue1). Can I use this edt? Jazaakallah.

Answer

Cosmetics
424
yak*** asks:

Question

Aslm. What is the right view of the hanafi deobandi ulama regarding moon issues? Some people say we should follow any place where the moon has been sighted first in the world to commence and end our islamic month. Is this the right way?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. A month starts and terminates by the sighting of the moon. The sighting of the moon should be established by Shar'ee evidence. A sighting established anywhere in the world on the basis of Shar'ee evidence can be considered and implemented in other places where it reaches through a reliable means. For example two reliable persons coming from a particular place give testimony of their sighting to the hilaal committee of other place, or two reliable persons could be sent officially by the hilaal committee of that place where it was sighted to give its testimony to other place.
The crescent
425

Is it allowed for a husband to finger his wife?

Answer

Yes.

Mai now li frekant lafami ek m dadi ossi estime li pareil kuma so bne lezot zenfan. Pour eid ossi li pu come ek li fr va et vien souvent. 429

Question

slm... if my father or my husband works in a bank where they deal with interest money etc. is the salary he receives halaal? the groceries he brings home everyday is it halaal? can I cook, eat and feed my children the food he brings home?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. According to Shariah it is your father (in case you are at your father's house) or your husband (in case you are married husband) who is responsible for your living. Given that you have no other means, according to Shariah you may prepare and consume as well.

( it could be surah Muzamil or surah Hadid or something like " Lillah hi ma fissama wati".. but i said after that i can ready surah waaqiah in full by heart no problem.. then the my friend malauna told me that i lead the salaat and at the time he said he will let me lead a main salaat with the reading of the surah.. i did not see myself leading.. but i see me and wife in a masjid whereby suddenly the same selected few people rush in in panick.. it was not a prayer time, but i could hear see and hear something like " THE MAHDI has Appeared".. so i rush for forgiveness in crying, and thought i am being told why.. i said even if Allah has forgive us, we could not loose a chance to ask for more forgiveness due as the Mahdi has appeared, time is very limited and door of taubah to be closed too soon".. i woke up in that state of mind, made tahajjud, read quran till fajr and went to fajr.. 436
yus*** asks:

Question

Aslm. Eski li permissible pou ene madame pren nom so missier couma quand faire marriage civil?

Answer

Normalement ene madame li bizin attribué et reconnaitre lor nom so papa biologique. Cependant ena certaine banne cas cote li nécessaire faire mariage civil. Par exemple pour le besoin de nationalité ou bien résidence etc. Dans sa cas la ene madame capave prend nom so missier et li pou signifié madame de la famille intel. Sa quantité la li pou tolérable. A noter ki ene kitsoz ki li tolérable en cas de nécessité bizin evité tanque possible.
Nikah

Outlets-Restaurants
442
rou***@gmail.c asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum.. Are "trip,royons..le coeur..poumons...".."carii endan dan boeuf"..makrooh or haraam.. Please advise.. Jazakallah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. All parts mentioned are permissible. However according to the Hanafi School of thought, there are seven things from a Halal and lawfully-slaughtered animal cannot be eaten. The first of these seven items has been emphatically forbidden by a decisive text of the Qur'an, hence it is unlawful (haraam) to consume it; whereas consuming the other six items is considered prohibitively disliked (makruh tahrimee), because there is no decisive text regarding their prohibition although their prohibitive dislike is proven through non decisive texts. (See: Bada'i al-Sana'i 5/61) The seven things are as follows: 1) Flowing Blood. 2) Penis. 3) Testicles. 4) Vulva (external parts of the female genitalia). 5) Glands. 6) Urinary bladder. 7) Gall-bladder
Meat-Poultry
443
Abu*** asks:

Question

Aslm. Eski dapres islaam li jaaiz pu ene Dimoune ecrire "no gift box" lor card marriage?

Answer

Wa alaikusmus salaam. Ene dimoune li ena droit pou évite banne problème. Si sa qualité cadeau la li pou embarrassant pou li, alors d'après Shariat li pou ena droit évite li par écrire sa.

Question

What is the ruling about congregational Dua after fardh salaat? Is is to be done loud or low voice?

Answer

It should be in low voice. In fact it is not a congregational doa. It is an individual one even it appears to be in jamaat.

mah*** asks:

Question

Aslkm mera sawal hii ki koi bewa aurat apne bacho ki shadi ki baad use Kisi se nikha kya aur kai mehno tak Unki mulaqat bhi ni huti us aurat ki bacho ko bina batae aab wo wafat ki idat kise guzare bina bacho ko malom huebare mahrbani Jaldi jawb dae jazakallha

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. matlab ye ke kissi awrat ne kissi se shadi ki oun ke bachon ko kuch maloum nahi. Aur wo aadmi jis se ous awrat ne shaadi ki ous ka intiqaal ho gaya. to is sourat mein ous awrat par iddat-e-wafaat ya'ni chaar maheené das din iddat guzaarna paregi. is arsa mein ous ko banaao singaar se parhez karna chaahiyé. agar zarourat ho to din mein nikal sakti hein lekin raat ko apne ghar waapas aajaana chaahiyé.

art***@hotmail.com asks:

Question

Assalam... Mufti saab....Mo ena ene ti problem....a chaque fois qui mo sorti toilet apre pipi....quelque gout sorti depui mo parti prive...souvent kmsamem li sorti...parfois pa kone quand li sorti...dans ene journee beaucoup fois li sorti par limem..parfois dans namaz mem li sorti...mo pena control.....sa fatig moi boku surtou pou fair namaz....m gagn doute chaque fois tension mo pena wazou quand mo pe alle fair namaz..mo peur tension mo wazu fini casser sans meme mo kone..... et mo pas kontent quitte oken namaz.... Please....Help me with some solution as i am afraid tension mo bann namaz...duah et tilawat quraan ki mo fair pa accepter.....please..... Jazaak Allah...!

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Dans sa cas la li ti pou pli meilleur si ou rentre en contact avek nous dans bureau ou bien call nou lor 2400439 / 57526981.
Impurity
451
Hay*** asks:

Question

Haydar Ally asks: Question Aslm i would like to know,is it bida'h to make duah after swalaat... Answer Not Bid'ah. It is recommended that everyone should do his own dua individually in low voice. I want proof and reference why individually in low voice and not loudly...

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. According to a hadith reported in Tirmizi Shareef: Dua made after farz namaz is highly expected to be accepted. This hadith proves that it is reccomended for everybody to make dua after farz namaz. Quraan kareem states that dua should be made discretely in low voice.
Daily
452
far*** asks:

Question

Assalam, Please tell me: Someone tell me that The Drink "Pepsi Cola" and "Coca Cola" contains 'pig' and it is not Halal?? Please tell me....

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. It is difficult to ascertain the facts mentioned by you. Yet we recommend people to abstain from doubtful products in an effort to protect our deen and Imaan.
Beverages

Hay*** asks:

Question

Haydar Ally asks: Question Haydar Ally asks: Question Aslm i would like to know,is it bida'h to make duah after swalaat... Answer Not Bid'ah. It is recommended that everyone should do his own dua individually in low voice. I want proof and reference why individually in low voice and not loudly... Answer Wa alaikumus salaam. According to a hadith reported in Tirmizi Shareef: Dua made after farz namaz is highly expected to be accepted. This hadith proves that it is reccomended for everybody to make dua after farz namaz. Quraan kareem states that dua should be made discretely in low voice. Ok....make duah with jamaat after farz swalaat is it correct..

Answer

By appearance it seems that the dua is being made with jamaat. But in reality everyone is doing his own dua and this is what we recommend.

Ahd*** asks:

Question

Salaam Mufti.. may Allah bless you and the organisation for the good work in progress.. i wanted to ask why in Mauritius we do not have the venue of lecturers to speak about Islam likewise: Mufti Menk, Billal Assad, Wajid Tarin etc. Also why we do not have persons like Khalid juhaim, Khalil Al Jibreen, Ziyad Patel, Mishary Al Afasy.. these people will really boost up the love of quran when hear them reading.. Always same people come each for the "so-called" special day event. Can Jum assist in that Salaam Adheel

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam . Alhamdulillah we do have people to help people like you. The main problem is that we people have no relationship and contact with our local Ulama physically. Otherwise our Ulama are as competent as the foreigners. You should bare in mind that we are also foreigners for the foreign countries and the people over there also think about their local Ulama as you think about yours.
Knowledge

Question

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. According to our findings it comes from Brazil. The Halal Logo displayed on the product is unknown. it cannot be endorsed, unless the certifying body is known and approved.
Meat-Poultry
458

Question

Assalaamu alaikum. I want an explanation regarding my marital life. I am very confused and I don’t know whether I am still in nikaah with my husband or not. Previously for certain reason I have asked my husband to issue me my talaaq. Initially he refused. Later on, when we had an argument due to his misbehaving attitude towards me as well as my other family members, I had to take this matter to the police as there were no other alternatives. When he came to know about it, he tried to blackmail me and even showed his interest in giving me talaaq on condition that I withdraw the case against him. The exact wording is “If you dismiss the case one talaaq baain apply for you”. I agreed to his conditional talaaq and some days later when I was going to remove the case he met me and told me that “You will not be able to remove the case completely; therefore the talaaq will not take place”. What he meant is although I am going to remove the case, but DPP will still sue him therefore the case will not be totally dismissed, that’s why the talaaq baain will not take effect. I did withdraw the case but had to put another case due to some problems. CID is still prosecuting him. Some month later, I contacted him in order to resume our marital life and that we should forget about everything in the pass. But he categorically refused me and even said that “I am no more his wife”. I almost begged him to come back but this was his reply on several occasions with several people as well. He also said that he gave me talaaq already and my iddat is also over. This is when I also found out that he was in love with someone else that’s why he did not want to come back. But recently he contacted me and wanted to reconcile. Now he is saying that according to the mufti my talaaq did not take place. Therefore I am still in his nikaah. My question is: Am I still in his nikaah or not? If I agree to reconcile, should I make nikaah again or not? Jazaakumullahu khairaa.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. After going thoroughly to your query, we are of opinion that you people call at our office to discuss the matter.
Talaaq

ASSALAAMOU'ALAIKOUM.. Is dua in congregation after nikah proven from Rasouloullah (s.a.w)? Some people say that it is not proven so we should not make congregational dua? What is the position of this issue as the public are confuse and somtimes create friction among the muslim community? Jazakumullah khair

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. In fact there is no dua with jamaat.

470

Question

Assalamu alaikoum eski gagne droit servi parfum ki ena alcohol? Li haraam sa? Mo fine déjà demande kikene zot dire dire éviter surtout dans l'heure namaaz si ena pou metté mette li 15-20 minutes avant. Zot dire ki alcohol la li pas resté quand fini pomp parfum la.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Ki nécessité ena pou servi banne parfum ki ena doute? Servi banne parfum ki perna sa. Rasoulullah (Sallallaahu alaihi wassallam) fine recommande nous pou reste loin avec banne kitsoz ki nous ena doute afin ki nous capave préserve nous deen et nous Imaan.

Question

Assalamualaikum-is it of any benefit to perform kurbani for people who have passed away?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Yes of course it is beneficial for the deceased person as well as for the person doing it in term of sawaab.

472
ahm***@ asks:

Question

Dans certain musjeed mo trouver qui beaucoup muswalis prand l'habitude faire 2 rakaata sunnah apràs faraz fajr. Est-ce qui sa li permissible.Jazak Allah Khair

Answer

D'après l'ordre sa deux rakaat ki zot faire après farz la c'est sa deux rakaat sunnah avant Fajr ki zotte fine manqué la sa. Ena divergence lors la. D'après Hanafi pas gagne droit remplace li toute suite après farz ziska avant soleil levé. Bizin faire li après soleil levé.
Qazaa

Answer

Muh*** asks:

Question

Is it permissible to eat biscuit, cakes, fruits…etc..which is bought by a kafir?

Answer

In these cases the product itself should be taken into consideration. A halal product will be halal even if it is bought by kaafir and a haraam product will not become halal although it might been bought by a Mufti.

Nikah
484

Question

Mo fine ariver realiser ki mo lamain poz lor mo genoux dan sajdah. Ossi bien ki possib mo eviter, mai li finne vine 1 labitid. Eski mo namaz li compter?

Answer

Si plat la main posé lor la terre veut dire sajdah la okay. Mais si avant bras ou bien coude pe pose lor genou alors sa li contre sunnah et li makrooh pou faire sa. En principe ene namaz ki faire dans ene façon makrooh bizin répété. Coumca même si pas fine pose plat la main en bas dans sajdah, alors malgré namaz la li compté mais bizin répète li pour répare le manquement ki fine ena dans néglige ene waajib.
Daily
485
ahm*** asks:

Question

Ena beaucoup dimoune ki possede richesse mais zote pas faire qurbani. Par contre ena beacoup dimoune qui pauve zote pe faier qurbani tous les anner. Est-ce qui dimoune qui pauvre la bizin donne so famille qui riche laviande qurbani?

Answer

Partage la viande Qourbani li pas waajib (obligatoire). C’est seulement ene recommandation. Alors li bon donne ene part a so banne famille riche ou pauvre tous les deux quand même zotte fine prend part ou bien pas fine prend part.

Outlets-Restaurants
488
usr*** asks:

Question

If a husband has divorce his wife thrice but they still live in same appartment but separately and if they want to reconcile does the wife need to do halala. Suppose they have lived separately during three years. It means they were not hus.wife all these years they are strangers. Cant they just be together by simply doing nikah. And what about if they were separate for ten years. Same applies then whether its one three or ten years. Why should the wife do halala when she was a stranger to her so called once husband. Thanks for your answer.

Answer

A couple can't reconcile and resume conjugal life after 3 talaaqs. The question of making nikaah does not arise. In case the wife gets married to another man and after consuming nikaah she happens to get separated by talaaq or by death, then after observing iddat she may get married to her ex-husband. Marrying another man before a woman can return to her ex husband is called halalah and it should happen in a natural way without any kind of arrangement. Arranging such nikaah amounts to invoke the curse of Allah upon oneself.
Nikah
489
eli*** asks:

Question

mo ti envi coner si nikah rekonet par la loi maurice svp.. question tres importan svp

Answer

A certaine niveau ene nikaah ki enregistré avec Muslim Family Council (MFC) li reconnait. Bizin contacter ene l'homme de loi pou gagne plis détails.
Nikah
490

Question

Slm mo suiv jamat. 1 bye dir moi ki partou dan quran Allah dir invit ver le bien ek empeche le mal selman ban jamat zot nek dir ki soi disant zot fer tou le 2 et en vérité zot pa empeche le mal et zot pa traite ban sujets ki Kpv cré dissension etc. jamais jamat lève conte shirk tou sa la. Et ceki ine touche moi cest li dir ki Ml Ilyas Sahb (R) dir fair to travail et pa trakaC avec lezot. Sa phrase la parait conte ceki nou p fair. Sa conversation la fine fair moi reflechi lor le point ki eski ceki mo p fair li bon ou non. Mo envi 1 éclaircissement ki Kpv soulage mo leker ki mo lors la vérité et eski couma nou p propage deen dan jamat li correct?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Jamaat li pe faire ene travail sans pretanne ki li pe faire tous travail. Nous pas capave impose lor jamaat pou faire tou travail. Ena certaine banne travail ki maktab pe faire, ena certaine banne travail ki Darul Uloom pe faire, et coumsa meme ena certaine banne travail ki khanqah pe faire etc. Impose lor jamaat ki li bizin faire tous travail li couma dire impose lor ene professeur ki pe enseigne quatrième pou faire cinquième ou bien sixième. Nous nous croire dans le principe ki dire division of labour. Alors travail ki ou pe faire au niveau jamaat li bon et ou continué faire li, ou dans la bonne voix. Si jamaat fine accès so zeffort lor Amr bil Ma'roof (ordonne le bien) c'est ene principe pédagogique ki li ena droit faire li.
Dawah-Tabligh
491
moh*** asks:

Question

aslm, pou ene couple mauritien et mauritienne par example, eski zot en droit faire marriage civil d'apres Shariat?

Answer

D'après principe pas gagne droit, excepté dans cas oblige ki pou bizin analyse chaque cas individuellement.
Nikah
492
Abd*** asks:

Question

aslm, what our moufti kiram say about videos and taking or sharing videos or anything similar?

Answer

It is not permissible to take photo of animate objects. Videos are included in this interdiction. So taking and sharing of such objects will not be permissible.

Question

Kuma pou fer tarbiyyat 1 tifi? Ziska ki lage pu avoy li lekol?Secondaire? HSC? Universite? Ena ban Alimah moris ki fine apran Sud Afrik. Eski kpv avoy li Sud Afrik pu fer Alimah?

Answer

Si ou tifi li enkore petit, bizin conné ki manière pou amene li actuellement. Li encore trop bonheur pou capave donne ou détails lor banne étape ki pou vini plitard, parceki réponse ki nous pou donné asterla li pas nécessaire ki li pou valable pou plitard quand banne contexte pou capave changé. Meilleur façon pou amène ene zenfant dans lakaz c'est ki mama papa la meme bizin dresse zotte la vie pour permette zenfant la vivre dans ene atmosphère islamique dans lakaz.
Tarbiyat

A*** asks:

Question

Can we give qurbani meat to poor non muslim people?? Ki duah kapav lire pour rembourse dettes au plus vite?? Can we help non muslim poor people?? What can we do to help the brothers and sisters in Palestine, Syria, Afghanistan...etc?? What duah can we ask for them??
500
ani*** asks:

Question

Assalaamoualaikum Can a woman perform salaat u'l eid in the house or must the salaat be performed in congregation for it to be valid? Hhkg5

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Eid salaat cannot be performed individually just as the case is in Salaatul Jumu'ah. It should be done with jamaat. A woman has nothing to do as salaat at home.
Eid
501
ani*** asks:

Question

I presently live in a middle east country where there's separate accommodation from the mosque for ladies to perform salaat. Can a lady perform eid salaat there?

Answer

No need to go there because it is not waajib upon her. She should perform her daily salaat at home which is most virtuous for her than emerging outside.
Eid
502
ani*** asks:

Question

Assalaamoualaikum Is the method of giving ghusl to a mayyit same as the other mazhabs? Will the ghusl of a female mayyit be valid if no camphor water is used and only plain water is used? And what if the bereaved family insist that no paste will be applied on the female mayyit 's forehead knees etc.? Will the ghusl and kafn be in conformity with the sharia?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Using camphor etc is only a recommendation that does not affect the validity of ghusl if in case it is omitted. As far as paste is concerned hadith mentioned something as Haanout which is a mixture of various kinds of perfumes to be applied on the head, beard and on the other parts of the body which are used to make sajdah. This also is a recommendation not a compulsion. Yet , it should be done and not be neglected without any valid reason, although ghusl will be valid without it as said earlier.
Janaazah
503

Question

Aslm 1. Eski gagne droit zoué card sans casse? 2. Dans l'école ena ene chapitre dans mathématiques appelle probabilité, la dans ensemble avec lezot kitchose zotte introduire card par exemple comié A ena comié J comié K et ki pli fort etc eski gagne droit apprendre sa?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. 1) Pas gagne droit zoué carte comme ene plaisir. 2) Sa deuxième kitsoz la li paraite ene zafer éducatif ki capave être considéré.
Sins
504

Question

Mo fine invite dan 1 khatam. Pa locasion 3, 10 ou 40 jours, mai possib lakoz li p fer manger avk laviand qurbani. Eski mo aler lire quran ek manger? Ou ziss lire quran? Ou ziss manger? Ou eviter?

Answer

Sa pratique réuni faire khatmul Quraan, manger boire li pas ti existé dans l’époque Nabi (s.a.w) et banne Sahabah kiraam. D'après masla invite dimoune pou lire après donne manger, sa pas gagne droit. Zordizour saki nous pe faire, li narien plis ki ene coutume. Chaque dimoune bizin faire so tilaawat dans so lakaz. Jour ki so Qouraan terminé li capave réunir so banne membre de la famille dans lakaz zotte faire duah. Donc évite banne invitation pareil.
Social life
505
Mus*** asks:

Question

Can we ask duah for Allah to punish israel for what they are doing to our muslim brothers and sisters in palestine? What duah can we ask for the muslims around the world who are suffering like in Syria, iraq, afghanistan etc...

Answer

Just make dua that Allah Ta'aala protect the muslim ummah all over the world from their enemies
Dua
506

Question

Assalam. M ene madam marrier ek m.vive ensemble r m belmer boper. Par lodre Allah zot correct mai beaucoup de fois m gagne banne ti dispute r zot concernant bne zafr lacuisine ek depense. M pa dire nanier mai sa fatigue.moi moralement. M nek ecouter ek m rest trankil. M pa rod dire sa m misier akoz m conner li contan so parents boku ek m respect li pu sa. M ti prefer rest ene coter mai zamai mne dir sa mo misier akoz mo kner li pu dofficile pu li en term largent ek ossi en term de so relationtion enver so parents. De fois so parent emdire li bizin met toi ene coter mai li pa pren sa seryer mai moi etant ene belfille m senti sa. Chak foi kan m belmer boper coz bne zafr pareil m pa kapav dire nanier ek akoz m pli abitier r m msier m ena tendance bouder avek li... par lordre Allah jamai sa in vinne grav mai m per pu le future. Aide moi ek dire moi ene solution kj shariat proposer. jazakAllah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Si ou trouvé ki li pas pou dérange ou missier alors koze ou problème are ou missier dans ene façon positif sans mette pression lor li. Nous ti a content ki ou donne nous ene deux l'exemple ki déclenche dispute avec ou beaux-parents.

Muh*** asks:

Question

What is the difference between Jinn and Shaytaan? Can we eat vegetarian food prepared by Hindus??

Answer

(1) The origin of shaitaan is jinn.The evil jinnaat are the followers of shaitaan. (2) In case where you are in need to to do it, you will be allowed to buy and eat at their premises. Whereas accepting invitation at their place / home should be discourage as it would be a means to open venues destructive to deen and imaan.
Miscellaneous
510

Question

Assalamualaikum wrbh. Souvent mo reve mo misie soidisant avec ene deuxieme madam. Ek madam dan rev la mo kner cki. Li ene bon tifi ek li dan deen tou. Ki kapav signifier sa rev la?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Capave ou rêve li akoze ou trop pense li. Sinon sa pas dire narien. Ou bien sa li capave ene message ki ou aussi bizin vine bon. Si ou déjà bon alors ou essaye pou vine plis bon.
Dream
511
noo*** asks:

Question

Assalamu Alaykum.w.w Quest: enn dimoune fine né dans maurice, apres so mariage li fine al immigré dan enn lote pays et labas li fine installer ek so famille. De temps en temps li revine dans so pays natal, pou rane visite so famille, ou pou gère so bane di bien. MO fine tane dire ki kan sa dimoune la revine dans so pays natal li napi Mussafir...li bizin fer so bane namaz normal. Mo ti bien oler enn explication lor sa sujet la. Djazakumullahu Khairan Wassalam

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatulllahi wabarakaatuh. Ene dimoune quand li quitte so pays natale avec so madame zenfant et li alle établir ene lot place, alors sa lot place la li vine so résidence permanant. Et so pays natale nepli reste so résidence. Donc quand li retourne dans so pays natale le reste ene musaafir (voyageur) a moins si li ena l'intention reste 15 jours ou bien plisse ki 15 jours. Ou bien si li ena so lakaz so la terre cote de temps en temps li vine resté. Dans sa cas la couma li rente dans so l'endroit li vine résident alors li pou bizin complète so namaz même si li fine vine resté pour moins ki 15 jours.
Travel

Financial Transaction
518
ano*** asks:

Question

Assalaamoualaikum I have 2 gold bangles weighing 26g(21karat) but no cash.nisaab for cash is 30000rs& nisaab of gold is87.48g.I assume zakaat is not faraz on me as I own less than the nisaab for gold! But when I convert my 26gof gold into rs it's more than 30000rs. Is zakaat faraz on me?please explain! Jazaakallah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Conversion for the purpose of knowing the value is necessary only when one has different objects as gold, silver and commercial commodities. But if somebody has only gold in his possession, in this case only its weight will be taken into consideration not its value, even if its value maybe above the amount of nisaab. In your case there is no zakaat in the bangles because it is under the weight of nisaab of gold.
Zakaat
519
AM*** asks:

Question

What are the Benefits of Istighfaar?

Answer

Istighfaar (To ask for forgiveness from Allah ta'ala) is a means of purification of soul. Allah ta'ala loves those who make istighfaar abundantly and regularly. Doing istighfaar regularly protect oneself from evils, disasters, anxieties, and is a mean to earn easy livelihood etc.
Zikr

Si ene person ariver gagne relation avec so madam pendant ki li ti encor dan nifaas et li pas ti p bleeding but selmain bane couler jaune ti p aparaitre et la aussi bien tigit ...et akoz misier la pas ti p kapav tini et ine ariver gagne relation avec so madam ...eski li pou permettre ousoi eski li ene grand peche et comment fer pou etre pardonner si li ene peche?

523
Sab*** asks:

Question

Eski vraiment li reccomandé pou mette surma le jour Ashoura ?

Answer

D'après tous banne livres, banne hadith ki prouve vertu concernant surma li bien bien faible. Zotte considère li ene innovation ki ressemblé à la pratique de banne ki ti assassine Imaam Husein (r.a). Ena sa possibilité la aussi ki certaine dimoune ignorant fine faire sa pour contredire la pratique de Maatam et Shia. Banne Ulama contemporain zotte pas accepté sa pratique la. A nous connaissance sa masla la fine mentionné dans Hidaayah et Fathul Qadeer. Allaamah Qazi Khan aussi fine mentionne sa dans so livre Fataawa. Malgré ki li fine qualifié sa de mustahab, mais li paraite bien difficile pour être considéré. Li vrai ki Allamah Qazi Khan so l'opinion ena grand estime dans regard banne Ulama. Quand ena divergence dans certaine masla zot donne priorité ceki Allaamah Qazi Khan fine dire. Mais en ce qui concerne surmah personne pas finne donne li sa crédit la. Allaama Shami (a.r) fine mentionne sa masla la dans deux places et dans tous les deux places, après le pour et le compte, li paraite ki li pas d'accord avec sa.
Muharram
524
A R*** asks:

Question

Aslm. 1 missier pa gagne droit marier avec niece et niece so kala comme co-epouse. Eski pa gagne droit avec niece so poupou aussi?i Sa kala ou poupou la bizin observe purdah devant niece so missier? Confirmer si li bien coumsa? Ena dimoune dimander kifer bizin observe purdah. Explique la loi la si possible svp. Jaz

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Ene dimoune li pas gagne droit réuni deux madame dans so nikaah à la fois ki zotte tombe nièce et kala ou bien nièce et poupou. Ene poupou li bizin faire parda avec so nièce so missier. Coumca même ene kala li bizin faire parda avec so nièce so missier. Dans la même façon ene ti fille li bizin faire parda avec so kalou et so poupa. Sa parda la bizin observe li akoze zotte pas banne mahram permanent.
Nikah

Wa alaikumus salaam. Please call at the office on 2400439 as from 10 a.m to 11.30 a.m week days for registration and appointment. You may also call on the following number 57764809. A*** asks:

Question

Eski roza kasser si arriver par malheur de leau in rent dan la gorge kan pe fair wazu or ghussal??

Answer

Si ene dimoune li rappelle ki li roza, ene cout manqué de l'eau fine dessane dans la gorge ou bien fine rente dans so narine alors so roza pou cassé. Li nécessite seulement remplace ene roza. Si sa kitsoz la fine arrivé par oublie alors roza pas cassé.

546
Yas*** asks:

Question

Search Text : TONSILLITIS. Vol 7, Book 71. Medicine. Hadith 599. (Shahi Bukhari) Search Result Narrated By Anas: That he was asked about the wages of the one who cups others. He said, 'Allah's Apostle was cupped by Abd Taiba, to whom he gave two Sa of food and interceded for him with his masters who consequently reduced what they used to charge him daily. Then the Prophet s said, "The best medicines you may treat yourselves with are cupping and sea incense.' He added, "You should not torture your children by treating TONSILLITIS by pressing the tonsils or the palate with the finger, but use incense." Assalam Mufti Saab Can u explain me the last part of the Hadith. That is the Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) said not to press the tonsils of children but use incense. What does it mean??? JazakAllah Khair

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. It is a kind of wood found in India which is also called ( Oud Hindi ) and it is used to extract essential oils and perfumes commonly known as '' Parfum Oud ". This hadith only indicates that instead of pressing the tonsil, this wood should be inhaled. However the way to inhale, the quantity that should be used and its frequency and dosage etc can only be known by those who are trained in this specific field i.e. the physicians, pharmacologist or a hakeem.
Hadith
547
Ali*** asks:

Question

Assalam.....what islam and masla says on urinary incontinence problem....even if someone is unaware of the dripping or this happen unintentionally....can smeone someone cntinue worship...OR he need everytime to go and wash and make wazu...everytime....is it not a waste of water and time...and sometime may miss namaz with jamaat just to clean oneself again and again and perform wazu...and what if dripping come in namaz with jamaat?? Please send reply urgently....!

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. If it is so frequent that a person is not able to perform namaz with tahaarat during the whole namaz time, then according to masla this person will be qualified as a ma'zoor. And a ma'zoor's namaz is valid even if urine is dripping during namaz.
Impurity
548
Ali*** asks:

Question

Is namaz valid if we cannot concentrate in namaz enough and keep thinking of worldly transaction?? What can we do to have concentration?? Ki nou bizin fair si nou pe ggn pipi mais namaz fini commencer....et bzin ale fair namaz sinnon pou miss avec Jamaat....Ki nou bzin fair ale toilet avan ou ale fair namaz la avec jamaat????

Answer

Namaz is valid, but you should make your utmost effort to concentrate. You should not bring worldly thoughts in your mind intentionally and should not even give attention to it if it comes on its own as well. Just think about the posture you are busy with all the time. As far as the second part of your question is concerned, you should relieve yourself before starting with namaz.
Daily
549
zya*** asks:

Question

Recently i got a friend from thailand that gave me mentos fruit sweet and it was written halaal on it and my friend told me that its halaal over there ? can jum please verify ...

Answer

Some flavours like "Grape" "Strawberry Yogurt" "Cherry Yogurt" and "Mixed Fruits Blasts" contain carmine E120 (colour derived from insects) which is Haraam according to Hanafi mazhab. Doubtful emulsifier is also found in some flavours. Therefore abstain.
Confectioneries

Question

Si arriver urine in drops in our underwear and we do not know...as i have not feel it....if I make wudu....will it be valid....and can we perform namaz in this situation...??

Answer

Your wudhu will be valid, but you can't make namaz with this underwear on you as taharat of clothing is a shart (condition) for the validity of namaz.

Jam*** asks:

Question

i asked a question below: jamil asks: Question Si arriver urine in drops in our underwear and we do not know...as i have not feel it....if I make wudu....will it be valid....and can we perform namaz in this situation...?? Answer Your wudhu will be valid, but you can't make namaz with this underwear on you as taharat of clothing is a shart (condition) for the validity of namaz. Answer

Our masla was based on assumption that it was to that extent mentioned by you and it was based on precautionary measure.
Impurity
554

Question

Is niqab obligatory or recommended in Hanafi Mazhab? Not so common in people following Hanafi mazhab?

Answer

According to Hanafiyyah the veiling of the face is not because it is considered as "awrah" (a part that should be concealed). It is rather because it is a source of fitnah. Being a fitnah the males are not allowed to gaze at it. But we all know that people are no more honest, so the ladies are required to veil themselves completely. In brief it is compulsory for a woman to do it in our day's context. It is to be noted that it is an issue which is established on Ijmaa' (consensus) even if the criteria is different.
Dressing-Appearance
555

Question

Why is it not permissible to build over graves of awliya? Allah the Almighty says: {They dispute among themselves as to their affair. (Some) said, “Construct a building over them”: Their Lord knows best about them.” Those who prevailed over their affair said, “Let us surely build a place of worship over them.”} (Al-Kahf, 21) Imam Al-Razi’s interpretation of {Let us surely build a place of worship over them} means a place in which ‘to worship Allah and keep the remains of the people of the cave in it.’

Answer

There are practices which were permissible before Islam and are now prohibited. So we have to follow the latest practice. According to what Islam preaches and according to what Nabi (s.a.w) said is the interdiction to build anything on graves in general.
Janaazah
556

Chocolates

Kab*** asks:

Question

It is mentioned that Muslims will divide in different sects. Which sect is considered to be the best?

Answer

According to Hadith this Ummah will be divided into 73 sects. There is only one which will be on hidaayat and good, others will be on baatil. The one on hidaayat will be those who follow the path of our Beloved Rassoulullah (Sallallaahu alaihu wasallam) and his Sahaba-e-kiraam (Radiyallaahu anhum).
Aqeedah

559
zya*** asks:

Question

In Rodrigue and Mauritius many hanafis eat octopust and sea foods other than fish. And they are so used to partaking it that it is hard to prohibit them. please advise.

Answer

According to Hanafi Mazhab octopus is not considered as fish consequently it is not considered halal to consume it. Same thing applies to other crustaceans and sea food other than fish. Our duty is to inform people, and it is up to them now to accept or to refuse. Hidaayat lies only in the hands of Allah.
Seafood
