561
Jam*** asks:

Question

Jamil asks: Question i asked a question below: jamil asks: Question Si arriver urine in drops in our underwear and we do not know...as i have not feel it....if I make wudu....will it be valid....and can we perform namaz in this situation...?? Answer Your wudhu will be valid, but you can't make namaz with this underwear on you as taharat of clothing is a shart (condition) for the validity of namaz. Question: But what is the masla on 2.5 radius impurity on clothes which is excused..? Please explain...! Answer Our masla was based on assumption that it was to that extent mentioned by you and it was based on precautionary measure. Assalam... Please explain about the 2.5cm radius on cloth?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam... The Fuqahaa said up to one dirham is tolerated. And above one dirham it is not tolerated. It is the one dirham that has been estimated to the radius of 2.5 cm by our Ulama. Infact at the time of Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) they used to make istinjaa with pebbles which do not eradicate the najaasat completely from the place of istinjaa. It is the place of istinjaa that has been estimated to a dirham.
Impurity
562
Naw*** asks:

Question

Ena boucou banne place nous fine trouvé dans Rodrigues ki banne dimoune ki mette poisson salé sec, zotte nourri pork dans meme place. Eski dans sa cas la nou capave consome sa banne poisson salé ki vini depi Rodrigues?

Answer

Li bien délicat pou consomme ene zafaire pareil. Mais d'après principe li pou tolérable si fine nettoye li bien et lave li bien avant servi.
Seafood
563

Question

Eski ena E120 dans vital active? Eski li halal?

Answer

D'après nous recherche Vital active ena 2 flavour. "Lemon" et "Grapefruit". C’est neque dans flavour "Grapefruit" ki nous fine trouve E120 comme ingrédient. Quant a flavour " limon " la nous pas fine trouve li. A noter ki dans tous le deux ena lezot additif ki douteux. Nous fine rente en contact avek la compagnie mais ziska l’heure nous penkore gagne aukene réponse.
Medical Products

Jam*** asks:

Question

2.5 cm radius of impurity on clothes? Assalam. Does this mean if ever happen u have less than 2.5 cm impurity on clothes. we can perform namaz or read quraan after ablution?

Answer

Yes you are right. But it depends one one's nature. There are some people who will not allow themselves to perform Ibaadat in such state, despite the impurity found on them being a tolerable amount according to Shariat. Being tolerable does not mean it is not undesirable. Just as nobody will like to use a container for food that previously contained urine or filth after it has been thoroughly washed. Although according to Shariah it would be permissible.
Impurity
569

Answer

It is certified by M.J.C. However stay away from meat flavoured ones as there are doubtful.

574

Question

Is beheadings a practice in Islam? Saudi Arabia does many beheadings as punishmet and is the same as ISIS. Does islam really teach terrorism? How to inform the public that Islam does not preach terrorism?

Answer

Beheading in some cases do exist as punishment in Islam such as in the case of Riddah (Apostasy) and Qisaas. We are not adequately informed about ISIS to pronounce anything. Islam teaches to maintain peace and does not allow to be unjust to people and nothing more.

Answer

Outlets-Restaurants
583

Question

Assalaamoualaikum if a traveller misses zohr salaat due to being in the plane,should he make qadha of the qasar salaat that is read 2 faraz of zohr salaat or read 4 rakaat. Jazaakallah khairanB

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. If he is in the state of tahaarat i.e ghusl and wudhu he may try to get a place somewhere to perform his salaat in the plane if possible. Otherwise, he may perform it on his seat. If he has no wudhu and not possible to perform wudhu or tayammum as well, he should perform it in the state he is and in this case he should not read anything. He should only perform the postures and afterwards he will have to repeat 2 rakaat of zuhr even if he is at home.
Travel

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. No need to perform wudhu again but it is undesirable for the husband to walk around in such state.

595
A*** asks:

Question

A asks: Question how to deal with waswasa? Answer The main thing is to be indifferent to it. What do you mean by being indifferent. Please be more specific?

Answer

It means "Not to give attention to it" And this should be the case as long as you can't make qasam about the feeling or the thought you undergoing through. For example: After doing wudhu if you feel something coming out as urine so don't give any attention to it as long as you can't ascertain to a degree that allows you to make qassam upon it freely without any kind of hesitation. If you still can't understand then please contact us personally.
Akhlaaq-Tasawwuf
596
mrs*** asks:

Question

respected Mufti Saheb Assalamaoalaikum w.w I am a diabetic patient. one of my toe is suffering from fungal infection. the doctor said that i must keep it away from water , he said to wear nail polish for a few weeks on that one toe to ensure that water does not get in the nail of that toe. 1. can I apply nail polish ? 2. if yes, how will i perform wudu and what about farz gusul? kindly advice jazakallah khair for always guiding us wassalam Mrs H, KATHRADA ( from Mauritius)

Answer

As medication you may apply nail polish and make massah upon it instead of washing. And if massah is harmful then you may avoid it also. Your wudhu and ghusl will be valid Insha Allah.
Woudhou
597

Question

Are we free to follow Quraan and Hadith without following a particular mazhab?

Answer

It can only be done by a Mujtahid. Such kind of personalities are not available nowadays. So you are bound to follow one of the four Mazhabs. In Mauritius the predominant mazhab is Hanafi, so we should follow it. The level of Ijtihaad enabling one to become a Mujtahid is so high that prominent Ulama in the field of Tafseer and Hadith like Allaamah Qurtubi, Allaamah Jalaaluddin Suyutee, Allaamah Ibnul Hummaam, Allaamah Badruddeen Ainee and Allaamah Ibne Hajr Asqalaani etc. (Rahmatullahi Alaihim) were unable to attain it. Everyone of these prominent Ulama could not find any way to follow deen besides following a specific Mazhab. So they were either Hanafi, Shafi'ee, Maaliki or Hanbali.
Taqleed-Mazhab
598
Sha*** asks:

Question

Eski ene madame gagne droit attache tube sans consentement so missier?

Answer

Non, pas gagne droit quand même so missier donne li permission aussi. A moin si ena ene problème médicale, alors li capave être considéré.
Tarbiyat

faa*** asks:

Question

Assalaamualaykum. 1. I dreamt that there was a cyclonic wind outside and I was inside my house striving to close the shutters in our living room, in vain.I was panicking at the thought that the shutters' frame would break and the shutters separate from the wall.I was saying to myself that my husband should come and help to close the shutters quickly before the frame gets broken.But my husband had already gone out in the cyclonic winds and was not at home.So I kept striving alone when suddenly, my mother in law (who is already dead) appeared standing about 10-20 metres before me outside in the cyclonic winds.She was looking at me.She did not seem to be affected at all by the winds.She was holding one of my triangular head scarfs from one end of the scarf and the scarf was completely unfolded in front of her. She was trying to peep into the house.I felt uneasy about her peeping into the house and I asked her to come inside and told her that my mum had just come to pay me a visit for about 10 mins. End. Can you please tell me the interpretation of my headscarf unfolded in front of her?

This time i saw myself first in an old like part of "al-Aqsa" masjid, but can clearly see the antique wall of so-call Sulaiman a.s wall (i.e where they are building the Temple de Salomon) part.. Then call for Jummah, where i see myself after wudhu in a crowdy masjid nabawi, where so many people were offering salaam infront of the metal doors, and where i also offer Salaam to the prophet Muhammad s.a.w.. but i was only asked to go through a pathway behid that door, where i could see a bright white lighted tomb.. as i offer salaam again and by passing by, i could see the prophet's s.a.w right hand... it was so white and bright.. i never saw that before, and part of his cloke "jhuba" of black color, looks like made of thick material in black color.. cover his arm upto his wrist.. as i move after my salaam, i could see the hand moving to make a sign, finger closed with thumb up.. (like we do best or ok sign with hand).. i was in tears, and i keep moving outside "the room" till i fall in sujood to thank Allah for this precious gift.. i woke up at 3.37am..but i still can see the scene even now.. does that has any particular meaning? to be honest i only saw that the right hand (wrist & fingers/ thumb) not else.. Jazak Allah... & May Allah bless you all for the wonderful work with utmost reward..

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. All that we can say is that Allah (Subhaanahu Wata'aala) loves you. So you have to keep it up and being more serious and punctual in Deen. This can only be realized by being in permanent contact with Ulama and Mashaaikh.

608
A*** asks:

Question

Assalam Mufti.. Please advise who should we give zakaat and Sadaqua according to Shariah..?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Nisaab for the year 2015 is Rs 30.000. Anybody who has in his possession this amount in the form of currency, gold, silver, commercial commodity or any other forms in excess of debts and basic necessities, is qualified as a rich person according to Shariah. Therefore he should not be given zakaat and sadaqa.
Zakaat

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Oui li important et li indésirable pou retarde li plis ki 40 jours, sinon namaz li pou okay.

611
mde***@yahoo.com asks:

Question

Eski gagne droit prend SOS CREDIT couma service ki Emtel ou Orange offert. C-a-d prend ex Rs 10 et ensuit retourne Rs 12 ou apres 24hr li coupe sa montant lor prochaine fois ki met crédit. Li prend sa cas enplis la couma si 'service fees'

Answer

En réalité c'est ene emprunt et d’après Shariat ene emprunt li bizin sans aukene gain mondaine akoze ki tous paiement supplémentaire li considéré comme Riba et l’intérêt. SOS aussi li vine dans sa catégorie la, c'est-à-dire c’est ene transaction ki applique l’intérêt donc bizin abstenir.
Financial Transaction

Question

Ki été règlement concernant attrape bâton 'asa' pou khutba?

Answer

Jummah
613

Question

Aslm. 1. ene masbooq ine fair erreur derrière imam, eski kand li remplace so rakat li bizin fair sajda sahou? 2. si line fair erreur la kand li p remplace rakat (pa derrière imam), eski bizin fair sajda sahou? SI OUI 3. Eski bizin refair namaz la si pane fair s.sahou? jazakallahu khaira

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Erreur ki ene masbooq faire pendant ki li derrière Imam pas nécessite sajdatus sahw mais erreur ki li faire pendant ki li pe remplace so namaz li nécessite sajdatus sahw. Si jamais li panne faire sajdatus sahw alors, li bizin refaire namaz la. Tous sa masla la zot concerne ene erreur ki nécessite sajdatus sahw. Au cas contraire so namaz pou correcte li perna pou remplacé.
Congregation
614
ano*** asks:

Question

Assalaamoualaikum. After a person performing an optional umrah, happened to mistakenly trim the hair of his wife before shaving his head first so as to free himself from ihram. Is the umrah of the wife valid? A waajib of the umrah was left out,what should be done to compensate for this mistake? (this is only an umrah trip,this person and his wife had already perform his umrah and hajj years ago)

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. When everything has been performmed in Umrah and only the shaving or trimming of the hair is left to be done, the husband is allowed to trim the hair of his wife before shaving his head. So the trimming of his wife's hair before shaving his head does not necessitate any damm. His Umrah is perfect. We did not understand the second part of your query that: A wajib of the Umrah was left out ........ Please clarify.
Female
615
ano*** asks:

Question

Salaams. I took loan from bank n repayment is extended for 15 years. In that case if I want to perform umrah or hajj should I settle my loan first then proceed on hajj or if I have sufficient money to perform hajj or umrah before these 15 years is it allowed for me to go. I know that it is nt permissible to take loans koz of interest but I didnt have money to build my house I was compelled. What should I do now. In case of natural death only my loan is written off so no debts on my husband or kids if I die while goin on hajj. Plz advise. Jazak Allah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. It is understood that you have the means to reimburse the contracted loan, hence you will not be delaying your creditor. So in this you will be allowed to perform your Umrah or Hajj.

Enfin, est ce qui li possib done ene numero identite pou bane questions qui nou envoyer afin qui nou kapav repere question la plus facilement kan nou cherche so reponse. Merci. Cosmetics
620

Question

Aslmkm wr wb 1 kikene ki rejet taqlid ki so position dan Islam? Eski li sorti en dehors Islam? Eski taqlid li forme parti dan Aqidah?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. Faire taqleed ene Imam li waajib. Parceki sans faire taqleed li difficile pour ene personne capave suivre Shariat correctement. Quitte ene waajib li pas tire ene dimoune en dehors Shariat, mais li ene kitsoz bien dangereux ki capave amène li pou rejette ene quantité kitsoz ki capave vine Kufr. Par exemple sa banne ki déclare ki zotte suivre Qur'aan et zotte pas accepté hadice majoritairement zotte fine sorte depuis sa banne ki pas faire taqleed ene Imam. Li bon conné ki banne grand grand Ulama de grand calibre aussi fine bizin suivre ene parmi sa quatre la, bé nous ki nous été pou pas suivre?
Taqleed-Mazhab
621
Z*** asks:

Question

Is Pringles Halal?

Answer

Pringles are normally manufactured in America, Belgium, China and other South East Asian region like Malaysia and Singapore etc. According to information at our disposal the ones manufactured in Malaysia and Singapore are Halaal suitable besides the meat flavoured variants.
Confectioneries
622
Meh*** asks:

Question

Dear Sir or Madam, We are a fishing company based in Port Louis and in Reunion. We fish lobsters, tuna and patagonian toothfish. A customer from Dubai is requesting a halal certificate to import our our lobsters (caught, frozen and packed on board) An organization in France told us that all seafood products don’t need this certificate – especially for unprocessed fish but our customer insists on getting this certificate. Could you let us know how to proceed in this case, do we need to get a certificate and who can deliver it? Thank you very much for your help, Best regards, J Mehaut

Answer

Dear Sir / Madam, According to us only fish is lawful. Lobster not being in the category of fish is not lawful. We regret of not being able to assist you in granting you a halal certificate for it.
Outlets-Restaurants

625
Moh*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikoum, Ene missié et ene madame chretiene marié civile et dans l'eglise depuis pluisieurs année. Apres quelque l'année, missié la fine quitte madame la sans donne li divorce. l'année derniere madame la fine embrasse l'islam et sa l'année la li pe marier avec ene Musulman. Eski li gagne droit marier avec sa musulman la sans ki li fine divorcer avec so mari chretien ou soi li bizin divorcer avec so mari chretien avant meme si li fine fini embrasse islam?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Quand ene madame chrétienne li vine musulmane alors pou bizin présente l'Islam a so missié. Si li refusé alors so nikaah cassé. Madame la pou gagne droit faire nikaah après avoir observe ene iddat de 3 haiz (periode). Sa li appliqué dans ene l'état Islamique. Mais dans l'état pareil ki nous pe vive ici, pas nécessaire présente Islam a so missié. So nikaah cassé toute suite et li capave faire l'autre nikaah apres avoir observe ene iddat de 3 haiz. Ena aussi ene deuxième l'opinion dans ki ena plis précaution, c'est à dire li bizin observe ene iddat de 6 haiz.
Nikah
626

Question

Assalamualaikum warahmatullah hi wabarakatahu Respected Mufti sahab, If due to husband's pressure to go for an abortion,the wife leaves the husband's house and is living at her mother's place with her 2 year old child and is pregnant at the same time, while the husband is not giving anything as expenses, does the nikah still hold its validity despite the fact that it's 3.5 months already? Please enlighten us on this situation as soon as possible. Jazakallah khair

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. The nikaah still stands good in case nothing has been pronounced by the husband which may lead to talaaq.
Talaaq
627

Question

Assalaamu alaikum, Gloria fast food dans Pereybere servi saucisse depuis Brazil et lor website islamqna.org, Mufti Mackooji fine ecrire ki saucisse depuis Brazil pas halal. Couma capave ki li dire saucisse depuis Brazil pas halal mais en meme temps li donne Gloria Fast Food dans Pereybere certificate halal? Eski capave ena confiance lor certificate Halal Research Committee de Mufti Mackooji?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Plusieurs fois fine ena banne dérapage semblable ki crée doute et confusion dans l'esprit dimoune. Ou asser intelligent pour comprend si ou pou continué ena confiance ou bien non.
Outlets-Restaurants
628

Question

aslmkm if in a jahri salaah the imam mistakenly read sofly but then he realized just after few verses of surah fatihah. now should he start surah fatihah again or he should continue? and should he make sajdah sahw?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Every Aayat of Surah Fatiha is Waajib. So every Aayat should be read loudly in jahri namaz. Neglecting it will necessitate sajdah sahw. Less than one Aayat is tolerable. Coming to your question, the imaam should start Surah Fatihah again and then make sajdah sahw.
Congregation
629
ANO*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaykum. Is it permissible to ask Allaah ta'ala to forward the reward of a sadaqah/sadaqah jariya or tilaawat quran or dhikrullah to an apostate and to make dua that with the sawaab of these sadaqa or sadaqh jariya or tilaawat quran or dhikrullah the apostate gets tawfeeq to recite the shahada so as to become muslim again? If yes, can we do the same for a non muslim? Jazaakallaah khayran.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. You can't forward the sawaab of these ibaadaat to Apostates and Non-Muslim, but you can perform these good deeds and ask Allah Ta'aala to accept our dua regarding their Hidaayat by the barakat of these good deeds.
Aqeedah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Oui li necessaire

Aslm islam ki dire apropo rest ensemble r bo parents???. Si chak foi ggn bne dispute akoz rest ensembl eski lu pa prefer rest separer??? Ek si misier pa ouler rest separer, madam ki suposer fr?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Ene madame gagne droit dimane ene place separé pour resté. Mais si missié la pas capave accorde so madame sa droit-la acoze ki li pena le moyen bé bizin comprend li aussi. Paudé pas casse relation de nikaah acoze ene kitchose pareille.

Question

aslm apropos sa masla trappe Asaa l'heure Khutba. dans moris majorité nou masjid ena Asaa et si imam pa prend li alors bann musalli ou bien bann ki en charge masjid zotte en colere et cote moi nou imam li obliger trappe Asaa parski commité masjid fine dire li. alors dans sa cas la nou imam ki pou faire? et si oblige nou imam trappe li eski sa vine enn bidat? et eski nou imam aussi pou responsable si li enn bidat? eski li sunnat ou mustahab pou trappe Asaa quand faire khutbah. Dairy-Egg Products
649
ano*** asks:

Question

assalamoualaykoum moufti sahib. 1. Banne madame met mehendi avant alle faire hajj ou umrah parce qui zot dire li ene sunnat. Est ce que li vrai? Est ce qui li gagne droit mette banne dessin ou bien li bizin rempli entier so paume de la main? Est ce qui li gagne droit met mehendi lor so ongles? Est ce qui li gagne droit met mehendi lor li pied et, si oui, lor qui partie li bien li kapav metter et kapav met dessin? Est ce qui mehendi la pas pour attire regard ban missie plis? 2. Est ce qui ene madame gagne droit mette ene anneau lor zot nez(nose ring)? 3.Est ce qui bane hanafi kapav faire namaz janaazah a l'interieur masjid? 4.Est ce qui kapav distribuer ene calendrier qui contenir publicite dans masjid? 5. Est ce qui gagne droit sacrifier ene zanimau et donne dimoune pauvre quand ene dimoune est frappe par banne difficultes? Est ce qui ene bid'ah ca? Jazaakallah pou tou banne reponses.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. (1) Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) fine recommandé pou banne madame mette mehendi, Donc n’importe quand li capave metté, mais bizin prend précaution et pas expose sa a banne ghair mahram (banne missier avec ki madame la gagne droit marié) pou pas attire zotte zotte regard. Li pas ene problème si li pe mette dessin tanque ki li pas ene dessin ki contre shariah couma dessin animé etc. li capave mette lor so zongle et lor so li pied aussi. (2) Non pas gagne droit metté. Normallement zotte faire sa pou imite banne vedette couma banne actrice etc. (3) Li makrooh d'après Hanafi. (4) Li depanne lor publicité la. (5) Oui li permette, mais meilleur donne la monnaie en sadaqah pou banne pauvre capave servi li dans banne kitsoz ki zotte pli bizin.
Dressing-Appearance
650

Aslkm. Nowadays in many mobile phones Qur'an are saved and thus can be viewed and played later time. Please let know if this mobile phone is my pocket, can it be brought in the toilet?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Technically speaking it appears ok if the application is off. But personally it is difficult to say yes without hesitation.

yus***@gmail.com asks:

Question

Concernant talaaq e baiin..eski 1 misier pu gage droit re pren so madam Dan so nikah..Please give some more details about that

Answer

Oui. Même ene madame li sortie en dehors nikaah de so missié par ene talaaq-e-baain. Missié la pou gagne droit remarié avec li. Dans sa cas la pena pou attane Iddat terminé pou remarié.
Nikah
653
aly*** asks:

Question

I already give my wife talaaq e baiin and I wish to return with her what do u advise me mufti sahab

Answer

If one talaaq baain is issued, then she is out of your nikaah. You may take her back by contracting a nikaah with her again.
Nikah
654
ano*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum mufti sahib. 1. Qui faire banne tabligh jamaat faire certains bayaan reserve uniquement pou banne oulama? Ca kapav laisse croire qui zotte peut etre ena des choses a cacher (pas forcement mechamment) du reste de la population musulmane. De quoi zotte causer dans ca banne bayan la svp? Pourquoi les gens ordinaires comme nous pas bizin konne certaines choses dans deen? 2. Ena banne madrasah pour filles qui organisent une excursion par an pour zotte eleves et aalimah, en compagnie de ene seul mahram imam (accompagne de so madame, bien sur). Mo pas comprend comment ca Imam la kapav etre en compagnie de tous ca banne aalimah et eleves la (au moins 100) toute la journee malgre presence so madame? Zot dire dans maurice pa bizin mahram (tous distance inferieur a 48 miles). Aussi zot dire zot faire dawah dans ca sortie la(zotte invite les autres madame vine dans excursion et apres attire bane madame la pou vine madrassah). Ena madame(tres peu, 4 ou 5 au grand max.) ki pas ti alle madrassah ine commence aller suite a sa banne sortie la. Zotte dire qui bane eleves ki pas aller pou ena compte pour render jour qiyaamah pour n'avoir pas fait de da'wah. Zotte dire madame bizin sorti pou alle a la rencontres d'autres madame pour amene zot dans madrassah. Est ce vrai tout cela ou s'agit il plutot d'une publicite pou rapporte l'argent pour madrassah? (Or, moi mone aprane ene madame bizin evite quitte so lakaz et bizin commence par faire da'wah are so proches(enfants,soeurs, mere etc.) dans so lakaz. si madame ti reste lakaz occupe zotte missie et zotte zenfan so l'education (dans le sens large du terme: deen et autres) et repone present pour zot zenfanet proches, a l'ecoute de zot zenfants et donne zenfant l'amour qu'il faut, cuit manger pou zenfant mange dans lakaz (au lieu mange des choses douteuses a l'exterieur) etc. malgre la pauvrete, nous zenfant ti pou mieux guides et nou societe ti pou ena moins de problemes.) Mo demande pardon pou erreur mone kapav faire.Jazaakallah.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. (1) Sa bayaan la akoze ki li ene ti peu plisse technique li pas approprié pou banne publique. (2) Nous pas au courant concernant banne lezotte madrassah dans ki façon zotte organise zotte excursion, Mais excursion ki nous madrassah faire li sans banne détails ki ou fine mentionné. Nous d'accord ki l'idéale ki ene madame bizin reste dans so la case. Mais sa excursion la c'est dans le but pou donne zotte l'occasion défoule zotte même dans ene l'environnement Islamique. Apres tous, zeffort ki nous pe faire zordi zour c'est ene façon ki pou minimise le dégât ki pe faire ravage partout. Li très chagrinant ki nous penkore arrive dans sa stage pou ajoute la piété avec la piété ki zotte déjà ena. Faire dua, avec zeffort de banne dimoune couma ou nous réussi faire li. Li pas ti pou de trop si nous ti capave gagne ene rencontre pou étudié sa avec pli boucou détails.
Knowledge

Dua
657
ano*** asks:

Question

ASLM mufti saahib. Est ce qui ou capave donne nou tou banne difference entre la secte tawheed et la secte salafi? Jazaakallah khayran.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Sa secte ki ou appelle li tawheed la c'est ene fausse nom sa. En réalité appelle zotte Ghair Muqallid ou bien Laa maz-habi. C'est ene secte ki gagne honté pou suivre Imaam Abu Haneefah, Imam Maalik, Imaam Shaafi'ee et Imaam Ahmad Bin Hambal ( Rahimahumullah) ki zotte bien prés avec Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) so l'époque et l'autre coté zotte suivre banne Ulama de zordi zour aveuglement ki presque pas représente narien divant sa 4 imams la. Salafi aussi c'est ene nom déguisé pou embête dimoune sa, sinon perna aukene différence. C'est sa même ki appelle zotte Ghair Muqallid et Laa maz-habi.
Ghair Muqallid

Moh*** asks:

Question

Assalam I've seen on ur website for these vitamin Vitamins from pig's liver & other pig parts Vitamin A Vitamin B 5 Vitamin B 6 Vitamin B 12 Vitamin E Vitamin Ingredients Info Does That mean all these vitamins came only from pork. If yes, therefore we will not b able to take vitamin supplement as there will be minimum two or three vitamin like mention above in it??? JazakAllah Khair

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. No. It does not mean that, they can be found elsewhere as well. We only meant to say that these vitamins can be derived from pigs as well. So one should be cautious before using any vitamin supplement. Some other details have been added in the vitamin section in our website you may refer to it.

Miscellaneous
665
Ali*** asks:

Question

Is it permisible to do Salaat ul Esha first on time and then replace swalatul Maghrib which is qaza??

Answer

It is not permissible for a Saahibe Tarteeb to do it. A Saahibe Tarteeb is a person who does not have qaza of more than 5 Salaats. In this case he will have to perform all his missed salaat in sequence. But if a person is not a Saahibe Tarteeb then he may perform his esha on time then his maghrib.
Qazaa

669
Ame*** asks:

Question

1. What are the benefits of Istighfaar and Sadaqua? 2. And what are the benefits of giving food to animals, fish or birds?

Answer

(1.A) Benefits of Istighfaar ; 1.One will be forgiven. 2. Allah will increase us in wealth and children. 3. Allah will have mercy on us. 4. We will be saved from Allah's punishment. 5. Istighfar is a secret of success in this world and in the hereafter.etc (1.B) Benefits of Sadaqa ; 1. Sadaqa is the best investment for the hereafter. 2. Sadaqa is a protection against calamities. 3. It is a means of attaining shade on the day of resurrection. 4. One will get ever ending rewards from Allah (Sub haanahu wata'aala). (2) There is great reward in feeding animals as well as mentioned in the hadith kitaab. and over that it may lead to jannah.
Zikr

Ano*** asks:

Question

Q. What do the Ulama kiraam say on the circulation of the following hadith ? Sayyiduna ‘Abdullah ibn ‘Amr (radiyallahu ‘anhuma) reports that Nabi (sallallahu ‘alayhi wa sallam) said : “None except a person going for Haj, Umrah or going out in the path of Allah Ta’ala should travel by sea, for verily there is fire under the ocean and there is an ocean under the fire.” (Sunan Abi Dawud, Hadith: 2481 and Sunanul Kubra of Imam Bayhaqi, vol. 4 pg. 334)

Answer

Basically, She should be provided with food, shelter and clothes in a convenient way, and take care of her in order to keep her happy.

677
yus*** asks:

Question

Assalaamou'alaikoum. Qui concept de isaale sawaab dans shariat? Eski capav lire Qur'aan comme isaale sawaab? Eski gagne droit lire Qur'aan dans qabarastaan? Ena banne groupe dans Maurice ki dire pas gagne droit. Si ti capav gagne ene eclaircissement? Jazakumullah khair

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Isaale sawaab existé dans shariat. Capave lire Quraan Kareem et envoye sa sawaab la en faveur banne ki fine fini intiqaal. Lire Quraan Kareem dans Qabarastaan aussi li permette.
Janaazah
678
Mos*** asks:

Question

Si ou dire jamaat dan haq. B kifer bane alim tabligh jamaat mem pa sorti 40jrs 3jrs 4 moin regulier. Ou mem kan dernier fois oune sorti. Apre ou dire jamat dan haq. fer comik. plz reply

Answer

Sorti dans jamaat li haq pour faire Islaah, mais sa islaah-la li pas trouve dans sorti dans jamaat seulement. Ena enkore lezot moyen ki capave faire islaah. Ena banne Ulama ki adopté sa lezot façon la. Ena banne Ulama ki fine faire 7 bananés dans darul Uloom (madrassah) sans retourne zot lakaz. Sa aussi appelle sortie dans chemin Allah. Ou ena chance vine kaafir si ou dire ki sa pas appelle sortie dans chemin Allah. 7 bananés faire ou environs 63 chilla (40 jours). Li parette ki ou ena l'enemité avec Ulama. Li pas bon ditout sa capave vine cancer.
Dawah-Tabligh
679
Moh*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikoum, D'apres Shariat, d'apres Quran et hadith, eski ene organisateur Hajj et umrah gagne droit prend ene profit net lor la tete chaque haji? Ene profit net veut dire apart billet avion, cout hotel, ziyarat, qurbani, transport et ban les zot frais et aussi apart organisateur so frais personnel comme billet avion, dépense hébergement kan faire démarche hotel, so depene ki li fine donner etc, organisateur la prend par exemple Rs 5000 encore lor la tete chaque haji, eski sa Rs 5000 gagne droit prend d’après shariat? Jazak Allah Khair

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Li gagne droit prend la quantité ki li envie pour service rendue sans koze menti.

684

Question

Aslm.. mo ene camarade fini marié et line content mo ene camarade garson ki penkor marié. Mo explik li boucou ceki li pe fair la pas bon mai li pa pe comprend meme.. li dir moi so missié pa prend li compte acoz sa li fair sa etc. mone coupe relation après ki nou ine gagne discussion.. eski mo bizin fair so missié conné ki so madam pe cheat li avec ene lot ou mo pas responsable. Si mo pa fair li conné eski mo pou responsable kot Allah? Sa pe déroulé depi boucou le temp.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Saki li pe faire li pas bon. Et pe parait ki ou ena camarade garçon, sa aussi pas bon. plitot faire ti fille la so mama papa conné, zot ava faire le nécessaire.

fat*** asks:

Question

fatma.K12345. . Assalamo alaikom. Cote mo rester dans Plaine-verte ena ene madrasa ki faire programme dans a soir deux ou trois fois par semaine. Programme la commencer demi heure de temps après namaz esha et li durée pendant plis ki une heure de temps. Malgré ki dans programme la pas ena beaucoup dimoune, la aussi zotte servi micro, ziska 150 mètres a 200 mètres distance la voix la aller. Zotte derange banne voisins / voisines et nous gagne beaucoup difficulté avec sa. Nous nepli capave faire namaz avec concentration, pour dormi aussi nous gagne difficulté et sa cause nous probleme pou lever namaz fajar. Sa banne dimoune la zotte mauvais si pou alle dire zotte, entier zotte la famille pou vine faire bagarre et revolution. Astere zotte fine fixer Haut parleur en dehors deux, trois coté. la voix la alle plis loin enkore. Plis grave ki sa encore ena banne sois disant savants ki vine faire sa banne programme la. Est ce ki zotte pas ti bizin gueté si sa pe ranne dimoune de sa l'endroit la du tord avant participe la dans ? eski li autorisé faire travail deen dans sa façon la? eski malediction dimoune pas pou porte lor zotte? ki zotte l'opinion lor la? Merci beaucoup.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Normalement pas gagne droit donne difficulté nous prochain et ni nous gagne droit derange kikene dans so bien être. Nabi (sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) quand ti pe faire namaz tahajjud li ti pe lire Quraan ene quantité fort ki sa pas agace personne dans so someil. Faire nous conné ki madrassah sa, si nous capave, nous capave contacter zotte.
Social life
688
ano*** asks:

Question

Do I need to do nikah again with the one who I already give talaaq e baain and she is still in iddat

Answer

Yes, if one or two talaaq-e-baain were given then nikaah is to be renewed although she is in iddat. The whole nikaah procedures will have to be taken into consideration once again. And they are as follows: Her consent, proposal & acceptance, 2 witnesses and mahr.
Nikah
689
ano*** asks:

Question

Assalaamoualaikoum mufti sahib. D'apres themajlis.co.za, Ibn Taymiyyah ine "deviate" (voir rubrique "Books", book no. 80 intitule "the kufr and shirk of Ibn Taymiyyah" et rubrique "Articles", articles no. 169 et 170 intitules "deviation of Ibn Taymiyyah" et "abusing the sahaabah"). Est ce que li important pour nous konne sa banne kitchose la pour pas tombe dans l'erreur? Si oui et si ce qui ine dire dans ca bane livre et articles la vrai, est ce qui nou gagne droit faire suivre le nom de Ibn Taymiyyah et de Ibn Qayyim ou sheikh Albani par "rahmatul alayh" ou "rahimahullah" ou autre mention de respect? Jazaakallah khayr.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Tous banne Ulama ki nous conné zotte fine reconnaître sa banne la zotte connaissance et zotte position dans deen malgré ki zotte pas fine partage zotte l'opinion. Nous pas trouve narien mal dans servi " Rahmatullahi alaih" pour zotte. mais en meme temps nous bizin faire ressortir ki nous pas d'accord avec ene quantité kitsoz ki zotte fine dire. Li bon conné ki nous pas a la hauteur pou critique sa banne Ulama la mais en même temps nous respecté banne grand Ulama zotte l'opinion negative ki zotte ti ena envers sa banne Ulama la.
Ghair Muqallid
690
Moh*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikoum, Dans namaz, lor dernier rakat, dans tashahhud mo pe gagne envi pour largue gaz mais mone tini a cause pres pour fini namaz. Mais quand mo pe faire 2eme salaam, mo pas fine capave tini, mo fine largue gaz. Eski mo bizin repete namaz la ou soi non?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Nous ti envie confirme ene kitsoz avant nous reponne. Ou fine dire ki ou fine largue gaz, eski li ti intentionnel ou bien par li meme li fine sortie?

Ash*** asks:

Question

Salam I am a muslim student and I often eat outside. I seriously do not understand which restaurants are really halal or not. Nowadays there is no law which restricts a restaurant on the issue of halal and haram. I went to Subway last week. I saw there was a halal logo on their flyers and halal posters stick to the wall. I found that really strange since I personally know that their products come from chicken Master and Fast food ltd which main suppliers for pigs on the island. When queried about the halal certificate, i was shock to see a certificate from Jumah Masjid awarded to Fresh and ready which are not their true suppliers. Moreover the certificate is a copy and it’s clearly written on that paper that a copy of this certificate is not valid. I asked the girl who fortunately is a muslim and then I learned they are forced by their employer to present this to customers. How can we remain idle to such a situation? Our Muslim sister is being forced to lie. Can't your organization do anything?

Answer

wa alaikumus salaam. We took cognizance of your query and we intend to forward a copy of it to Jummah Mosque.
Outlets-Restaurants
694
moh*** asks:

Question

Assalaamualaikoum, Mo ti pe gagne envi largue gaz, mo ti penser mo pou capav tini juska namaz terminer mais quand mo pe fer 2eme salam, pas fine capave tini et li fine sorti. Mo pas coner si sa pou conte dan intentionellement ou soi non.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam, Dans ou cas ki ou été, ou bizin re-faire namaz la, si sa fine arrivé avant ki ou dire le mot salaam dans deuxième salaam.
Impurity
695
Tah*** asks:

Question

Aslkm. Please let me know if i am allowed to perform umrah for my deceased father, despite I have not done my own umrah and hajj. J.Allah Khair

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. If you intending doing Umrah for your father so do your Umrah first and then you may do on behalf of your father or anybody you wish, unless if somebody is sending you to perform the Umrah on behalf of your father, in this case you perform the Umrah of your father first without forgetting yourself.
Umrah

Assalamualaykum.... I am sending this query for the previous question asked by brother Asheek concerning halaal certificate given to restaurants...! He asked a question about Subway where he found Halaal certificate from Jummah masjid… I personally found certificates of Jummah Masjid in several restaurants like Mc Donald, Choice Food St Paul, El Mondo, Debonaires, etc which is weird for me as it is doubtful…. many muslims eat outside their home twice a week due to work…I personally eat lunch outside almost 3 times a week in Curepipe…but unfortunately there is only one or two restaurant that is certified in this area…! Seriously are these restaurants genuinely halaal....??????????? Why don’t JUM intervene…..bzin met ene lord dans sa domaine la….boku ban frère a soeur musulmans manger en dehor pendant la journee….zot pas penser ki nous bzin repond kot Allah si ene resto ena certificat halaal mais li pa halaal??? KIFER JUM et Jummah Masjid Pas travail ensam pour PAS CREER Confusion dans la tete ban musulmans….! Please Reply URGENTLY…..!! Jazaak Allah….!!

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Concernant la question de Subway nous fine déjà communique l'information a Jummah Mosque ki fine promette pour faire le nécessaire. Et concernant travail ensame, alors nous fine faire nous démarche de nous côté et nous fine discute la question avec Jummah Mosque. Nous fine faire nous zeffort d’après résolution ki nous ti prend et nous pe encore atane Jummah Mosque faire so zeffort.
Outlets-Restaurants
697
Ali*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikoum, Ene ti fille fine embrasse Islam, so parent empeche li pou pratique deen dan so la caz et zot pe rod marier li avec ene hindu meme. Ti fille la fine faire application pou gagne ene travaille coumsa li capave louer ene la caz pou li rester et li capav pratique so deen bien et li fec fini so l'université. Apres avoir fer application envers plusieurs travail, c'est juste 2 place li fine gagne reponse, Ene c'est dans la banque et deuxieme c'est dan ene call centre cot ena pou travaille a soir. lequel dans sa 2 travail la pli bon pou sa ti fille alle travail en pensant so situation ki li été?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Deuxième choix la paraite applicable. entre-temps rode ene lot travail. Et sa ki plis important li rode ene garcon musulman li meme. Si li donne nous so profile et so cordonné nous guetté dans ki façon nous capave aide li si kikene intéressé.

698
faw*** asks:

Question

is ajinomoto halal?? i just got a message about its containing pig enzyme.. the message is as such: "ajinomoto, the japanese food seasoning giant, apologised to the muslims of indonesia this week in several major newspapers over the use of pig enzymes in its flavour enhancer product, Reuters reports. the news last week that ajinomoto's monosodium glutamate(msg) contained pig enzymes had caused a storm among muslims in indonesia and the indonesian council of ulemas(mui), or Muslim religious leaders, had issued a fatwa(ruling) banning its consumption....." but wat is ambiguous is that its written by 12 jan 2001.. please confirm it.. jazaakumullah khairan yaa shaykh

Answer

According to latest info received, Ajinomoto from Indonesia and Malaysia are certified as halal by their respective halal organizations. However according to experts one should avoid consuming it due to health problems.
Spices-Condiments
699
Ano*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum, Respected Mufti would like to know that the children who haven't reached the age of puberty their evil deeds are not recorded so does the same apply for the good deeds too?jazakallah.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Good deeds are recorded and rewarded for and bad deeds are not accountable, however public damages caused by them should be indemnified for, by their responsible parties.
Tarbiyat
700
Unk*** asks:

Question

Assalamoo alaikoom, Is it permissible to accept invitation one who runs his business on loan with interest ?and what if he says the interest nowadays is not haraam,? Also can we accept invitation from someone who lives lavishly but dosent pays his debts? May Allah Almighty reward you for your excellent services. Jazakallahu khaira.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. (1) Giving interest and taking both of them are haraam. If somebody's business is on taking interest then it will not be permissible to accept invitation because it will lead to consuming haraam. However one who takes loan on interest does not contain any interest which he will be using for invitation even if the practice of giving loan is as well haraam. So in this case it will be permissible to accept the invitation. (2) Saying that interest nowadays is not haraam is a very very dangerous declaration as it is kufr. One loses his Imaan by uttering such statement. (3) There is room for accepting invitation in the third case.
Social life
701

Question

A woman is in iddat because her husband has recently passed away. She is staying at her house lonely therefore she is depressed, afraid and starting to get sick as well. Will it be allowed for her to leave her house to spend the iddat at her sister’s place?

Answer

Yes in this condition she will be allowed because of necessity.
Janaazah
702
yus*** asks:

Question

Assalaamou'alaikoum. Some ghair muqallid are spreading this. " Deobandi Ashraf Ali Thanvi promotes Zina - Adultery in his book Bahistey Zewar page 168: If a man makes physical relations with a woman mistaking her to be his wife. (I wonder how can this happen). It can't be called Zina and there's no sin upon it. If she gets pregnant, then she should be given Mahr. Child's lineage should be legally given to the Zaani man, and the child can no longer be called as Bastard. However she should get separated once they come to know they mistakenly had physical intimacy. (Are they blind? Can't they know whom they are talking to and with whom they get into physical intimacy. Scanned page is in the 1st Comment)." What is this mas'ala really about Mufti Sahab?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. The mas'ala is okay and it applies to the condition they were living long ago. In those days they were not practicing the dog life known as "fréquenté" which lead to do everything and perhaps more than what they would do after nikaah. Similarly in those days they were not aware of their partners and they were not acquainted to each other before nikaah to such an extent that sometimes they did not even know the outlook and the appearance of each other. Therefore the meeting in the room after marriage was the first time they ever met. So in such situation everything happened in ignorance without knowing that they were in error.
Nikah

705

Question

Aslm. I want to know if a husband is supposed to be affectionate to his wife or is he just supposed to come to her once a while for intercourse and then after that nothing else for days?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. He should be affectionate to his wife and treat her in such a convenient way that he would like his daughter to be treated.

707

Question

Aslm Zotte capave donne moi definition, détail, preuve lors waseela? Ou soi si zotte ena kit l'article lors la send moi ene link

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Waseelah veut dire "ene moyen ki faire arrive lor ene destination" Ene moyen pou faire dua accepté c'est dimane dua avec Allah Ta'aala par barakat Nabi (sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) et meilleur façon pou faire dua accepté par barakat Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) c'est lire boucou darood shareef après avoir faire éloge Allah Ta'aala. Coumsa meme lire darood shareef avant termine dua.
Miscellaneous
708
ano*** asks:

Question

aslm, i have made nikkah but am not living with my husband, does i need to go and meet him whenever he wants? is it a sin if i dont meet him due to other obligation ie work

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. After nikaah your husband should provide you with shelter, food and clothing and you should live with him. Anyway this can also be decided by mutual agreement. If the way you are living has been arranged by mutual agreement then it's okay. Now it depends on conditions and agreements settled between you people.

Is Maohuat (Almond Cracker) Halal?

Answer

This product is halal certified by Shandong Islamic Association (SIA) of China.

Chocolates
711
yus*** asks:

Question

Assalaamou'alaikoum Mufti Sahab. Concernant reponse ki fine donner a propos Zikr en jamaat (question 682). Ena ene page lors facebook ki apelle Minhaaj Us Sunnah, lors sa page la fine ecrire 'Tricherie ou manque de connaisance dans bann Muftis Tableegh Jamaat' parceki dans reponse la fine dire 'Ena pour sa kitsoz la et ena contre sa. Ena ki empêche sa tention li vine ene bid'ah et ena ki accepté faire li zisse pour enseigne dimoune la, mais en principe bizin faire li tousel'. Alors li fine apelle sa ene tricherie et fine dire ki ena plusieurs hadith cote Rasoulullah SAW coze dans faveur Zikr en Jamaat et li fine presente ene parmi banne hadith ki trouve dans Musnad Ahmad "Allah pour dire jour Qiyaamah: Bann qui finn reuni zordi pour conner qui sann-la bann Ahl-ul-karam (les gens de la noblesse). Banne Sahabah demandé: O Messager d'Allah! Qui sann-la bann Ahl-ul-karam. Rasoulullah SAW dire: Bann qui frequente bann Majlis-e-zikr (Zikr en Jamaat) dans Masjid". Capave gagne éclairecissement lors sa sujet la. Jazaakallah khair

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Normalement quand ene dimoune so le cœur fine aveuglé avec noireté de bid'ah alors li kapave koze nerporte saki vine dans so l'esprit. Perna aukene kitsoz de tricherie dans réponse ki nous fine donné. Quant a manque de connaissance nou pena narien pou dire la dans parceki vraiment nous pas considère nous grand savant ou grand connaisseur. Dans nous réponse ki nous fine donné, nous fine faire mention de plusieurs tendance concernant sa sujet la. Personne pas kapave dire ki saki nous fine dire li pas vrai. Zordi jour quand nous dire majlis-e-zikr nous ena ene perception de ene personne ki dirige ene l'assemblé de zikr, Par exemple li dire " Laa ilaaha Illallah " alors zotte tous répète " Laa ilaaha Illallah " en chorus. Eski dans hadice cote majlis-e-zikr fine mentionné li signifié sa façon faire zikr la? Pour nous li pas signifié sa. Et c'est sa même l'opinion du célèbre Sahabi Hazrat Abdullah bin Mas'ood (Radiyallahu anhu). Bizin prend boucou précaution avant dire ene kitsoz parceki nous pe cassiette derrière ene grand Sahabi. Tous saki dimoune capave dire lor nous pou applique d'abord lor Sahabi avant gagne nous.
Akhlaaq-Tasawwuf
712

Question

Assalaam, Ena ene missié telegu ki envi embrasse islam et apres sa li pou fer nikah avec ene madame Musulmane. Mais li ena so madame telegu et 3 grand z'enfants. Li pe dire ki li pena aucaine contacte avec so madame mais a cause so ban z'enfants zot reste dans meme la caz sans ena contacte intime. Li pe dir ki apres ki li embrasse Islam et apres ki li pou fer nikah avec sa madame musulmane la aussi, li pou continuer reste dans meme la caz avec so madame telegu (sans ena contacte avec li) a cause so ban z'enfants juska ki zot marier. Li pou aller vini cot lot madame Musulmane la. Eski li permettre pou sa missié la continuer reste dan mem la caz avec so madame telegu meme ki li pas pou ena contacte intime avec madame la? Ene missié fine dire zot li gagne droit rester parceki Aassia ti reste avec Pharaon apres avoir li ti embrasse islam. Please comment.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Sa question la so réponse li pas capave ene réponse générale ki applique pou tous dimoune. Bizin analyse cas par cas et suggère ene solution pour chaque cas. Pour cela li souhaitable ki la personne li vine joine nous en personne. Quant a le cas de Hazrat Aasiah ki ti pe reste avec Fir'aun c'est ene kitsoz ki ti en vigueur dans Shariat de Moussa (Alaihis salaam) et sa fine continié dans commencement de l'islaam aussi. Mais après sa, la loi fine vini ki ene madame li pas pou capave resté dans aukene façon avec ene kaafir. Donc le cas de Hazrat Aasiah pas pou capave servi li pou le cas ki ou fine mentionné dans ou question.
Nikah
713

Question

Aslm. May I know the hijri date for 20 december 2012?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. According to our finding, in Mauritius the Hijri date was the 6th of Safar 1434 A.H.
History
714

Question

aslm. i want to know how to lead a married life?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Like everything in life, married life should be led in accordance to kitaab (Quraan) and Sunnah. There are rights and duties to be observed which will be known by Shariah. Strict adherence to Shariah under the supervision of competent and sincere Ulama will allow one to be a very good partner Insha Allah.
Social life
715

Question

aslm mo pas mean pou critiquer mais mo dans ene confusion.. ena environ 50+ ulama dan jum et sakene ena zot lopinion ki nou bizin respecter.. mai selman o nivo publique eski tou ulama pa ti sipozer done fatwa de jum? mo pe dir sa acoz mone gagn discussion avec ene kikene dan famille lors khatam.. mone dir ki jum pa approuv khatam et moi mo suive jum (mo pa conner si jum so lopinion ine changer lors la mais mo rappelle mo ti lire imP dan sa sens la ki fason ki maurice fine adopter dan khatam pas bon etc.. ) kan mo ine dir la personne sa li dir moi "ki to pe cozer toi? moi mo ine alle dan comie khatam et mo ine trouve plusieurs Ml ki membre jum pe faire khatam la zotte meme" li ine dir moi ene deux zot noms mais mo pas ti envi mentionne li et li pas ok aussi... mo question eski jum approuve khatam? si pas approuver ki faire ena Ml ki membre jum zot faire khatam? eski jum pa bizin mette li claire devant tou Ml ki jum pas approuve sa? si zot membre pas capav suive zot propre stand couma nou pou suive zot???

Answer

Wa laikumus salaam. JUM so stand li bien claire et nous pas fine changé aussi et nous pas approuve sa pratique la. Tous banne Ulama zot déjà au courant de sa. Ceki certaine pe capave faire li pas bon dans nous connaissance. Nous capave re mette sa au claire divant banne Ulama dans nous rassemblement ki nous pour faire Insha Allah. Ou continié suivre saki JUM dire. Ceki certaine pe faire contre JUM li pe mal faire et li pou prend so responsabilité divant Allah.
Social life
716

Question

Aslm. If a wife happens to find out that her husband, who she trusted so much, is secretly cheating on her so what must she do if she cannot confront him about it.. 1. just try to live with him happily as if nothing happened? 2. keep her distance in everything and just do the work of house n towards husband? 3. ask for a divorce? or if the above are not good please suggest what must the wife do? Jazakallah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. It is in your interest as well as your family to live with him as if nothing happened just to maintain a conjugal life safe and smooth. If according to you what you came to know about your husband renders your life difficult and uncomfortable so please be clear about the situation. What do you mean by cheating please give us a complete and clear picture of it.
Social life

ais*** asks:

Question

Assalamoualaikum..please interprete my dream..I dreamt that I am pregnant..I was in pain and was about to deliver a baby..I saw blood spots in my underwear then I saw two babies one for me n the another for my sister..I told my husband that the baby will not drink milk now but he said the baby will drink..then I saw milk coming out from both breast and then I breastfed the baby..please note that my sister n I are married but don't have any baby I also dreamt a pious person showing picture of 2 masjid and asking where it is situated after that I saw some Arabic alphabet written on a wall then I saw an extremely beautiful scene of mountain n sea..

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. We make dua that Allah Ta 'aala grant you and your sister healthy and pious children as you dreamt.
Dream
718
sha*** asks:

Question

1)how can we know if a person is ghair muqallid while he claims to be a muqallid?? 2)and are the hizbullah and ghair muqallid same?? 3)is it permissible for the spouses to hv different aqeedah?? 4) can we follow a mufti whom his own family and other trustworthy people mention his bad habits and character?? if yes, to which extent?? 5) if there is a person who is a maulana and his wife doing bad things, though they live together and the wife is also in parda.. wen the aam people are averted, they say so and so maulana's wife doing it.. what should we do in this case?? jazaakumullah

Answer

(1) Anybody who is not following one of the four Aimmah ( i.e Imaam Abu Hanifah (Rahimahullah), Imaam Maalik (Rahimahullah), Imaam Shafi'ee (Rahimahullah) and Imaam Ahmad Bin Hambal (Rahimahullah)) is a ghair muqallid. Likewise anybody who follow deen by manipulating the four mazhab is also a ghair muqallid. A muqallid is somebody who makes taqleed (follow) only one imaam amongst the four mentioned above. (2) Hizbullah is a political party comprising of different islamic tendency. (3) For the harmonious life they should be of the same tendency. (4) The person Mufti or Maulana whom you should follow, should be trustworthy and a pious person even no body likes him. Otherwise an Aalim who is appreciated, admired and accepted by the public but he is not an upright person, he should never in any case be followed. (5) A Maulana who has done everything in his capacity will not be responsible for what his wife does.
Ghair Muqallid
719

Question

Aslmkm Si 1 imam dan qiyam rapel ki li pas ena wazoo comment li pou sorti dehor namaz dan 1 façon ki so banne musalli compr3nd ki bizin casse namaz?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Li faire salaam ene coté et li faire zotte conné

Daily
721

Question

Salaam Eski gagne droit envoye esaale sawaab pour ene dimoune ki encore vivant ou soi juste pou ene dimoune mort? Par exemple, lire quran et envoye so sawaab à ban dimounes ki vivant aussi. Eski capve lire namaz nafil et envoye comme esaale sawaab ou soi non?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Isaalé sawaab veut dire avoye sawaab. Ene dimoune gagne droit faire ibaadat et avoye sa sawaab la a celui ki li envie mort et vivant tous les deux.
Janaazah
722
Par*** asks:

Question

Aslmkm. I badly need your help. I have been invited to a diner on sunday , venue is Gymkhana Club, vacoas. I must give confirmation of my presence tomorrow morning by 10 a.m tomorrow morning. Yet I don't know whether it is halaal or not. If they serve alcohol or not. Please if possible give me an answer before 10 am tomorrow. Jazhakhallahairan.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. No invitation is to be accepted where Haraam activities are found or doubtful food is served. It is to be noted that the intermingling of sexes is haraam in Shariah. We request you that in the future do send your urgent queries by send an sms on 57526981 or phone on 2400439 / 57526981.
Social life
723
yus*** asks:

Question

Assalaamou'alaikoum Mufti Sahab. Mo fine trouver lors ene page facebook ki apelle 'Mihaaj us Sunnah': "Rasheed Ahmad Gangohi celui qui finn crée mouvement Deobandi / Tableegh Jamaat dire: Allâh capave coze menti." Reference: Fatawa Rashidiyyah Si enn dimoune dire menti, nous montre li livre la, pas ena sapé la. Aster dire moi, mo finn montré enn verité, appelle sa critik? Non, mais pe mettre ou ar garde contre Aqeedah pouri de Tabligh Jamaat. Allah pas coze menti c'est Aqeedah Ahl Us Sunnah. Si capav gagne ene eclaircissement Mufti Sahab.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. D'après nous connaissance jamais ena ene kitsoz pareil. Pe paraite ki zotte fine lire ene seule portion de sa livre la. Donc li plitot ene coupé tranché et ene manipulation malicieuse de zotte part. Ou kapave réfère ou a sa question réponse ki ena dans Fatawa Rasheediyyah pg 93, 94, 95, 96 et 97 ou pou trouvé ki quantité bouhtaan ( blâme) zotte fine metté lor sa grand sheikh ki appelle Qutub-e-Rabbaani Maulana Rashid Ahmad Gangohi. Li vrai ki l'éclairage soleil aussi pas bénéfique pou ene aveugle. Référe ou a sa cinq link suivants la pour reference ki nous fine donné dans Fataawa Rasheediyyah.
Aqeedah
724

Question

Aslm Mo ene sel garson pu mo parent. Problem c ki mo parent zot pa fer namaz.Zot zis res devan television ou portab. Kan mo dir zot fr namaz zot pa repon nanrien ek zot pa fr namaz osi. Ki kpve fr pu zot kumens fr zot namaz. Eski mo pu repon kot Allah akoz mo famille pas pratique deen?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Ou continié dire-dire zotte. Ou pena aukene responsabilité pour negligence ki zotte pe commette.

Meat-Poultry
726
ahm*** asks:

Question

What is Ahad Namah and its importance?

Answer

Ahad naama is a dua in which praises of Allah Ta'aala are mentioned and it is also a request for protection from the Almighty. This dua is mentioned in a book called Nawaadirul Usool of Imam Tirmizi. According to some Ulama it could be written on a mayyit (deceased person), whereas some other Ulama do not agree with this practice due to Allah's name being exposed to impurity at the time of decomposition of the dead body in the qabr, To stay away from such problem those who write it opted to write it by the mere movement of their index finger without using any kind of ink. In this case it should be permissible according to those Ulama who have prohibited it as well. Some Ulama prohibited this practice because it is not supported by any Quraanic text and also not approved by any Mujtahid. On the other hand those who consider this practice do so as tabarruk. Tabarruk has its origin in the practice of our beloved Nabi (Sallaallaahu alai wasallam).
Miscellaneous
727

Question

Aslm. Mo ena delo zam zam kot moi mai li pres pour fini. Eski m kapav rest ajout delo normal ladan? Li pu ena mem barakat delo zamzam? JazakAllah khairn

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Capave ajouté et li pou ena so barakat, mais entre pure de l'eau zamzam et de l'eau zamzam ki mélangé pou ena difference.
Miscellaneous

737
ano*** asks:

Question

Assalaamou'alaykoum mufti saahib. Ena ene gros probleme a Maurice pour dispose de banne vieux qour'aane et autres livres ou documents islamiques: li tres difficile pour trouve ene endroit pour bruler et enterrer meme si nous ena ene ti jardin parce qui rien pas garantie que dimoune ou animaux pas pour marche lor sa partie de ou jardin kotte oune enterre ca qour'aane,livre ou document islamique la. Et puis, nous pose la question "comment pour faire si plus tard nous vendre sa la case la avec ene non musulman?". Aussi, ca banne documents la pas disintegrer meme apres plusieurs annees qui oune fini brule zotte et enterre zotte. Maintenant, si nou ene locataire, nou pas kapave enterre dans la cour nou proprietaire. Si nou habite dans appartement, c'est pire encore. Est ce qui ou kapave propose banne solutions bien concretes et bien pratiques pour tous musulmans de maurice svp? (Sinon,est ce qui JUM kapav, par voie de donations, acheter des terrains dans des endroits retires pour occupe de ca probleme la?).jazaak Allah khayran a tout le personnel de JUM. Was salaam.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Nous ena deux option. Soit coule li dans la mer, soit enterre li ene place propre cote en principe dimoune pas marché. li pas nécessaire ki zanimo pas marché pourvu dimoune en principe pas marché. Si sa pas capave, alors brule li dans ene drome et prend la sanne la enterre li dans ene place cote nous pensé ki en principe dimoune pas marché. Par sa nous responsabilité fini.
Quraan
738
ano*** asks:

Question

Assalaamou'alaykoum mufti saheb. 1. Si ena ene miroir devant ene dimoune ki per lire namaz, est ce ki dimoune la bizin couvert miroir la avec ene tissu? 2. Si miroir la trouve sur le cote de sa dimoune ki per lire namaz la, est ce ki dimoune la bizin couvert miroir la avec ene tissu?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. L'existence miroir dans ene l'endroit dans aukene façon li pas empeche faire namaz. mais nous bizin conné ki concentration dans namaz li ene kitsoz très important. Tous kitsoz ki casse concentration bizin eliminé. Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) ti faire avance ene tissue ki ti ena dessin ki ti devant li akoze li ti pé casse so concentration. D'apres sa raisonnement la ene dimoune bizin pas faire namaz divant ene miroir parceki quand li pou guette guette li sa pou casse so concentration dans namaz.

Confectioneries
748
Muh*** asks:

Question

Assalamoualaikoum. I am the President of a Jamaat Khana, where we pray 5 times prayer everyday and Tarawhee also. Due to little amount of muswalis in my region, we do not perform Jummah. Concerning Jummah we have to travel 1km to to go a nearby musjeed. Presently, the nereby musjeed is demolished and being reconstructed. It will not be ready for Ramadhan. Jummah is being performed is a provisional place (All purpose musjeed hall) which is limited in space. Due this limited space Itekaf cannot be perform there. My question is that if we make arrangement to have more musawlis, can we perform Jummah and Itekaf for this Ramadhan until the Musjeed get constructed. Jazak Allah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Jumuah can be performed in any place provided it is accessible for everyone and all. It means that you can't perform in prison because not everybody is allowed to go inside. So you can perform Jumuah in the said Jamaat Khana. As for I'tikaaf it is compulsory to do it in a place which has a masjid status. So you can't keep I'tikaaf in a jamaat khana which has no masjid status.
Jummah

Aqeedah
751

Question

mone assure mo loto tou risk. Eski ena droit sa?

Answer

L'assurance en principe li haraam parceki li constitué de riba (l’intérêt). L'assurance l'auto li permette akoze nécessite. Sa nécessite la li déjà accomplir par tiers. Tous risque li plisse ki bizin akoze sa li pas permette.
Financial Transaction
752
Muh*** asks:

Question

Aslmkum mo ti aprand ki pas gagne droit mange bane zanimo ki ena griff. Mais aster kiken fine dir mwa ki gagne droit mange lièvre (lapain sauvage). Mo dan confusion parki li osi ena griff. 2.en passant si wi alors eski pu gagne droit mange lapain domestique?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Banne zanimo ki ena griffe ki pas gagne droit mangé c'est banne zanimo ki servi zotte griffe pou attaque et agresse zotte proie. Lapin et lièvre zotte pas dans sa catégorie la donc zotte permette.

yus*** asks:

Question

Assalaamou'alaikoum Mufti Sahab. Eski d'apres principe quand ene moufti pe reponne a ene question li obliger donne reference pour so banne reponses. Ene nommé Salim Dhonye de Grand Baie dire moi: "To finn deja lire enn Fatwa depuis Lajnah Daaimah oubien Al Azhar? chaque reponse rempli de reference, alors li pas correcte enn Mufti reponde coumsa. Li pe dire moi ki quand ou donne reponse alors ou pas mette aukene reference alors couma dimoune capave fer ou confiance. Capav gagne éclaircissement Mufti sahab. Jazakallah khair

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Dimoune ki ena confiance pas bizin reference et dimoune ki pena confiance jamais pou croire ou meme si ou mette ene librairie aussi devant li. Tous banne Mufti d'accord ki ene Mufti pas obligé donne reference parceki Ulama pas bizin reference et publique pas comprend reference. Oui si ena kitsoz contre Shariah ki nous fine dire sa ou capave faire resortir. Et sa aussi nous pou discute sa avec ene Aalim qualifié.
Knowledge
754

Question

Slm Our masjid committee asked an Aalim to give a talk on miraaj and he said he does not approve special and specifique bayaan on this night of miraaj etc.. I want to know why some ulamaa approve it and some disapprove it? What's jum opinion on bayaan the night of miraaj or any other special nights like al qadr, bara ah etc? What's the reason for disapproving it or approving it? Some other masaajid do the bayaan and sometime they are of other aqeedah and do some extra things in their gathering and our musalli go to them if we do not do it. What do we do in this situation? We have a huge crowd in the masjid same as jummah and if we do not take the opportunity to give a lecture and explain to them on the reality of miraaj and what was the real reason behind it they learn from other group and learn things that are harmful for their aqeedah and deen.. so should we let them do that or should we try stop them? Jzklh

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Teaching of Islam concerning masla masaail and aqeedah is very essential. It is normally done on a daily / weekly basis for those musallis who are regular. As for those who come once or twice yearly it is a good idea to address them in these specific occasion, but unfortunately nothing promising has been seen since years. Now it is rather customary than educative. Ulama who consider it a custom and against it they have good reason to abstain and those who do it may be because they have hope for a change or they are forced to do it by the Mutawallis (President of masjid).
Bidati

763

Question

Assalaamou'alaikoum. Voila reference ki JUM fine dimandé a propos banne critique ki banne Bareilwi pe dire concernant Maulana Ashraf Ali Thanwi (R.A) dans Hifzul Imaan et concernant Maulana Qaasim Nanotwi (R.A) dans Tahzeer un Naas. D'après mo recherche dans livre Hifzul Imaan sa sujet la fine traité lors page 14 / 15 et 16. Et dans Tahzeer un Naas li trouve lors page 4/5 et 17/18. mo pe envoye banne page la lor JUM so l'adresse e-mail pour zotte verifié.

Answer

Ok Jazaakumullahu khairaa.

Apres avoir guette reference ki ou fine envoyé nous fine échoué pou comprend coumaniere li fine comprend saki li fine comprend. Alhamdulillah nous comprend urdu et nous fine apprane urdu comme ene language dans ene façon professionnelle.

Quand Nabi (s.a.w) ti dire "Si ti ena Nabi pou vini après moi li ti pou Umar. Eski veut dire ki Nabi (s.a.w) fine dire ki pou ena nabi pou vini après li ? et li (Nabi s.a.w) pas dernier nabi?

Hujjatul Islaam Hazrat Qasimul Uloom wal Khairaat Mawlana Muhammad Qaasim Saheb (Ramatullahi alaih) fine servi le mot "bil farz" et bil farz veut dire "Ba farze mahaal" et sa veut dire "suppose ene kitsoz ki impossible". Par sa mot la Hujjatul Islaam (Rahmatullaahi alaih) fine déjà fini montré ki li impossible ki kikene gagne nubuwwat apres Nabi (S.a.w). Pou Hazrat Mawlana Ashraf Ali Thanwi (Rahmatullaahi alaih) aussi pas fine reussi trouvé cote sa li fine alle comprend sa. Nous pas dire ki li pas comprend urdu, mais nous pou dire, alle appranne urdu avec banne ki conne urdu bien.

Aqeedah
764

Question

Could I please get your mail address so that I can forward you the references needed so that you can answer it publicly on your website as you said: Eski Maulana Thanwi (R.A) fine ecire dans ene livre ki appelle Hifzul Imaan ki Nabi (S.A.W) so connaissance couma dire fou? 765

Question

Assalaamou'alaikoum Mufti Sahab. Ena ene page facebook ki apelle 'Minhaaj Us Sunnah' ki dirigé par ene nommé Salim Dunhoye de Grand Baie et lors sa page la li attribué boucoup fausseté a banne Tabligh Jamaat en manipulant l'esprit de banne dimoune. Lors so page la li fine refute reponse ki ou ti donner deuxieme fois concernat Majlis-e-Zikr (ref: 711). Li dire ki le hadice de Abdullah bin Mas'oud c'est ene hadice faible et li presente banne references suivants, li dire: 1) Hadith la paratre dans Musannaf Abdur Razzaq et Al Mu'jamul Kabeer de Tabraani. 2) Ishaaq bin Ibrahim malgres li ti 'sudouq' alors ena ene confusion. Imam Abdur Razzaq fine deceder quand li ti ena environs 6 ans. 3) Allamah Ibrahim bin Mousa Al Abnasiy dire: "mo trouve ceki fine rapporter depuis Tabraani depuis Ishaq bin Ibrahim AL Duburi depuis Abdur Razzaq, banne hadice ki mo rejette li bien meme. ...Ibrahim Al Harbiy dire: 'Abdur Razzaq fine deceder et Al Duburi ti ena 6 ou 7 ans. (Shadha Al Fayaah 2/747) 4) Allamah Al Dhahabiy dire: 'Abou Al Bakhtariy li faible. (Al Kawakib al Nayyirat pg.61) 5) Imam Jalaluddin Al Suyouti dire: 'Ensuite mo fine trouve preuve qui rejette sa parole la depuis Ibn Mas'oud. ( Al Hawi 1/379) 6) Imam Ahmad Ibn Hambal raconte depuis Abou Wail li dire: " Sa banne ki pe pretende ki Abdullah bin Mas'oud ti pe empeche faire zikr, jamais mo fine assize avec Abdullah bin Mas'oud dans ene majlis, mais li fine faire zikr la dans. ( Kitabuz zuhd de Imam Ahmad bin Hambal) En dernier li dire: " Pour le moment Mufti essaye trouve ene chemin sorti, mais avec reference SVP. Insha Allah tres prochainement ou pou gagne ene reponse plus detaillé lors ce hadice de Abdullah bin Mas'oud.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Sa faire nous ene grand plaisir ki zotte fine commence initié zotte et interressé a verification de sanad. Insha Allah sa li pou servi nous pour mieux comprend la pratique de sunnah et la pratique de bid'ah. Sa hadith la li paraite dans Sunan Ad-Daarimi aussi si ti capave ranne nous ene service et vérifié so sanad aussi. En passant ene nommé Mufti Abdus Samee' fine accepté sa hadith la.
Akhlaaq-Tasawwuf
766
Far*** asks:

Question

Aslm. Eski gagne droit envoye casse zakat dans banne institution Islamique a l'etranger? Si gagne droit ki banne kikchose ki nous bizin guetter avant envoyer?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. La monnaie zakaat li plis bon pour partage li avec banne dimoune dans ou l'endroit, a moins si lezot place banne dimoune zotte plis dans le besoin,lerla li pou plis bon donne sa banne dimoune dans le besoin la. Donc si banne institution a l’étrangé zotte plis dans le besoin alors pena narien ki contre Shariah dans aide zotte. Dans la meme façon si la personne pe tire so zakaat avant l'année complété alors dans sa cas la aussi li capave avoye so l'argent cote li envi. Dans tous sa la nous bizin verifié cote nous pe avoyé li banne cas genuine.
Zakaat
767

Question

aslm. i cant bring myself to trust my hubby. please give me a solution.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Why you don"t trust your hubby? Anything fishy?

Question

Knowledge
769
Suh*** asks:

Question

We got our nikah contracted while we were in india. Nu 2 mauriciens Kot bisin enregistrer sa svp

Answer

It should be done in India. Nikaah ki faire par la bas bizin enregistré la bas meme. neque ena pou preserve sa papier enregistrement la ou bien nikaah naama la. Ici a Maurice nous ena M.F.C ki enregistré banne nikaah. Mais li enregistré banne nikaah ki célébré par banne personne ki fine gagne autorisation de coté M.F.C et ki fine rempli lor forme M.F.C.
Nikah
770

Question

aslm. it is said that a person must not have jealousy inside him/her.. but what about when a wife gets jeolous when her husband talks to ghair mehram women or vice versa or when ghair mehram women try to flirt with the hubby? is this type of jealousy also forbidden in islam?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. This is not termed as hassad (Jealousy). It is known as ghairat, which can be termed in creole as " l'amour propre ". Otherwise the husband will be qualified as "sans pudeur" or " sans l'amoure propre" or in the language of hadeeth "Ad-Dayyous"
Social life
771

Question

Eski Kan touye moustique wudhu case

Answer

Non
Woudhou
772
naz*** asks:

Question

Si avant lheure sehri termine nu fini gargariser et mette delo dans nene avec l'intention ghussal (farz) et ensuite nu fer ghussal après sehri sans mette delo dans la bouche et nene eski ghussal pu valable

Answer

Oui li valable, mais pas nécessaire complique la vie parcequi après sehri aussi capave faire ghussal et li autorisé pas exagéré dans gargarisé et dans mette de l'eau dans nenez, capave faire li légèrement en sorte ki delo pas rente dans la gorge et ni monte dans narine.
Ghousl
773

Question

Is there a wazzifah to do for a woman to get pregnant?
774
Ama*** asks:

Question

Si mette delhuile ou bien goute dans zoreille eski roza cassé ? Mo fine tanne dire ki faudrait eardrum la perforé lerla li cassé?

Answer

D’après masla ki fine mentionné dans banne livre de fiqh, mette de l'huile dans zoreil li casse roza. Banne Fuqaha (Jurists) d'auparavant zotte ti sous l'impression ki zoreil ena ene liaison directe avec cerveau. Mais banne recherche moderne pe montré ki li pas coumsa. En realité sa de l'huile la li pénétré en dans a travers banne pore, pas directe. Akoze sa zotte dire ki mette de l'huile dans zoreil li pas casse roza. A moins si eardrum (tambour zoreille) fine perforé lerla roza pou cassé. Donc preferable évité. Mais si jamais kiken fine mette de l'huile dans zoreil et li conné ki perna aukene perforation alors nous pas capave dire ki so roza fine cassé.
Ramadhaan

776

Question

eski madam capave suivre jamaat pour tarawee?

Answer

Madame li faire so namaz taraweeh dans so lakaz li tousel pareil couma li faire so 5 fois namaz dans lakaz. Sa meme façon li pli bon pou ene madame ki Nabi (Sallallahu alaihi wassallam) fine préconisée et dans sa façon la meme li vine pli pres avec Allah Ta'aala. Dans sa façon la meme ena pli boucou sawaab.
Taraawih

yas***@gmail.com asks:

Question

When can we pay fitra in the month of ramadhan?

Answer

Zakaat
780
Suh*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum Fitrah c'est quoi? Et kan bisin tire sa? Merci

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Ene Ibaadat ki réalisé par donne ene somme d'argent a banne pauvre a l'occasion de Eidul Fitr. Sa capave donné aussi dans le mois de Ramadwan. Sa somme d'argent la li évalué a Rs 80 pour cette année par tête. Li obligatoire lor ene personne ki possède en excès de so nécessité et so dette la valeur de Rs 30,000. en la monnaie liquide, ou en forme bijoux, ou en forme marchandise commerciale, ou en forme banne objets dans la case ki plis ki nécessité. La personne ki sa fitra la li obligatoire lor li, li bizin tire de so côté et aussi de la part de so banne zenfant mineur c'est a dire Rs 80 par tête.
Sadaqah
781

Question

Is it permissible to have sex during Ramadan. Can we have sex in the night and take bath before doing the sahar?

Answer

Yes.
Ramadhaan
782
Yus*** asks:

Question

"What is the opinion of the ulamas about the sending of greetings of Ramadhan and Eid". Jazakumullah

Answer

It is a dua that a person is allowed to make for his / her fellow friends and families. But it shouldn't be made customarily by sending cards etc. By doing this the spirit of dua disappears and it only remains something customary which people do by courtesy.
Ramadhaan
783
Tam*** asks:

Question

Aslmkum. ESKI gagne droit dire Ramadan Kareem ? Parki ceki mo coner ki Kareem c'est ene attribu d'allah.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. C'est ene nom ki pas attribué a seulement Allah ta'aala parceki dans Qur'aan meme sa fine associé avec lezot apart Allah. Dans Qur'aan ena "Ajr-un Kareem", "Qur'aan-un Kareem" "Rizq-un Kareem" etc.
Ramadhaan
784

Question

Assalaamou'laikoum. Qui ou point de vue lors faire zikrullah en groupe et a haute voix? Mo penser ki ena dimoune fine mal compren reponse ki ou fine donner quelque temps de cela. Jazakallah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Dans nous banne réponse ki nous fine donné concernant zikr, nous fine cause seulement lor zikr avec ene jamaat ki dirigé par ene personne. Sa façon faire zikr-la li pas mentionné dans hadith. C'est akoze sa meme ki Hazrat Abdullah Bin Mas'oud (Radhiyallahu anhu) fine désapprouve li. Probablement li fine ena ene crainte ki plitard dimoune pou prend sa comme ene pratique et ene sunnate établi. Quant a banne mashaaikh ki pratique sa alors zotte faire li zisse comme ene traitement spirituelle ki ena plitot ene aspect pédagogique ki zotte gagne droit adopté selon zotte analyse. Jamais zotte faire li avec l'intention ki li sunnate. Faire zikr fort ou bien doucement tous les deux permette, mais en principe faire li doucement li pli bon. a moins si ene personne faire li fort pou ene raison spécifique alors sa aussi ena so justification. Coumca meme si ene groupe pe assizé chakene pe faire so zikr pou li, fort ou doucement, alors li permette.
Akhlaaq-Tasawwuf
785
zah*** asks:

Question

Si quand pe cuit mange la fumee rente par la bouche ou nene eski roza casse?

Answer

Si sa arrivé involontairement roza pas cassé

Assalaamoualaikum wa rahmatulllahi wa barakaatuhu When I enter the Salaat room ladies section to perform Salaat & imam is starting jamaat Salaat for the men @ the same time, What should I do , perform my Salaat individually or follow the imam? Please note that the ladies section is located on the second floor of the mosque, separate entry & no mixing with ghair mahram.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam wa rahmatulllahi wa barakaatuhu. To be on the safe side perform your salaat individually.
