Muh*** asks:

Question

Aslm mufti sahab ...ki ou opinion lor sa livre ki apel nahjul balagha la Jazakallah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. C'est ene livre ki attribué a Hazrat Ali (radhiyallaahu anhu) ki normalement zotte servi pou literature arabe. La plupart du temps li pas publié par banne sunni. Ena possibilité ki ena kitchose ki pas corresponde avec aqeedah Ahlus Sunnah Wal Jamaa'ah. Nous pena li. Nous pou essaye rode ene pou vérifié.
Miscellaneous
789

Question

Asln mufti... chak foi mo rev lamer. Sometym bne gros vague p vine.derier.moi ek m p sover... ek sometimes m p nager dan laner ek ena gro gro vague. Ek sometym soidisan m p nager ek bien dan fond dan lamer ena ene plass ki as if ene lot lemorne. Dernier fois mne rever soidisan m missier en uniform soldat in fr camarad r ene jihadist ek line sap so lavie alor jihadist la in estime li bku... ek dan mem rev, m dan ene desert kot ena ene mntagne ( lepok hijrat... mntagn kot serpend ti pik hazrat abu bakar ra... )... astr mntagne li en roches. M kuzin p dir moi fer attention serpents. M p dir li b hazrat abu bakar RA in deja etre piker maii li pne ggn nanier... moi ossi mo pa pu ggnrr... astr soidisan desert la in vine o milieu lamer... m p rod dessan mai pa p kapav. M kuzin in pousse moi pu ki m kapav dessan... astr kan mne arriv lor laplage... ena deu serpant... m p dir aye m serpend in vine plat. M croir line mort.... en mem temp m ene kuzine p ask moi kitchoz... m pne reussi dir li... ek mo p dir li sover... gros vague p vini.... mne cumense galouper... kifr chak foi m rev sa bne kalitr rev la???

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Dimoune ki ena sinusite ki habitué reve la mer, est ce ki ou ena sa probleme la? Anyway contacter nous dans bureau lor 2400439 pou nous capave discute sa.
Dream
790
Ano*** asks:

Question

Assalaamoualaikum wa rahmatulllahi wa barakaatuhu Is a lady allowed to follow the imam in the haram shareef in Makkah? If she performs the Salaat in the women section only! What must she do if she is performing tawaaf & Azaan begins , congregational salaat soon starts, she will normally have to interrupt the tawaaf of umrah for Salaat, then @ this stage where it is difficult for her to return to the hotel to perform Salaat and to return back for completion of the umrah, what is Mufti saheb advice?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. In case a woman happen to attend salaat in haram shareef behind the imaam so her salaat will be valid. However, it is not recommended for women to attend salaat in masaajid. According to Rasoulullah (Sallallahu alaihi wassallam) the more the place is hidden the more her salaat will be better. So in Hajj or while being in Madinah Munawwarah it is recommended for her to observe her salaat at the hotel. In case where azaan and salaat start while she is doing tawaaf, she interrupts the tawaaf and go back to ladies section. Afterwards she may continue after the jamaat is over.
Female
791
Ano*** asks:

Question

Assalaamoualaikum wa rahmatulllahi wa barakaatuhu Can a muhrim trim the hair of his wife (who is also in ihram)before shaving his head to come out of ihram for optional umrah? Or should this muhrim free himself first from ihram then trim the hair of his wife.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh. He may trim his wife's hair before his.

abd*** asks:

Question

whether in the 10 days of muharram or mira'j or nisf shaa'baan if we make bayaan to remind people of deen but having in mind only for the purpose of islaah-e-nafs, will it be ok?

Answer

Islaah-e-nafs or Deen are things we need every day of our lives. We can't understand why we should be accustomed of doing it in specific occasion or particular days.
Akhlaaq-Tasawwuf
796
abd*** asks:

Question

why is it that everywhere you go from amongst the sect of muslims you see that they have abolished jihad even when after having becoming incumbent upon us because no one is discharging that responsability for us? is it not in the quraan? jazak

Answer

Jihaad will remain till Qiyaamah. Every body has to carry it out to the extent of his capacity. Maybe the Muslims every where in our days are not capable to execute it. Otherwise the greatest jihaad (i.e jihaad against nafs and desires) which is in the capacity of everyone and all is being neglected everywhere even by Ulama. Insha Allah if we execute this jihaad one day will come when the second step will be easy for us. Make dua.
Akhlaaq-Tasawwuf
797
Ala*** asks:

Question

Just to know that if a woman is fed up with her husband's irresponsible behavior,his childish manners,he does not lend any support to his wife and most of all he does not take his responsibily of being a husband and he keep on heeding his family on how to lead his wife and sometime he also impose some unjust condition on her,he does not even make time for his wife.Due to those mentioned reason the wife can't feel the same love for her husband anymore and does not want to proceed her life with him but then there is sometime when the husband is kind as long as there is no issues..now the wife is confuse...what do you advice her? And as i know istikhara is prayed before getting married but is it right for her to pray istikhara in that case while the husband is still around and living under the same roof?

Answer

It seems there is a big problem in your conjugal life in the light of what you saying. But it can be solved. Both of you should spare some times to see an Aalim who can evaluate the situation thoroughly before giving any advice.
Social life
798

Question

Assalamualaikoum, Dans Hadith, Nabi s.a.w fine informe nous tant ki nou pas tir fitra, nou roza reste pending entre la terre et le ciel et fitra combler ban manquement ki fine ena dan nou roza etc... Si fitra so but c'est sa be kifer nou bizin tir fitra pou ban ti z'enfant aussi car ban ti z'enfant zot pas garde roza, ni roza faraz lor zot, li pas pe paraitre fer sense, eski li pas ene contradiction sa? Jazak Allah Khair

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Ena plusieurs facteur dans fitrah. Ene facteur saki ou fine mentionné et ene l'autre facteur c'est pou vine en aide de banne dimoune misére. Apart sa capave ena lezot facteur aussi ki nous pas conné. Akoze sa banne fuqaha (Juristes) applique li couma li fine vini dans hadith. Dans hadith dire ki li appliqué pou banne ti zenfant aussi.
Sadaqah

803

Question

Aslkm Mufti Saab. Est ce qui endroit mettre Taweez? Ena preuve lor la?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Oui li autorisé si saki fine marqué dans sa ta'weez la li comprehensible et pena narien de shirk la dans. D’après ene hadith de Tirmizi Shareef Nabi (s.a.w) ti enseigne ene dua a ene dimoune ki gagne peur a soir. Hazrat Abdullah bin Amr (radhiyallaahu anhu) ti enseigne sa so banne zenfant et banne zenfant ki ti petit et pas ti conne lire , li ti écrire sa et attache sa avec zotte.
Dua
805
izr*** asks:

Question

is nikah acceptable by just taking the name of Allah but not without the two witnesses ??

Answer

Nikah is a contract that is concluded by an offer on one side and acceptation on the other side before two males witnesses or one male and two females witnesses. No nikah is valid without witnesses.
Nikah

Question

Assalaamualaikum. If an appointed imam in a masjid disagrees with some administrative issue or else, what should he do first? what is the most intelligent step to take? Publicise it through his aalim friends or talk to the committee members and find a solution to it?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. The first step is to talk to the committee. Anyway he may seek advice from his colleagues about how to address the committee.

Question

Assalamoualaikoum, Ene dimoune dire moi si mo alle faire ene Umrah n'importe quand, Hajj vine Faraz lor moi, eski li vrai sa? Seki mo ti coner c'est si mo faire ene Umrah dans le mois de Shawaal ou zil qaada lerla Hajj vine faraz lor moi, lequel ki correcte?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Quand ene dimoune faire Umrah sa na pas faire Hajj vine obligatoire lor li. Amoin si li pe faire Umrah dans banne jours de Hajj.

812

Question

Assalaamou'alaikoum. Est ce qui nous capave appelle sa ene malhonnêteté et ene tricherie de la part de ene personne ki sois disant lor la verité ki quand ou pose li question lor so page facebook ou bien lor so message privé li block ou akoze ki li perna reponse pou reponne? Lor ene page facebook appelle "Minhajussunnah" (now changed to Saleem Dhonye), S. Dhonye ti pe critique banne grand grand Ulama, ti pe mette acusation lor zotte et ti pe mal interprète zotte banne parole zisse pou li capave embette dimoune et pou critique tabligh jamaat, couma mo fine commence refute li et mo fine reponne a tous so banne propagande, alors li fine block moi tention dimoune trouve so fausseté. Coumsa meme mo ti pe refute li lor so message privé. Li fine dire ki Hadith de Ibne Mas'oud (radhiyallahu anhu) concernant majlise zikr ki trouve dans Sunan Daarimi li faible, mo fine dire li amene preuve, li dire moi ki li fine deja prepare banne preuve li fine gardé, mais quand mo fine demande li li pas fine capav donne moi, alors dans message privé si li fine block moi akoze ki li perna reponse. Eski nous capave ena confiance lor sa kalité dimoune la? Si vraiment li ti dans la verité li ti pou agir coumsa ? Eski nous appelle sa minhaajus-sunnah ou bien minhaajus-shaitwan ?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salam. Ene dimune honnête li bizin toujours accepté so erreur si li fine arrivé trouve li. Persisté et faire la tète dure li pa manière ene bon musulman.
Akhlaaq-Tasawwuf

Question

Assalamualaikoum, someone ask a question regarding having bayan on specific nights for islaahi purpose and your answer was, islah is important everyday so y accustomed it to specific days. Is it not because on these specific nights, more people comes to masjid and its a big opportunity to pass an spiritual message to the public than other normal nights. Is that not a good excuse to have program on these nights?

Answer

It has become a custom rather than a means of dawah. Anyway its not forbidden but can't be imposed upon an imam if he is not willing to do it.

Sai*** asks:

Question

My question is actually certain masjids in our country started recently to practise tahajjud during the last 10 days of Ramadan with jamaat, making elaan, opening masjids, put on lighting, & accommodate ladies also, what is the shariah ruling?

Answer

It is against sunnah to perform tahajjud in jamaat. Ladies going to masjid for even farz namaz is makrouh.
Sounnah-Nafl
825
Sai*** asks:

Question

My question is these masjid performing tahajjud in the last 10 days of Ramadan do perform a second witr with jamaat & make a second qunoot also. The second imam is not the same as in tarawee & the 1st witr, they interchange so as to avoid the same person to repeate witr. It appears to be good but wasn't that the general rule of "no two witr" applied to masjid administration also?

Answer

Its not permissible for a person to perform witr twice.
Witr
826

Question

Aslmkm.. In Fadhail Durood, p.97, Incident no (Hikayat) 35: The Messenger of Allah (allegedly) said: “Whoever wants something from anyone should go to his grave and supplicate to Allah for it.” Again on page 109, Incident number (Hikayat) - 48, Fadhail Durood (The last chapter in Fadhail ‘Amaal, Vol.I): “Sh. Abu Khair Qattah said that: I went to Madinah and stayed there for five days but did not achieve the pleasure and satisfaction. I went to the graves of the Prophet, Hadhrat Abu Bakr and Hadhrat Umar and said, “O Messenger of Allah I am your guest tonight.” Then I left the place and slept behind the minbar. I saw in my dream that the Prophet of Allah with Abu Bakr on his right, Umar on his left and Ali was in front of them all. Hadhrat Ali then shook me and said that the Messenger of Allah has come to visit me. I got up and kissed the Prophet between his eyes. The Messenger of Allah then gave me a piece of bread which I ate half and when I woke up the other half was in my hand.” What does Zakaria Kandalvi wants to prove through these evil fabrications. That making a supplication near the graves pays off by a visit by the Prophet himself and being awarded a piece of bread. And do things in dream last after the dream is over. No! but Zakaria Kandalvi wants to put the idea to his readers that the Messenger of Allah and those illustrious Companions visited Sh.Qattah in real life and not just a dream. someone sent me this and said these are the things we teach in masjids and do u think u people are on truth after reading this.. he also said there are many more he'll send me.. can u provide me with an answer? jzklh

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Unless proven impossible by way of shariat,everything may occur or happen and is possible. There is no evidence in sharia that indicates that these kinds of incidents cannot take place.
Duroud
827

As Salaam Mufti I just want to know if i can use ethanol alcohol >90% food grade as refrigerant in a machine. Supplier recommend me to use above due viscosity at -30 temp rrquired.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. There is nothing objectionable with utilising ethanol as a refrigerant.
Miscellaneous

The imam doesn't make dua after namaz. He just sits and makes his own tasbeeh and stands up after few mins after making salaam. Sometimes after making his tasbeeh he raises his hands and makes his own silent dua 2 3 mins after namaz has ended. This is rare also. Is this correct?

Answer

Nothing bad in it. Its all right.

830

Question

Assalamualaikoum, Ene Mufti de l'Afrique du Sud ine dire ki ene missié musulman gagne droit marier avec ene madame chretiene (ahle kitaab) meme si madame la croire dans Trinité. Li dire li pas recomander mais li permettre. li dire ki ban madames chretiene de nos jours forme parti dan Ahle Kitab ki fine mentioné dan quran meme zot croire dan Trinité. Li dire aussi ki dans l'epoque de Nabi s.a.w aussi ti ena ban madames ki ti chretienes et ti croire dan Trinité et Nabi s.a.w pas ti pe empeche ban missié pou marier avec zot et meme dan l'epoque ban Sahaba, ena sahaba fine marié avec madame chretienne ki ti croire dan trinité. Eski li vrai li permettre pou ene missié musulman marier avec ene madame chretienne mem si li croire dan Trinité?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Nikah avec ene juive ou ene chrétienne li ene nikah valable dans le sens ki relation avec sa madame li pu ene relation halal ene zenfant ki pu gagné li pu ene zenfant légitime. Mais malgres tout li strictement déconseillé parski li ene danger pu banne zenfant zot deen.
Nikah

Question

Aslkm Mufti Saab. Mo ena bans camarades kaafir et souvent des fois banla pose moi question : To Bondieu coté ? Et moi comme reponse, mo dire zotte, sa question la pas bon posé. Mais, zotte dire moi, qui qualité sa, to pas conné to Bondieu coté ? Alors, mo question c'est : Cote Allah été ?

Answer

mos***@gmail.com asks:

Question

Is Restoria Discrete halaal? The manufacturers claim that it helps to restore hair to its natural colour without dye, peroxide or ammonia. It works with the natural protein in hair to create melanin-like pigment that gradually, naturally brings back hair color. Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sulfur, Ammonium Chloride, Lead Acetate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate,Fragrance (parfum), Denatonium Benzoate. website: http://www.expressformen.com.au/products/restoria-discreet-cream-and-lotion/

Answer

Regrettably, we do not have information on the product. However, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Fragrance (parfum) are doubtful Ingredients and require further investigation in regards to their sources of derivation/components.
Medical Products

839
z*** asks:

Question

Asslm.when is hajj compulsory on a person?how much moneymust he posses for hajj to be compulsory?if a person does not has cash in hand but has Rs80,000 worth jewellery?must he go for hajj

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. During the months of Hajj (i.e Shawwal, Zul Qa'da and the beginning of Zul Hijja), if a person possesses sufficient wealth to cover his ticket expense to Makkah and back, his accommodation and food expenses in Makkah, Mina and Arafaat until he returns to his country and he has the means to leave behind a sufficient amount of money for maintaining his dependents in his absence, then hajj becomes compulsory on him. Besides his basic necessities (e.g house, car, furniture, clothing etc.) he should consider all his extra belongings together with his jewelries in evaluating his means.
Hajj
840
Ray*** asks:

Question

Aslm Mufti Sab Mo fine lire dans ou la gazette, ou fine dire Allah Li partout. Est-ce qui vraimem Allah Li partout ?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Allah li avec ou acote ou eté. Koumaniere li avec ou, fodé pa pose question lor la parski Allah li pa kuma ene objet ou ene le corp ki si li ici ,li pa laba ou bien si li laba li pa ici. Fodé pas compare Allah so " ici,laba" avec ene le corp physique so "ici,laba". Sa li au dela de nou compréhension et sa li forme parti dan banne kiksoz ki appelle mutashabihaat ki Allah même conne so vrai portée.
Aqeedah

846
ano*** asks:

Question

A person made the following wasiyyah regarding his wealth before passing away: 10% of the whole for masjid, 25% for his wife and the rest for his nephew (Brother's son). He passed away leaving behind his wife, a brother and 2 sisters. The family members want to distribute his inheritance according to Sharia.

Answer

First of all one should know that the obligation of fulfilling the wasiyyat of the deceased person is incumbent only up to one third of the total assets in the estate. So 10% of the whole estate will be allocated to the masjid, and the remaining 23.3% of the one third will be given to the nephew. The wife will inherit 25% of the remaining two thirds as a normal heir (N.B wasiyyat is not valid in favour of an heir, so she will not inherit therefrom) and finally the remainder of the two thirds will be equally divided into four shares, two shares for the brother ( representing 37.5% of the remaining 2/3 of the estate) and one share (representing 18.75% of the remaining 2/3 of the estate) for each sister.
Inheritance
847
Mah*** asks:

Question

During the absence of the imam another person stands in, but his tajweed is not always correct,is it ok to do namaz behind such a person?

Answer

Imamat of somebody who does not read Quran correcly in the presence of somebody who knows it, is not valid.
Congregation
848
Ano*** asks:

Question

Assalaamu alaikum. Is the following article authentic? Jazakumul khair It is thus recommended to do an utmost of ibaadats during this blessed day and also during its night (Laÿlat-ul-‘Aashourah), to make charity and to observe the roza (fast) during this blessed day. Hazrat Hafsah (r.a) reports that the holy prophet was regularly fasting on the day of the `Aashourah. It should be noted that at the beginning of Islam the roza of Yawm-e-`Aashourah was formerly compulsory, but upon the last ummah (people), when the roza of Ramadwaan became faraz (compulsory), the roza of Yawm-e-`Aashourah becomes a significant nafil (surplus) According to a hadeeth of Muslim shareef, Hazrat Abdullah Ibne Abbaas (r.a) reports that when the holy prophet observed the roza of Yawm-e-`Aashourah, he also advised the sahabas to make the same way. Some sahabas told him that the Jews also was respecting and observed this roza of `Aashourah and so the beloved prophet replied that if he would be still alive the following year, he would also observe the day before, i.e. the 9th day of Muharram too. But the holy prophet did intiqaal (deceased) the following year, but since the sahabas, taabi’eens and awliyaas who followed all kept this principle by observing the roza the two days altogether, i.e. 9th and the 10th of Muharram. However, it should be noted that if somebody does not have the occasion to observe the roza the 9th day, he can observe only the 10th day, i.e. Yawm-e-`Aashourah only (except if it happen to be a Friday, so, it will be necessary for him to add another day, therefore the saturday also). According to a hadeeth of Mishkaat shareef, Hazrat Abdullah Ibne Mas’ood (r.a) reported that the beloved prophet said that the muslims who offer Swadaqa on the blessed day of `Aashourah, only for the pleasure of Allah ta’ala, on his turn Allah makes the promise that he will grant these people blessings (barakats) in their food (rozi) during one whole year.Hazrat Jaabir (r.a) and Hazrat U’ayna (r.a) specified that during 50 to 60 years they practised the recommendation of this hadeeth, by observing the roza, nafil namazs and the swadaqa on the day of `Aashourah and could witness how Allah increased their rozi and they thus recommended to all muslims to do the same. Hazrat Ali (r.a) said that on the day of `Aashourah, cut your nails, take a special bath, put the surma (black eyes) and the perfume (attar), observe the roza, make the namazs nafils, offer the swadaqa, make the tilaawat (reading) of Qur’aan shareef, make Istighfaar (asking allah for forgiveness), make zikrr etc… Allah appreciate very much these ibaadats from us. Upon the arrival of the night of `Aashourah (Laylat-ul-`Aashourah/Shabbe-`Aashourah), Hazrat Abdullah Ibne `Abbaas (r.a) recommended to make 4 raka’ats of namaz nafils as follows: in each raka’at, after sourah al-Faatihah, read 1 time Aayat-ul-kursiy and 3 times sourah al-Ikhlaas. After the salaam, read 100 times the 3rd kalimah. This ibaadat purifies believer from his sins, raises his faith (imaan) and attracts on him the blessings (barkats) of Allah ta’ala. During the day of the `Aashourah, at the time of Tchaast (between 9 o’clock and 11 o’clock of the morning), read 2 raka’ats of namaz nafil with the niyyat of Swalaat-ul-`Aashourah and in each raka’at, after sourah al-Faatihah, read 10 times sourah al-Ikhlaas. After the salaam, read 1 time Aayat-ul-kursiy and 9 times Daroud-e-Ibraheem and then 70 times : “Hasbiyallaahu wa ni’mal wakeel, ni’mal mawlaa wa ni’man-nasweerr”. After that, make your du’as, insha-Allah they will be accepted. Aameen.

Answer

Wa alaikoum salaam. According to our research the followings are authentic: (1). (It is thus recommended to do an utmost of ibaadats during this blessed day and also during its night). Hadice states only fasting on the 9th and 10th or 10th and 11th. (2).The rest is ok till (except if it happen to be a Friday, so, it will be necessary for him to add another day, therefore the saturday also). (3). (About offering swadaqa) In fact the hadice according to Raddul Muhtaar is as follows: “One who spend generously on his family …” (4).(About the number of years Hazrat Jaabir (RA) and Hazrat U’ayna (RA)) According to Radul Muhtaar it is 40 years. (5). N.B. The hadice stating putting surma on this occasion is very weak and cannot be considered. Some ‘Ulama qualifies it as fabricated. (6). The rest are not found in hadice according to our knowledge.
Muharram
849

Question

Please clarify the sunnat way of clipping the nails.
850

Question

Assalamoualaikoum Ou dire ki Allah li partou be eski dan quran Allah pas dire ki li la haut so Arsh? Mo fine apprend ki Allah li la haut so Arsh et so connaissance ki partou.. eski li pas correct?

Answer

ceki nou fine déclaré et ou fine dire tous les deux dans Quran et hadith. Ceki ou fine dire ki Allah li partout de par so connaissance c'est ene explication. Mais explication ki nou fine donné li élabore tou les deux. Nou re attire ou l'attention ki li pas ene sujet pou discuté san prend ene grand risque.
Aqeedah

Question

Is it safe to eat chicken or meat of animals that are slaughtered in Saudi Arabia itself knowing that these animals are mostly slaughtered by strangers working there for a living and many of them are not deeni inclined and they do not pray salaat? When I went for hajj few years back I was shocked to see how these people cheat on qourbani animals and they don't even pronounce bismillah whilst slaughtering. Based on this can we say that all animals slaughtered in Saudi Arabia are halaal safe or should we rather be cautious even if it is local slaughtered animal?

Answer

In this situation it is not safe to say that all animal slaughtered in Saudi Arabia are safe. We advise to avoid meat products.
Meat-Poultry

Uwa*** asks:

Question

As salam walaikum. Mo ena 18 ans, Mo pe encore faire l'etude, Mo envie Prend part pour qurbani. Eski Mo parent gagne droit Prend zisse 1 part pu moi?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. D'abord bizin gueté si qourbani li obligatoire lor ou ou bien non. Si li obligatoire, ou parent capave faire li de ou coté par ou permission. Si ou parent zotte possede ene quantité ki faire qourbani vine waajib lor zotte alors zotte aussi zotte bizin faire zotte qourbani.
Qurbaani
855

Question

Assalaamu alaikum. Eski qourbani pou compté si fine faire avek ene zanimo ki infecté par la fièvre aphteuse?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. La fièvre Aphteuse la nous pas conne so gravité, mais d’après principe ene zanimo ki li gravement malade pas gagne droit faire Qourbani avec sa. Si maladie la li qualifié de ene maladie grave alors nous pas pou capave faire qourbani avec ene zanimo ki ena sa maladie la.
Qurbaani
856

Question

Kan ene madame malade eski li obligatoire lor so missier pou faire so banne depense medicale?

Answer

Li pas obligé faire li comme ene droit nikaah, mais li obligé faire li comme ene droit humanitaire. C'est a dire ene madame li perna droit réclame sa droit la dans ene la court. C'est ene kitsoz ki missié la même bizin faire depi so propre volonté.
Nikah
857

I dream that i saw the moon for eid ul fitr, does this have any meaning?

Answer

It maybe meant that a type of happiness is waiting for you.
Dream
858

Question

Is it halaal to buy on the internet by paying through " paypal " or other credit cards ?

Answer

If he doesn't have any money in the pay-pal company or in the bank and they are paying for him, so in this case the surplus charges seem to be interest on the borrowed amount which obviously will not be halal. In case he has money in that company or in the bank the surplus maybe assume to be a charge due to services rendered. In this case it seems to be okay.
Financial Transaction
859
Muh*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaykum. I am from South Africa. Most of the hotels and resorts in Mauritius say they cater for halal. Is there any way to verify if the meat is approved by any Halal body? If so, which Halal bodies certify meat at the hotels. Jazakallah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. None of the resorts is certified by Jamiatul Ulama of Mauritius. As for other organisations we can't say anything about them as we do not have any idea regarding their criteria they apply for certification. JUM did make request several times to obtain their halal standard but unfortunately did not receive any reply.
Outlets-Restaurants
860
Les***@peacecaravan.co.za asks:

Question

Greetings from South Africa Can you please tell me the position of the Council regarding the export of live animals to Mauritius. I would really appreciate your assistance Many thanks and stay well.

Answer

Our organization Jamiatul Ulama of Mauritius is a religious organization and doesn't deal with export and import. Please refer to the embassy of Mauritius in South Africa. We wish you good luck.
Miscellaneous
861

Question

Aslmkm w w .. Ki preuve ena lors waseelah?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. D'abord bizin comprend ki veut dire waseelah. Waseelah veut dire moyen. D'après Shariat waseelah signifié ene moyen pour approché avec Allah Ta'aala et sa li assuré par amène Imaan lor Allah et so Rasoul (Sallallaahu alaihi wassallam) et par faire banne bonnes actions. Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wassallam) fine dire dans sa sens la ki meilleur façon pour approcher avec Allah Ta'aala c'est faire banne actions ki Allah Ta'aala fine faire obligatoire lor ene personne et après sa c'est bannes action volontaires et supplémentaires. Nous ena ene hadith cote 3 personnes ti bloké dans ene la cave, alors chakene parmi zotte fine faire dua par waseelah de zotte plis bon action, pou Allah Ta'aala tire zotte depi sa difficulté la. Sa même ki appelle dimane dua par barakate banne bonnes actions. Sa li prouvé ki ene dimoune capave faire dua par barakate et waseelah de so propre action. Eski dua capave faire par barakat banne personnage pieux? Ena ki d'accord ena ki pas d'accord. A noté ki dimane dua par barakat banne personnage pieux li pas farz, li pas wajib, et li pas sunnate. Forcé forcé li ene mustahab, et règlement concernant mustahab c'est nous faire li tanque ki sa pas amène nous vers ene kitsoz dangereux. Donc si jamais nous trouvé ki ena grand danger dans faire ene mustahab alors li devoir de ene Aalim responsable pour empêche sa mustahab la dans le but pou préserve ummat contre ene kitsoz pli grave. Ça li explique stand de nous banne Ulama ki croire dans la pratique faire dua par barakate banne personnage pieux et surtout nous Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wassallam), mais en même temps ena des fois zotte empêché quand ena abus et quand zotte trouve li débouche envers ene kitsoz bien dangereux.
Aqeedah
862
xxx*** asks:

Question

Eski ena kit masjid dan Maurice kot pé faire jummah specialment pou banne étudiants? environ 3hr?

Answer

Masjid Malartic a Curepipe vers 3hrs (Seulement dans banne jour l’école)
Jummah
863

Question

Eski mehendi Peeroo, Ruchna etc gagne droit servi pou mette dans cheveux ?

Answer

Bizin vérifier si li contenir kit substance chimique ki capave faire ene couche lor cheveu. Si li kumsa alor li pa pu permette akoz ki li pu empêche ghusal compter. Kumsa mem pa gagne droit teine noir ene cheveu ki fine vine blanc.
Cosmetics

Halaal Certification
868
Ray*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum Mufti Saab... Mo question c'est : Bans Ulaama dans le passé fine considere Ibn Arabi comme Kaafir a cause so croyance lor Wahdat ul Wujoud; mais dans la gazette Al Jamiat, ou fine defendre li et ou fine considere li comme ene Wali Allah ! Est ce qui li correcte la ??? Parce qui pena doute, avant considere quicaine comme Kaafir, sa bans Ulaama la fine bizin pense bien, et lerla zotte fine dire qui Ibn Arabi Kaafir, ena fine meme dire li plus Kaafir qui bans chretiens.... alors ou pe supporte li, et dire li pas Kaafir ???? Est ce qui ou capave donne ene eclaircisement lor la ??

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Nous maintenir nous position ki nous fine publié lor nous la gazette Al Jamiat. Si ena banne Aalim ki fine critique li mais ena plisse ki sa ki fine approuve li. Donc nous ensame avec la majorité et nous considère Hazrat Sheikh Ibnul Arabi comme ene de banne grand wali Allah. Sa zafaire attribué kufr envers banne Ulama li pas ene kitsoz nouveau sa. Banne Ulama couma Imam Bukhari et Ibne Taymiyyah aussi pas fine reste a l'abri de sa. Quant a wahdatul wujood li pas ene croyance sa, mais li ene l’état d'esprit. Parfois ene dimoune li tellement approché avec Allah cote li conne seulement Allah et li pas trouve narien divant li. La façon ki nous comprend Wahdatul Wujood et ki nous fine cité dans Al-Jamiat nous pe reproduire li ici. " Littéralement ça signifié l’unité de l’existence. C'est-à-dire ene seule kitchose ki existé. Ça c’est ene terme ki fine servi par banne ‘Oulamaa de haute calibre. Etant ambiguë, ça fine être interprété dans différent façons. Mais so interprétation claire et simple c’est ki l’existence Allah ta’ala même ki parfait, complet et réel. Apart li, tout ceki existé, na pas représente narien divant so l’existence. Pareil couma l’éclairage ene la bougie pas représente narien divant l’éclairage soleil dans plein lijour. Coumsa même tout kitchose existé par Allah Ta’ala. Tout kitchose ki arrivé à n’importe cote ça, pé arrivé par l’ordre Allah Ta’ala. L’existence Allah Ta’ala li domine tout l’existence. Pouvoir et Qoudrat Allah Ta’ala li manifesté partout dans tout kitchose. Regard ene dimoune ki entouré, dominé et envailli par le matérialisme reste braqué lors la forme superficielle et extrême de so l’entourage. Li pas dépasse plis ki ça - li reste emprisonné dans le monde matériel. Mais ene personnage pieux et sincère so regard li casse ça banne barrière-là pour finalement témoigne l’omniprésence divine partout. Et ça faire li trouve Allah même Allah partout. Li pareille couma ene X-ray ki pas trouve la peau extérieure. Li perce la peau et li trouve lezos et la moelle dans lezos. Donc Wahdatoul Woujoud li pas plis ki ça et d’après ça l’interpretation-là, perna narien de shirk la dans. Au contraire li ene degrés très avancé de la piété et de taqwa ki nous capave appelle li ‘‘Ihsaan’’ dans langage hadice. Eski nou pou blâme ça personne ki ena ene regard perçant-là ou bien nou flatte ça l’autre là ki so regard ena défaut ? Nou laisse le soin de décidé à chacun selon so l’intelligence. [Extrait de Al Jamiat Vol.1 No.11] Wahdatoul Woujoud et ene erreur: Ene causé de sagesse dire ki bizin adresse dimoune d’après so niveau. Malheureusement le sujet de Wahdatoul Woujoud ki ti causé auparavant dans ene milieu ki ti à la hauteur pou comprend ça, fine rente dans z’oreille banne ki perna l’aptitude pou comprend li. Donc d’après principe, banne ki comprend li faudré pas zotte cause ça avec banne ki pas capave comprend li afin pou pas crée confusion. Et banne ki pas capave comprend, faudré pas zotte critique banne personnes ki comprend pou ene kitchose ki zotte même zotte pas capave comprend. Alors couma li ene erreur cause ene kitchose divant banne ki pas capave comprend, coumsa même li ene erreur critique ou camarade quand ou même pas comprend. [Extrait de Al Jamiat Vol.2 No.8]
Aqeedah
869

Question

Please tell us what are we recommended to do during the solar eclipse. Is salaatul-Kousouf only for men in jamaat or can women also do some nawafil at home? Jazaakumullahu khairaa

Answer

For the men, two rakaat of namaz in congregation (jamaat) with a long and silent Qiraat is recommended. Qiraat may be done loudly as well. After having completed the namaz, one may engage in dua, zikr and istighfaar. Giving out sadaqah is also recommended. Women may perform salaat in their own home, individually.
Sounnah-Nafl
870

Question

Any masjid performing namaz for solar eclipse in Plaine verte and surrounding areas, and what time please ?

Answer

(1) Shawkat-ul-Islam Masjid after Zuhr. (2) Masjid-e-Noor (Markaz) after zuhr.
Sounnah-Nafl

The problem is that i am being aggressive with him nowadays, and i do not want to listen or obey him and lost interest in intimacy because im made to feel like a mere object of sex. I have requested that we seek counselling because there are other issues in our relationship, but his reaction is always negative. And i cannot stand how the situation is between us now. Could you please advise.

Si 5 dimun prend 1 boeuf pu qurbani(saken prend 1 part), eski bizin fer 7 part ou 5 part?

Answer

Bizin divise bœuf la en 5 parts au lieu 7 parts. A noter ki personne so part li pas bizin moins ki ene septième sinon personne so qourbani pas pou compté.

Yes you can

875
Zah*** asks:

Question

Eski gagne droit aster 1 telephone portable lor credit et paye par exemple rs500 par mois?

Answer

Li pou permette seulement si pena l’intérêt lor la. En principe acheté ene kitsoz lor crédit li pas haraam, pourvi bizin fini fixé ene prix dans commencement même. Disons ou fine acheté ene objet pou Rs 10,000 ki pou payable Rs 1000 mensuellement, alors sa li correcte. Sa ki empêché, c'est ki nous mette ene condition ki si pas fine réussi payé a temps alors bizin paye ene lamanne. Sa lamanne la li l’intérêt et pas gagne droit rente dans ene transaction pareil.
Financial Transaction

879
Kaw*** asks:

Question

Si blier combien rakaat in arriver dans namaz, qui bizin fair? Qui bizin fair pou gagne concentration dans namaz?

Answer

Bizin prend li lor saki ou pli sure . C'est a dire si ou ena doute entre deux et trois rakaat, alors ou prend li deux rakaat même. Mais dans ce cas dans troisième rakaat aussi ou bizin assizé et faire tashahhud par crainte ki tention li capave quatrième rakaat. Et finalement quand arrive lor quatrième rakaat d’après ou compte ou faire sajdah sahw avant ou termine ou namaz.
Daily

Aslkm Ki bane kitchose ki nou bizin pas taillé quan faire qourbani et ki so position?

Answer

li recommandé pou pas taille zongue, pas taille aukene cheveu. Pena aukene gunaah si kikene pas faire li.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. The ruling is that it is after 23 namazes. Anyway it is not recommended to stop it where they use to do it, neither start it where they do not do it.

Nous pas pretanne ki nous parmi la dans. Néanmoins saki nous conné C'est Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) fine dire ki benediction li attaché avec front cheval. Nous souhaité ki sa li ene message de coté Allah Ta'aala ki ou pou gagne benediction Allah Ta'aala. Nous dimane ou pou reste toujours dans l’obéissance Allah Ta'aala.

Salaam mufti.. What is your opinion on the samiri that misguided the people of musa to shirk.. Do we have any course here in islamic history and research?

Answer

Moreover he will be punished in Aakhirat. As for the course you mentioned we have not any specific subject as such. You may learn it to some extent by studying Tafseerul Quraan and Sharah (Explanation) of Hadith under the supervision of competent and qualified Ulama.
Quraan

Question

I want more children but my husband doesn't. what should we do?

Answer

You have the right according to Shariat to have more children but at the same time probably your husband would have his own reason. We would like to know on what basis your husband does not want it before replying to your query.

Ene dimoune ki pe prend part pu qurbani.eski li gagne Droit raze so la barbe.(parceki so travaille bizin raze Sinon capave gagne complainte)

Answer

Raze la barbe en li même pas gagne droit quand même ene dimoune pas fine faire qourbani. Li vrai ena certaine cas ki demanne être analysé en particulier sans généralise li. Ene personne ki pe faire qourbani li recommandé pou li pas taille zongue ou bien diminué ou tire aukene cheveu depi dans so le corps. Si jamais li faire li alors perna aukene blâme lor li.

Dans banne grand surface poule la li okay. Cema confirmation ki mo fine gagné avek certaine officier sanitaire ki sa maladi la fine detecté meme dans banne grand firme, cema fine camouflé li pou dimoune pas conné. Donc conclusion ki mo pe tiret c'est ene cout monté ki certaine banne dimoune pe faire pou touye banne ti marchant et proteze banne capitalistes, coumsa banne ki riche vine plis riche et banne ki misère vine pli misère. Dans sa cas la eski mo capave continue acheté poule et mange dans banne place ki certifié halal pareil couma avant?

Nous travail li terminé pour vérifié si poule fine égorgé d'après principe Islamique. Quant a détecté maladie, sa li concerne banne sanitaire et l'autorité gouvernementale. Si saki ou pe dire li vrai ou capave prépare ene dossier lor sa et Insha Allah nous pou essaye faire banne force vive et épaule ou dans ou démarche.

Niz*** asks:

Question

ki position de l'Islam a propos de banne homosexuels? En tan ki ene musulman, est ce qui nou gagne droit/capave dire ki :- "sa zot problem sa!", "laisse zot, zot zaffair sa"

Answer

Islam li bien claire ki ene missié bizin vive avec ene madame et ene madame bizin vive avec ene missié. Ene missié pas capave vive avec ene missié et ene madame pas capave vive avec ene madame. Ena malediction Allah lor saki faire li. En tant ki ene musulman nous bizin condanne sa pratique la.

Eski la sorcellerie ena kit l'effet lor nou destin?

D'après hadith ena ki doa li change li change saki ena dans destin, be sa aussi li dans destin ki dimoune pou dimanne doa et akoz sa pou ena ene changement dans saki ti pe parraite dans commencement.

Ray*** asks:

Question

Aslm Mufti Saab. Mo question c'est qui sanla ibn Taimiyah ? Ena personne dire li egaré, ena dire li Kaafir ?? vraimem sa ; oubien li ti ene personne lor Sunnah ??

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Li ti ene parmi banne savant. Boucou banne Ulama ki nous conné zotte fine reconnaître so connaissance et so position dans deen malgré ki zotte pas fine partage so l'opinion. Mais en même temps nous bizin faire ressortir ki nous pas d'accord avec ene quantité kitsoz ki li fine dire. Li bon conné ki nous pas a la hauteur pou critique li mais en même temps nous respecté banne grand Ulama zotte l'opinion négative ki zotte ti ena envers li.

909

Question

Eski poulet chantefrais li halal?

Answer

De nos jour au niveau international ena vice de procédure et négligence dans faire zabah ene zanimo pou li vine halal. Dans ene tel l’état li difficile pou prononce halal en ceki concerne ene zanimo ki fine égorgé sans gagne banne détails. Malheureusement nous pena sa banne détails la. Nous fine contacté l’entreprise concerné pou capave faire banne procédures mais nous pas fine gagne permission. Donc nous pas capave servi le mot halal dans sa situation la tanque ki nous pas vérifié et nous satisfait.
Meat-Poultry

Question

Assalam ou alaukum. Eski li permete pu faire namaz avec pantalon qui tourné parceki jeans la trop long,eski li coret pou li faire imamat?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Si jeans la trop longue alors bizin trousse li pour qui cheville la reste découvert pendant namaz. Mais nous conne très bien ki li pas ene tenue respectable pou ene celui ki pe faire imaamat. Ene imaam bizin toujours comporte li en sorte ki dimoune respect li. Donc ene Imam bizin évite banne tenue pareil.
Daily
912

Question

Aslm Eski li important pou mentionne mahr quand imam pe fer nikah?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Li pas important dans le sens ki nikaah la li valable et li compté quand même pas pe mentionne mahr quand pe faire nikaah. Mais li bon mentionne li pou pena dispute plitard. Et d'ailleurs Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) ti mentionne mahr quand li fine faire nikaah avec banne Ummahaatul Mu'mineen.
Mahr
913
khe*** asks:

Question

assalamoualaikoum dear mufti saab,Si ene élève collège pe reste faire namaz zohr tou les vendredi. Eski li pou ene pecher? jaz.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Zeleve la bizin faire zeffort essaye gagne Jumuah dans banne centre cote pe faire Jumuah ene ti peu dans tard. Sinon li faire so namaz zuhr et continié faire boucou istighfaar.
Jummah
914

Question

Assalamu'alaykum. Is Moir's jelly halaal? It contains gelatine bovine and certifies halaal. Product from South Africa. Jazakumullah khairan.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. JUM has contacted SANHA (A halal certifying body in South Africa) and their reply is as follows: The product is NOT approved by SANHA as it contains bovine gelatine derived from non-Halaal slaughtered animals. Regarding Bovine gelatine, some Ulama contend that a drastic metamorphic change occurs in the non-Halaal animal material used in gelatine manufacture thereby rendering the impure collagenous protein into Halaal gelatine. Majority of the Ulama and International Halaal certification bodies are of the view that such metamorphic change does NOT occur and therefore they do not accept this view and have adopted a very holistic position on gelatine and other such ingredients of non-Halaal animal origin used in food production. SANHA's Theological Committee holds the latter view and we reiterate that it is not acceptable to use non-Halaal raw material in the manufacture of food products due to the fact that abundance of Halaal raw material is available and Muslims should not look for technical loopholes (metamorphosis etc.) to legitimise the use of raw materials sourced from Haraam animals in food production. Therefore SANHA recommends that all products containing non-Halaal gelatine be avoided.
Miscellaneous
915
Aad*** asks:

Question

As Salaam Mufti Just what is your opinion on a dream where i can hear alarm from masjids (like use to hear at iftaar's time).. announcing the emergence of almmasih ad dajjal, yet the sky & atmosphere turning redish like color. Salaam

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. An alarm for you and all to change your lives.
Dream
916

Question

Aslm Eski qiyamul lail et taraweeh ene seul? Si pas ene seul ki difference ena? Et ki fer banne salafi fer ziss 8 rakaat si li pas ene seul? Jzklh

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Qiyaamul -lail c'est namaz pendant la nuit et sa tous les jours ena sa et 20 rakaat taraaweeh li trouve dans le mois de Ramadwaan. Akoze ki faire li dans la nuit li appelle qiyaamul-lail. Veut dire ki Taraweeh li qiyaamul-lail mais tous qiyaamul-lail li pas taraaweeh. Depuis tous les temps namaz taraaweeh fine ena 20 rakaat. Imaam Shafi'ee (Rahmatullahi alaih) dire depi ki mo rappelle mo conné ki dans Makkah tous les temps fine faire 20 rakaat taraaweeh.
Taraawih
917

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. These places are not certified by JUM. We advise the public to be cautious before eating in such places.
Outlets-Restaurants

tai***@gmail.com asks:

Question

is mozarella halaal?

Dairy-Egg Products
919
ano*** asks:

Question

Assalaamualaikum. My husband said he set me free and pronounced talaq some days before. Does it mean im no longer his wife. If so does it mean I should observe iddah n how many days. Is it 3months. When will the iddah terminate then in december or january. If I want him to re accept me what should I do.Plz answer me quickly. Am confused. Im living in the house of my parents. Cn I ask him to take me back.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. The talaaq is effective as from the time when your husband pronounced the talaaq. from that time you are already in iddat. Iddat is three complete menses (haiz). In case of pregnancy the iddat will expire with the delivery. Those who do not experience haiz because of menopause will observe it till 90 days from the day the talaaq was pronounced. In your case if your husband has given you one talaaq or two then you can resume conjugal life without the need of renewing nikah within iddat. However, after the iddat is over a fresh nikah should be done if you wish to resume.
Talaaq
920

Question

Ene group musulman pe mette l'afiche partous pou dire ki bizin applik la loi Shariat dans Maurice ki JUM ena pou dire lor la?

Answer

Idéale c'est sa même parcequi nous croire ki l'humanité so succès réel trouve dans Shariat. Nous pas égoïste pour pas partage sa succès la avec lezot. Mais bizin gueté couma pou partage sa avec lezot. D’après nous banne Musulmans bizin pratique zotte deen a 100% pour permette lezot trouve beauté de l'islam a travers zotte comportement.
Miscellaneous
921

Question

Is ghoon that takes place in Muharram permissible ?

Answer

Ghoon is Haraam and has nothing to do with Islam. It is the practice of Shia community not of sunnee.
Muharram
922

Question

In Pamplemousses st, there is a restaurant called 7 Masters. They have a logo like the one of Jakim, but on the Logo its written Halal Research Committee And at the bottom its written Jamiat Ul Ulama. I find it suspicious therefore would like to know if this place is certified by JUM?

Answer

Certification comes after inspection and inspection depends on authorization from the concerned premises. JUM did not obtain such authorization from the said premises, therefore no procedures were carried out.
Outlets-Restaurants
923
Ahm*** asks:

Question

Aslm..May i know the clear definition of bid'ah (innovation) in the terminology of shariah?? Jzk

Answer

Bid'ah is contrary to Sunnah. Sunnah means the declaration, the practice and the approval of Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam). It includes the way of Sahabah (Radhiyallahu anhum) The Tabi'een and Tabi' Taabi'een (Rahimahumullah) as well. Any practice of Ibaadah contrary to that will be qualified as bid'ah. It should be born in mind that Sunnah applies to the essence of Ibaadah not to accessories of Ibaadah. For example, Teaching of Islam is essential but the way to teach it may deffer to the way prevailing at the time of Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) and so on. The way we are teaching Islam cannot be qualified as bid'ah because it concern only to the accessories and the way.
Bidati
924
sha*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum. My question is related to the topic of zibah. i would know which organisation designates the person to do ZIBAH of halal animals for the Mauritius Meat Authority and other local suppliers of fresh chicken meat or other halal animals?

Wa alaikumus salaam. We know that Muslims do the job but don't know who designate them. The other local suppliers have their own way to employ the slaughterers.

Menstruation
928
ack***@ asks:

Question

Aslm
I would like to know which brand of lamb is halal and where it is sold please?
Jazaakillah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Imported lamb/beef is classified as ''halal'' after a follow up on the halal certificate issued for each imported batch. As a matter of principle, importers should have a copy of the halal certificate for each batch imported and the following conditions should be respected:

(a)The reference number on the products should match with the reference number on the halal certificate.
(b) The exportation date should also correspond
(c) the concerned halal organization should confirm the certification.

N.B. The above exercise should be repeated for each batch.

It is difficult to ascertain the brand of imported lamb/sheep when it is no longer in its labeled box as is the case in supermarkets or with food distributors. Therefore, one should undoubtedly refrain from buying such meat as the information provided with regards to the origin and halal status, is insufficient. In such cases, one should contact the importers directly and enquire as to where the meat is being supplied in the required location.

Before purchasing meat, you should ensure the following :

(a) The place where you are buying from is keen to show you a copy of the halal certificate for that particular batch.
(b) Cross check the reference number of the certificate with the reference number written on the packaging of the product.
(c) Forward a copy of the certificate to JUM who will contact the Halal Organization in that particular country to receive confirmation from them.

JUM approves the products only after having received a positive reply from the Halal Organization abroad.

N.B. To simplify and accelerate this type of halal approving process, it would be best if the importers would kindly cooperate with JUM in this regards.

Jazaakumullahu khairaa

Meat-Poultry
929

934

Question

Aslkm Faire maaf pe derange ou.. Qui sanla Mansur Al Hallaj ?? Est ce qui vraimem li ti kaafir couma certains personnes dire ??
935
joo*** asks:

Question

Does a married woman, who has left her husband for no valid reason go to hajj without husband if he has a son.

Is it permissible to throw husband out of the house when same is still in nikah, as the house belongs to wife.

Does the wife have the right to leave husband due to some rare shouts of husband, and remarks?

Answer

In case of farz Hajj a woman has the right to go for hajj if a mahram is available to her. A mahram is a male relative to whom she won't be allowed to get married. The mahram should be sane and of age.

The Husband should provide his wife food, clothes and shelter. The wife may prevent her husband to stay in her house.

He should provide her a shelter and ask her to come to live with him, in this case the wife should obey, otherwise she will be qualified as Naashizah (recalcitrant).

Social life
936

Question

assalamualaikoum Mufti Saaheb.
A Maurice ena beaucoup banne jeune garcon et filles ki finne accepté Islaam. mais zotte finne accepte Islaam a cause zotte finne tombe amoureux avec quelqu'un musulmans et en realité zotte pas au courant de Islaam ki li ene vrai religion. Eski li pou ene bon l'idee de coté le Jamiat-ul-Ulamaa si zotte organize banne programme ki spéciale pou sa banne personnes la seulement pou mette zotte au courant ki Islaam li vrai religion et encourage zotte coumsa zotte Imaan vine solide. Mo finne pense lors la parceque mo finne tendre banne cas cote ti ena banne jeunes ki finne converti zotte finne retourne dans zotte religion apres 1 ans et ena apres 3 ans a cause zotte copin/e finne quitte zotte.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam.

Dans ce cas saki pli important c'est bizin koze avec le partenaire musulman ki li même ki bizin pratique so deen bien sinon le converti li pou ena ene prétexte pou pas pratique deen.

Néanmoins capave pense ene façon cote capave gagne contact avec sa banne qualité personne la et JUM li disposé accorde so soutien dans le mesure du possible a nerporte ki sanla disposé faire sa travail la.

941

Question

Assalaamualaikum,

Ene madame dans so iddat. Dans sa l'etat li fine gagne ene bon demanne alors li fine faire nikaah zisse pou li pas perdi sa l'occasion la si li pou atanne iddat terminer. Et zotte fine dire ki malgré zotte fine faire nikaah, zotte pas pou reste ensamme tanque iddat pas terminé. Eski sa nikaah la compté ou bien bizin refaire ene lot nikaah kan iddat terminé? Ene Imaam fine dire madame la koze avek so premier missié ki fine donne li talaak pou li faire so l'intention talaak pou ene date pli avant. coumca li kapave en dehor iddat pli Bonheur. C'est a dire si missier fine donne talaak Octobre 2016, alors missier la bizin faire l'intention pou Août 2016, coumsa dans novembre kan li pe faire nikaah li en dehors Iddat. Eski saki sa imam la fine dire li correcte?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Talaaq li compté apartir ki missier la fine donne talaaq. Sa date la pas capave changé par l'intention. Donc madame la so iddat li commencé apartir sa jour ki so missier fine donne li talaaq. Ene madame pena droit faire nikaah pendant so iddat. Ene nikaah ki fine faire pendant iddat li pas valable. Non seulement pas gagne droit faire nikaah, pas gagne droit propose ene madame dans so iddat. Nikaah ki li fine faire li pena aukene valeur et li pas valable. Li bizin pas reste avec sa missier la. li bizin alle reste cote so parent, quand iddat fini lerla li refaire so nikaah.
Iddah
942
meh*** asks:

Question

Assalaamu'alaykum ene tifi finne fer nikkah avec ene garçon en août. Ene nikaah avec condition ki tifi la pou reste cote so parent tant ki walimah pane faire mais tifi et garçon la pane respecter condition et tifi la finne alle reste cote so missier sans faire walimah mais faire ene semaine maintenant papa tifi la pas accepter condition ki so tifi pe vivre et fine vine lakaz garçon la pou reprend so tifi en se faisant garçon la dan colère noire fine dir tifi la en présence deux coter so parents "si to aller to prend to talaaq to aller" papa tifi la fine plus pas accepter et finne pousse so tifi pou vine avec li et finalement tifi la pe reste cote so parent et garçon la envi so madame re vini li mais eski li encore dans nikaah ou talaaq la fine donner a sa moment la?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Parent ti fille la ti bizin laisse ti fille la reste avec so missier akoz nikaah ti deja fini faire. Sa condition waleemah la pas ti tellement important. Sa garçon la quand fine dire so madame " si to aller to prend to talaaq to aller " alors ene talaaq fine fini porté akoze ti fille la fine allé. Garçon la ena droit re prend so madame dans so nikaah sans renouvelé nikaah si li avant 3 haiz. Si jamais 3 haiz fine traversé depuis ki zotte fine séparé alors zotte capave re vine ensame par renouveler nikaah. Dans tous le deux cas garçon la pou ena seulement pouvoir de deux talaaq aster. Si bizin plis détail ou kapave contacter nous en personne.
Talaaq

Is this namaaz valid since surah hasnt been read in order! Jzk

Answer

Even not recommended to do qiraat as such the salaat is valid and doesn't need to be repeated.

Question

Aslm. Nou dans le mois safar .kuma tire sadaqa et ki zour. Eski lor loto travail gagne Droit tire sadaqa

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Sadaqa pena aukene relation avec sa mois safal la. Ou libre pou tire sadaqah nerporte quand ou oulé et avec nerporte ki zaffer ene dimoune li bizin. Li pli recommandé ki nou donne ene dimoune casse ki li capave aster saki li bizin. Amoin si ena kit l’empêchement.

Question

Aslm. ALLAH fine envoye nous dernier prophete pour Ummat en entier. Mais de nos jour nous guette juste banne musulman, ki arrive banne kafir ki pane embrasse ISLAM???

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam.

Bizin occupe musulman et non musulman tous les deux. Travail la li assez énorme. Bizin partage travail la. Nous bizin ene groupe ki occupe banne musulman et ene l'autre groupe ki occupe banne non-musulman.

Miscellaneous
957
Unk*** asks:

Question

Aslm. Ki arrive bne kafir ki pane embrasse Islam? Meme ki zot etre bne xtra bon dimoune?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Salue éternelle li pour ene dimoune ki fine mort lor Imaan. Quant a ene personne ki fine mort lo kufr et shirk li pou souffert éternellement. Pas capave ena plis bon ki Abu Taalib mais li aussi li pas pou rente dans jannat akoze ki li fine refuse pou embrasse Islaam. Imaan c'est ene critère essentiel pou rente dans jannat. Ene musulman ki pas accepté sa li pas reste ene musulman.

Aqeedah

965
mu'*** asks:

Question

if a woman normally gets her haiz for 8 days and she sometimes stop bleeding for one salaat time in between must she take a ghusl then?

Answer

No need to make ghusl because she is still in her haiz even if she doesn't see bleeding. Bleeding not necessary to be found continuously during haiz. It may be interrupted.
Menstruation
966
mu'*** asks:

Question

If a woman normally get 8 days of Haiz and in between she stop getting it for one salat time what must she do?

Answer

She should keep away from salaat because it is not necessary to bleed continuously.
Menstruation
967
mu'*** asks:

Question

If during her menstrual period a woman does not see blood for 1 salaat time,must she make ghusl.if this happens 4/5 times in her 8 days of haiz won't she fall sick if she has to take so many ghusl?

Answer

It is not necessary to bleed continuously during the period of haiz. A woman cannot make salaat even if she doesn't see bleeding as long as she is during her haiz. An interruption in bleeding during haiz is considered like bleeding regarding namaz.
Menstruation

Aslm mufti. I was really shattered to know that my father plays LOTO... And not only that, he also asks my little nephew who is still to circle or tick the numbers for him. In front of me he makes as if he does not play but today I saw my nephew asking him for money that supposedly he got by playing.Rs 100. By the grace of almighty Allah, we are well possessed but that vice of him is affecting my nephew and also lack of bar a kat in our living. Oh Mawlana please help me on hw to stop my.father from sinning. Long tym back i did try tlk to him through a bayaan but nothing changed. My dad is a well educated person and he knws gambling is sin bt still he does that...

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Make arrangement for somebody who is respected by him to talk to him and you personally continue with your effort and make dua

A c*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum,

Alhamdulillah we have some relatives who performed Haj and umrah,when they return from the holy place they oblige us to kiss their foreheads claiming that it is a cause of barakat. Also They claim that they get inspirations or something in salat,and when they do dua their duas are readily accepted,and claim such and such people came for dua and was granted his wish, also sometimes while sitting in a family gathering,the person closes his eyes and after a while when opens his eyes says that he has been to madinah just know.

Is it possible while their lifestyle is not shariah compliant,intermingling,smoking,watching television etc is common in the household.my question is are these actions justified in Islam?or is this misleading fellow muslim brothers? What may be done during this kind of situation?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Never, never and never follow these kinds of people. They are the agents of dajjaal. The criteria to follow somebody lies in his strict adherence to Shariah which cannot be realized without following the mubaarak sunnat of Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam).

Wa alaikumus salaam.

We don't have details of all these products. Please send us details of the ones you want to know about.

Cosmetics
977
faw*** asks:

Question

Assalaamu'alaykum warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh...

1] Eski gagne droit consomme banne produits made in china?

2] Eski ena kit boissons gazeuses ki jum fine certifier halaal?? jum ki dier lor boissons gazeuses?

3] Eski gagne droit mette parfum ki ena l'alcool kan faire namaaz?? akoz ceki psa bon c'est pas pe consomme li?

jazaakumullahu khairaa

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh.

1) Li deppane lor produit la. Nous pas capave généralise narien.

2) Chez JUM, Nous conscience pas claire en ceki concerne la boissons gazeuses.

3) Pas gagne droit servi parfum l'alcool quand même en dehors l'heure namaz aussi.

Beverages

Sab*** asks:

Question

Am koraissha a muslim girl,married a hindu boy bt he follows islam,he converted.can he do isale sawaab for his dead mother in khatam?so mama in entere.

Answer

It is not permissible to seek forgiveness or to do isaale sawaab for somebody who died on kufr.

amj*** asks:

mone fini donne mo madame ene talaaqe bain en ecrit. mone inform muslim family council mone poster banla lettre la .ki mo bizin fer aster?

Si ou fine donne ou madame ene talaaq baain veut dire ki sa talaaq la fine prend l'effet et ou madame bizin observe iddat et après iddat li pou libre. Quant a lettre ki ou fine envoyé a MFC sa ou bizin guette sa la bas.

982
Saa*** asks:

Question

Ene ti fille ki suivre maslah hanafi ine gagne demande en marriage par ene garcon ki suivre maslah ghair muqallid, quand garcon la li dire ki li perna objection avec ti fille la so maslah, mais li li pou pratique so maslah. Mone deza demande sa maslah la ek ene mufti. Li dire moi pena aukene objection. Shariah ki dire lors sa? S'il vous plait explique lor la. Jazaakallah.

Answer

L'harmonie li essentiel pou ene bon mariage et sa li difficile pour réalisé quand banne partenaire zotte ena différent tendance, surtout ghair muqallid ki pas stable. Donc blié ene l'union pareil.
Nikah
983
Say*** asks:

Question

1. Mo envi kon a propos reponde salam et ki arriver si nu pas reponde salam??

2. Mo ti nvi koner si ene dimoune gagne droit donne malédiction et so conséquence??

Answer

1. Repone salaam li wajib. Li ene péché si pa reponne. Sa li applique pu reponne ene musulman Nou pas gagne droit faire salaam ene jeune fille ou ene jeune madame parski sa capave ouvert la porte de fitna.

2. Pas gagne droit avoye malédiction lor aukene personne précise. Gagne faire li lor banne malfaiteurs sans précise kikene so nom par exemple malédiction lor banne ki koze menti.

Miscellaneous

Confectioneries
996

Question

Aslm.. mo ti oulé conné

1. ki aqeeda ki nou suive et
2. comié aqeeda ena?

Ene dimoune (salafi) dire moi ki bizin suive aqeeda ki imam tahaawi fine mentionné dans so livre aqeeda et banne tabligh jamaat zotte aqeeda li contredire ceki imam tahaawi fine mentionné..

3. eski li vrai sa? Comme référence li dire ki guette fazaile amaal ena boucou aqeeda ki amene vers shirk..

4. ki réponse mo capave donne li?

jazakumullahu khairan

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam.

D'abord dans perna Salafi dans Maurice. Sa banne ki dire ki zotte salafi la zotte banne Ghair Muqallid en réalité. Banne vrai Salafi c'est banne ki suivre ene parmi sa quatre grand Imaam la, couma Imam Abu Hanifa, Imam Maalik, Imam Ahmad et Imaam Shafi'ee (Rahimahumullah).

Imam Tahawi (Rahimahullah) li ti ene grand Aalim et ene grand Haafiz de Hadice. Et li suivre Imam Abu Hanifa (Rahimahullah). Li fine écrire ene livre ki appelle Al-Aqeedatut Tahahawiya. Sa même nous aqeedah sa. Sa livre la fine commenté par banne ghair muqallid aussi. Alors commentaire ki fine faire par banne ghair muqallid bizin évité.

Aqeedah
997

Question

Aslmkm.. is there any hadith that says we shouldn't wear clothes upside down? and what's the link between it and folding the pants above the ankle? some people say that we shouldn't fold our pants above the ankle if it is below when reading salaah because hadith say we shouldn't wear clothes upside down and folding it will make it upside down.. is it correct?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. You are not allowed to wear clothes below the ankle. The ankle should be uncovered from above. According to hadith, swalaat of a person wearing such clothes or trousers become detestable. Wearing such clothes causes Allah's wrath and anger. We are supposed to abstain from such clothes. So if you can't at least you should observe it in namaz.
Daily
999

Question

Aslmkm
Eski mo sœur so zanne li mo mahram?
Couma pou conner eski ene personne li mo mahram ou non?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam
Non.
Ou sœur so zanne li ou nièce so missié. Nièce so missié li pas mahram parceki si sa missié la quitte ou nièce li pou gagne droit marié avec ou. Ene personne ki ou capave marié avec li li pas ou mahram.

Miscellaneous
1000

Question

Aslm
Referring to question 997, so is it correct to fold the trousers above the ankle?
Is there any hadith that states we shouldn't wear clothes upside down?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam.
The folding of garment was forbidden at the time of Rasoulullah (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) because the kuffaar used to do it by pride. Nowadays Muslims do it only because it is highly recommended to let the ankle uncovered, both in namaz and outside namaz.

Daily
1001

Question

Assalaamu alaikum

Mufti Sahab, Dans Khutbah Jummah le 27/01/2017 Cehl Meea fine dire ene parole ki mo ti envie verifié si li correct.

Li fine dire ki tous dimoune pou rente dans difeu l'enfer meme pou ene ti moment aussi. Banne prophete aussi pou bizin rentrer la dans.

Et comme prevue li fine mentionne verset 71 et 72 de Surah Maryam cote Allah dire " Pena ene parmi ou eccepté Ki pou present li dans difeu la. Sa c'est ene decision ki to rabb ine fini prend".

Ki ou l'opinion lor la?

Jazaakumullahu khairaa

1002

Question

concernant fazaaile amaal banla dire ki ena aqeedah ki amene vers shirk.. ki reponse ena pou sa?

Answer

Quelques années de cela ti ena ene livret ki ti sorti et ki ti pretanne sa banne kitsoz la. Alhamdulillah, le Jamiat Ul Ulama (JUM) a travers so journal 'AL-Jamait" fine reponne tous sa banne objections la. Sa livre la fine écrire par ene grand savant ki appelle Maulana Zakaria (Rahmatullahi alaih), li conné saki li fine écrire. Si kikene trouve kitsoz pas bon li capave contacté JUM.
Aqeedah
1003

Question

Aslm.
My wife had a nightmare yesterday. She dreamt of an unknown boy aged 27 being drown and saw his mayyat leaving a hall in which a marriage of my wife very close relative was going to happen. Then after sometime the mayyat went away but it comes back to the hall due to severe rainfall  where the marriage was already happening and my mother in law was welcoming the guests. they had to change the mayyat clothes and suddenly the corpse coughed.  " Note to be noted : My wife cousine is marrying soon.  Please help me wife. she is really worrying. jazakallah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam.
You can't do anything except making a lot of dua and istighfaar. Things which have to happen will happen. We can't stop the train of destiny. May Allah ta'aala protect and your family.

Dream
1004

Question

salaam.
I wanted to know about the responsibilities of a girl towards her parents/relatives before marriage and how that changes after marriage? is she responsible to look after her parents or should she serve her husband and her in laws?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam.
As per contract of nikaah, she is requested to serve her husband to the extent of permissible matters and to the extent of her capacity. She may serve her in laws on humanitarian basis without any obligation. She may as well serve her parents as long as it doesn't lead to neglect the rights of her husband. The husband should never prevent her from serving her parents if it is not disturbing in any way.

Nikah
1005

Question

Assalamu'laikum.
I bougth a house. After few months I found that my neighbour Waste Water Pipe is on my property. This cause bad smell and its not hygenic.
Can I use my INTEREST MONEY to divert the Waste Pipe on my own cost.
It will cost Rs 30 000.
I already informed the neighbour. Jazakallah.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam.

You should forget about the interest money. It should be given to the needy without intention of sawaab. You should ask the neighbour to remove the waste pipe at his own expense.

Financial Transaction
1006
Sah*** asks:

Question

Mo ena ene question bien important concerning enceinte. Mo madame enceinte 35 jours. Li pa p possible pou li garde sa bb la, le fait ki nous deja ena 5 zenfan, 3 enkor petit, 1 dernier p boir avek so mama. Eski li possible ki li boir ene medcine pou dsan sa? So cas bien pas bon, li ena depression, li fatiguer et li p gagn boukou douler ventre. Plz conseil mw

Answer

Douleur li ene kitsoz tout a fait normale dans grossesse couma fine mentionné dans Quraan. Mais si douleur la li atroce et le cas de sa madame la li asser sévère ki capave aggrave so la santé, alors capave faire li. Mais bizin prend avis ene medecin musulman ki sérieux dans deen avant alle de l'avant.

Is there a possibility tht i read my asr prayer at zohr tym!? Jek

Answer

Daily
1010

Question

Assalamualaikum wr wb Mufti Saab.
By the time i am performing wazou for magrib,blood and pus is oozing from a wound/pimple.normally my wazou isnt valid n i cant perform namaaz.now if th wound has stopped bleeding at esha tym..wat do i do!?pray magrib thn esha!?jzk

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahamatullahi wabarakaatuh
You have to wait for the blood to stop until maghrib time is near to expire. If it continues you may perform your wazou and make your namaz even if it is bleeding.

Aslm, JUM fine dire ki menu crustacé zotte pas fine certifier, kuma zot certifier restaurant mais certain menu zotte dire non, se kuma ene dimun al resto pa manze crustace, prefer kan zot certifier certifier tou, sa pan pli cre dout, li simple kan ou p dir tel plas halal b tou bzin halal non plu n parti makrooh n parti halal. jzkAllah

Answer

Crustacé pas gagne droit mangé, mais zotte pas impur. Akoze-sa question de cross-contamination pas diboute. Donc sa li permette nous certifié lezot menu.

can a woman perform namaz with halaal makeup on.

1033

Question

Assalamualaikum wr wb mufti saab..
I have made intention to give sadaqua to a sick needy person.
Before giving the sadaquah,the person has passed away..
Should i give the sadaquah to the family or can i give it to another needy person!? Jzk

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam.

Not necessary to give it to his family. It can be given to others as well.

Sadaqah
1034

Question

celui ki visite Qabarastaan et récite : Surah Faatihah Surah Ikhlaas Surah Takaathur et faire du’a pou banne mort, banne dimoune ki dans Qabr aussi pou demande Allah pardon pou li.

Eski sa hadice la correcte?
Eski banne dimoune dans Qabr capave faire dua pou nou?

Answer

Banne hadith semblable fine etre rapporté dans ene livre ki appelle Sharhus-Sudoor. Selon sa banne hadith la, banne dimoune mort pou intercède auprès Allah Subhaanahu wata'aala en faveur de banne ki lire sa banne surah la avec l'intention pou faire zotte gagne so sawaab.

Selon Allaamah Jalaaluddeen Suyouti (r.a) sa banne hadith la zotte faible individuellement mais dans l'ensemble zotte arrive ene degrés de l’authenticité ki appelle "Hassan". Et sa degrés de l'authenticité la li plus ki suffit pou capave mette li en pratique.

Janaazah
1035

Question

Aslm. Mo ena intention pour faire Hadj 2017 accompagne de mo madame et mo tifille. Mo question eski zot gagne droit faire Namaz dans Haram derriere Imam en Jamate. Et aussi comment li pour faire 2 Nafil apres Tawaf derriere makame Ibrahim.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Banne madame pou faire zotte namaz dans l’hôtel. Banne critères et banne raison évoquer par banne juristes pour empêche madame faire dans masjid li existé plis ki au paravent. Donc sa interdiction la li pou pli appliqué.

Sa deux rakaat tawaaf la li waajib pou faire et li pas nécessaire pou faire li cotte Maqaame Ibraheem. Dans situation et condition ki prévaloir de nos jour li meilleur ki ene madame faire li dans ene l'autre place. Pas nécessaire faire li aussi avant Safa Marwa. Capave faire li quand retourne dans l’hôtel aussi.

Female
1036
adi*** asks:

Question

aslm
si ene dimoune ena problem sinizit et douleur la tete a extrem,si so ghusal casse a soir alors eski li kav faire ghusal a soir mm mais pas lave la tete ,le matin kan li leV li lave seulment la tete?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Oui li capave faire so ghussal a soir et li passe la main mouiller lor so la tête so ghussal pou compté. Li capave faire namaz avec sa ghussal la. Sa ghussal la pou valable ziska li senti li en mesure ki li capave lave so la tête.
