Inheritance
1225
A*** asks:

Question

Aslm.
Im a married woman. i own a house and got few gold jewelries, my clothing etc. how should i.make my wasiyat? On wat?
Tell me wats best for me even to donate also jzkAllah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

As wasiyat is concerned it will be valid to the extent of one third (1/3) of the whole property you own in form of movable and immovable commodities.
The two thirds will go to your heirs.
It is not allowed to make wasiyat in favour of somebody who is already a heir.

Miscellaneous
1226

Question

If a person dies and the mayyat expenses didn't come up to 1/3 the rest of the 1/3 will still goes to the heir ? or can we use it for donation any good deeds for the deceased.

Answer

After the burial expenses the remaining estate will go the heir.
Janaazah

1228

Question

Assalamualaikum wrwb..
QURBANI:
Normally qurbani meat shud b divided in 3:
(i) poor
(ii) family
(iii) 4 our own
If we r intending 2 do a family meal..can we not distribute the family share..n invite thm 2 partake the meal!? Please advise..jzk :)

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh The distribution in three portions is only recommended not obligatory. The use of the meat in the manner you mentionned is permissible.

Sla*** asks:

Question

Assalamoualaikoum. Mo envi remercier Hazrat Shaykh Mufti Rafick Meerun Sahib (Damatbaratuhum) et so lekip de Ulama pou travail remarqable ki zot pe faire dans bureau et lor terrain. Alhamdulillah sa pe aide Awaam beaucoup. Mo tiens a faire resortir aussi ki ban dimoune bizin PENA mauvais penC concernant ban Ulama. Ban Ulama aussi ena zot la vie, famille, enfants, occupations etc alor banla aussi humain cuma nous.

Nous faire dua ki Allah Paak accorde 1 longue lavie a tous ban Mashaikhs, Ulama, enseignants et etudiants de deen et ban ki pe faire zeffort de deen. Ki Allah Paak accepter zot zefort et sacrifice et recompense zot. AMEEN..

BONNE CONTINUATION A JUM ET SO LEKIP !

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam.

Miscellaneous
1232

Question

Assalamualaikum wrwb Please advise if someone is intending to use the qurbani meat (1/3 share for family & 1/3 share for oneself) for a family gathering / tilawat ul quran / Lunch, is it that the 7 people who are taking part in the animal, their qurbani is invalid? since that particular person has not made the right intention for qurbani. Please clarify. Can't we use the qurbani meat (1/3 share for family & 1/3 share for oneself) for a family lunch?? Jazakallah Khair :)

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam If qourbani is done with mere intention of using the meat in da'wat in such a way that if there was no da'wat you would not perform qourbani then in this case it is not valid as qourbani.
Qurbaani
1233

Question

Assalamualaikum wrwb Qurbani If both the husband and wife work and are malik e nisab.. should both take part of Qurbani in Mauritius? Or Can the husband take part in Mauritius and the wife in India for instance? Please advise. Jazakallah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam It depends on their capacity. If their means allow them both to do it in Mauritius then well and good. Otherwise India or elsewhere is an alternative.
Qurbaani

Sal*** asks:

Question

Assalamou 'alaikum Warahmatullahi Wa Barakaatuh

Quand bizin garde roza pour Arafah ?

Certains personnes pe dire moi qui nous garde li le 9eme dhul Hijjah de nous pays...

Et d'autres personnes pe dire qui nous garde li jour qui bans Haajis dans la plaine de Arafah; parcequi dans Hadith fine faire mention de roza Arafah nonplus roza du 9eme dhul Hijjah...et banla dire encore qui pas possible ena deux Arafah...

Ou qui ou dire ?

Jzk khayr !

Answer

D'apres nous calcule a Maurice sa roza la li vendredi le 01 septembre 2017.

ou capave refere ou a sa banne link la pou gagne plis details lor la.

http://www.jamiat-ul-ulama.org/node/2333

http://www.jamiat-ul-ulama.org/node/2638

Sounnah-Nafl

ais*** asks:

Question

In my dream,i saw a pregnant woman.she was about to give birth to a baby but as she could not bore the intensity of pain she decided not to give birh to the baby.then i saw that she broke a blade after that i saw a baby in blood with his hands and feet cutt off...what is the interpretation of the dream please?

Answer

We are very prudent in interpreting dreams. We make dua that Allah Ta'aala protect you from all evils and grant you success in this world and in the hereafter. we request you to personally contact Ulama that are reliable to you for this purpose.

1237
Zul*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum
1- Couma mo bizin remplace mo banne swalat ki mo fine ratté depi mo vine barigh?
2-eski mo namaz accepté si mo pe fer namaz deriere 1 imam ki so panatalon pas lahaut so cheville ??

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

1.D’abord fini faire ene estimation de quantité l'année so namaz ki fine manqué. Apres sa quand ou pe remplacé, faire niyyat pour premier namaz fajr ki ou fine ratté. Coumca même faire niyyat pour zuhr, asr, maghrib et esha. Après sa faire niyyat pou namaz ki vine après dans le coeur.

2.Li makroohe tahreemi pou couvert cheville en dehors namaz et dans namaz. Et sa li pli grave pou ene imam permanent. Faudrait pas la direction li employe ene imaam pareil, sinon la direction aussi pou complice. Bizin faire z'effort pou retire ene imaam pareil si sa pas crée désordre. Si sa capave amène bouleversement dans localité capave faire namaz derrière li pou pas gagne l'habitude manque namaz avec jamaat.

Daily
1238
imr*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum. Mo ene frère ene ene dette 160 mile rs depuis plusieurs année li pas pour capave rembourser.Mo capave rembourse peu par peu pour Mo frère avec Mo l'argent zakate et lintere.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. D'abord dimane ou frère l'autorisation et ou rembourse so dette avec la monnaie zakaat. Pou l'instant pas pense l'intérêt.

1239
Abu*** asks:
1240
zeb*** asks:

Question

Assalamoualaikum,

Please advise.

A married man has been having an affair with another woman for five years and since two years the man had second nikkah with the woman. When first wife came to know about second nikkah, husband agreed to give talaaq to second wife. He then told the first wife that he has already given talaaq to second wife by phone as the second wife was refusing to meet him and first wife in person for purpose of giving talaaq. However, the first wife is asking husband to send a signed talaaq by post as she is not believing the husband . Please advise whether if husband sends a signed talaaq by post will it be valid as the signed talaaq may not be read by the second wife.

Jazaak Allah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Yes it will be valid. We are neither encouraging him nor discouraging him to give talaaq by saying that it will be valid.

Nikah
1241

Question

Aslm
when teaching children should we tell them "Allah is everywhere" or "Allah is not restricted to places"?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Allah is everywhere.

1242
Ano*** asks:

Question

Assalaamu'alaykum. I want to know if i can use hair colour without ammonia?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Is there any need for you to colour your hair? What is the reason?

For your information, khizaab (colouring of hair and beard) is allowed for white hair and beard. One should abstain from black colouring. One should never do it to immitate the celebrities as well. At times something permissible may be prohibited if done to immitate kuffaar and fussaaq.

Miscellaneous

120*** asks:

Question

assalamualaikum...
Premier fois mo ti tire linteret lavence 2 mile rs,quand linteret la fine rentre lor compte a ce moment la mo fine rey tire linterey lavence 2 mile rs. coument ou fine dire bizin rey tire linteret la. bay combien mo bizin rey tirey 2 mile ou 4 mile.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Faudrait l'intérêt vine dans ou compte lerla ou pou capave tire li. Si ou fine tiré avant li rente dans ou compte li pou continié reste lor ou la tête.
Dans ou cas, sa deuxième 2 mile roupies ki ou fine tiré la pou compte pou sa premier 2 mile roupies ki ou fine gagné la.

Financial Transaction

1246

Question

Is it a sign of acceptance by Allah that a girl was seen and accepted suddenly without any hurdle but 3 months after the boy's family rejected the girl without giving reasons.After that the girl always asked Allah for return of that boy and also repented a lot..did namaz regulalrly and also tahajjud.She got marriage proposal but did not get the feeling to accept.After 1 yr that boy came back and want to meet her but she is hesitant as she truts only Allah.That boy has a lot of conditions.Please do tell me by which means she will know which way to take?

Answer

You have to choose your partner in life with consent and help of your family, as they will have more experience of life than you. The main thing is taqwa i.e. obedience to Allah ta'aala in all aspects of life. Nothing better than this.
Nikah
1247

Question

Assalamualaikum..
Is it sunnah to keep fast on the D of Eid ul Adha till the animal is slaughtered!? Shud we obligatory break the fast with Qurbani meat!?
Jzk

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Nabi (sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) used to do it. Thus it is sunnah. In Mauritius we have a practical problem. i.e. we have to wait for very long to be able to get the meat of Qourbani we did. In this case there is nothing bad to partake of anything before.
Qurbaani
1248
Sal*** asks:

Question

Assalamoualaykoum
I've received this message from a friend and i want to know if it is authentic:

Imam Abu Hanifah (Rahimahullah)'s Council of Forty

Imam Abu Hanifah had a council of 40 scholars who would discuss various juridical and theological matters until a consensus would be reached.

28 of Imam Abu Hanifah’s students became judges in different towns, cities and provinces and 8 became Imams, capable of passing legal rulings according to the Qur’an and Sunnah.

These are the names of the 40 scholars:

Imam Zufar (Passed away 158 A.H.)
Imam Malik bin Mighwal (Passed away 159 A.H.)
Imam Dawood Taa’ee (Passed away 160 A.H.)
Imam Mandil bin Ali (Passed away 168 A.H.)
Imam Nadhar bin Abdul Kareem (Passed away 169 A.H.)
Imam Amr bin Maymoon (Passed away 171 A.H.)
Imam Hiban bin Ali (Passed away 173 A.H.)
Imam Abu Ismah (Passed away 173 A.H.)
Imam Zuhayr bin Mu’aawiyah (Passed away 173 A.H.)
Imam Qaasim bin Ma’n (Passed away 175 A.H.)
Imam Hammad bin Abi Hanifah (Passed away 176 A.H.)
Imam Hayyaaj bin Bistaam (Passed away 177 A.H.)
Imam Shareek bin Abdullah (Passed away 178 A.H.)
Imam Aafiyah bin Yazeed (Passed away 180 A.H.)
Imam Abdullah ibn Mubarak (Passed away 181 A.H.)
Imam Abu Yusuf (Passed way 182 A.H.)
Imam Muhammad bin Nuh (Passed away 182 A.H.)
Imam Hushaym bin Basheer Sulami (Passed away 183 A.H.)
Imam Abu Sa’eed Yahya bin Zakariyyah (Passed away 184 A.H.)
Imam Fudhayl bin Iyaadh (Passed away 187 A.H.)
Imam Asad bin Amr (Passed away 188 A.H.)
Imam Muhammad bin Hasan as Shaybani (Passed away 189 A.H.)
Imam Ali bin Mis’ar (Passed away 189 A.H.)
Imam Yusuf bin Khalid (Passed away 189 A.H.)
Imam Abdullah bin Idrees (Passed away 192 A.H.)
Imam Fadhl bin Moosa (Passed away 192 A.H.)
Imam Ali bin Tibyaan (Passed away 192 A.H.)
Imam Hafs bin Ghiyaath (Passed away 194 A.H.)
Imam Wakee bin Jarrah (Passed away 197 A.H.)
Imam Hisham bin Yusuf (Passed away 197 A.H.)
Imam Yahya bin Sa’eed al Qattan (Passed away 198 A.H.)
Imam Shu’ayb bin Ishaq (Passed away 198 A.H.)
Imam Abu Mutee Balkhi (Passed away 199 A.H.)
Imam Abu Hafs bin Abdur Rahmaan (Passed away 199 A.H.)
Imam Khalid bin Sulayman (Passed away 199 A.H.)
Imam Abdul Hameed (Passed away 203 A.H.)
Imam Hasan bin Ziyaad (Passed away 204 A.H.)
Imam Abu Aasim Nabeel (Passed away 212 A.H.)
Imam Makki bin Ibraheem (Passed away 215 A.H.)
Imam Hammad bin Daleel (Passed away 215 A.H.)

The pillars of this committe were Imam Abu Yusuf, Imam Zufar, Imam Dawood Taa’ee, Imam Yusuf bin Khaalid, Imam Yahya bin Zakariyyah, Imam Muhammed, Imam Abdullah ibn Mubarak and Imam Abu Hanifah himself.

With regard to this committee, Imam Wakee ibn al-Jarrah, who was the teacher of Imam Idrees ash- Shafi’i said:

“How could there have remained any errors in this project of Imam Abu Hanifah when he had with him experts of Hadith, experts of Tafseer, experts of Fiqh, and experts in Arabic….A person who has such people as companions cannot be wrong because there would always be someone to correct him if he erred”

May Allah have mercy on them all.

Ameen]

Is it authentic ?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Yes it is mentioned in kitaab.

Taqleed-Mazhab

Sab*** asks:

Question

Aslm!!!

Eski si mo pa suive 4 imam mo pou ale dan lenfer?

apre aret dire vine zoune ou pou discute sa. Aret sovee kan pa kpv repond ta. coz vrai dire mo pa coner!!!

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Ou déjà conne nou et ou déjà conne nou l'adresse et nou pe appelle ou pou zoine, mais ou pas le vini. Alors ki sanla ki pe sové ? Nous ki pe sové ou bien dimoune ki dans parda la ki pe sové ?

Quand ou déjà conné ki nous pas conné be kifer ou dimandé. Ki motif ou capave ena appart faire méchanceté et perdi nou le temps?

Okay perna problème ou capave alle dimane kot banne ki conné.

Ghair Muqallid

ene madame fine marsturbe so missier.pa fine gne relation zis li fine fr sa marsturbe la. eski madame la so ghusl kaC?

1253

Question

Assalamualaikum..

If i have handed money 2 a wakil for zakaat or qurbani..

Has my act been completed!? If the wakil lost the money in the interim..shud i re give money 4 the zakaat or qurbani!? Or is it that once i handed him the money..my act is completed..th wakil is responsible 4 it!? Pleasa advise

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam In case he lost the money means that you lost it. You will have to do it again.

1254
Abd*** asks:

Question

Aslm..

Tou sa complainte ki finn ena la lor suposement le mufti Ashad..mai la osi mufti saab permet 1 dimune pareil pu vin fer program dan shawkat islam??

kpv mufti saab pe enkor atane 1 preuve solid..mai jamais li pou trouve la preuve parfaite sans ki li mem li fer 1 sight check!

Pou ml saad nu pe kozé et pu lot suposement le mufti mackoojee nu pe kozé..be sanla kin arrivé?

Mo comprend ki pas pou kapave bann li sans preuve mai ena doute lor li donc prefer nou reste a lecart! Koi saki mone comprend franchement ki fodré li vine ene problem personel lerla nou pou re agir..kuma pu mackujee mem ti ena 1 grand aalim ti fini prevenir mufti meerun de mackujee so vré couleur mai fodré lin avoye roche dan mufti saab so jardin lerla ki bezé in eclaté!

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Si ou ena sa qualité pensé la même bé arrête écrire nous. Parcequi nous trouvé ki nous pa vaut ki demanne nous question, sinon li pou ene palabe sans ene raison valabe.

Saki ti pou pli zoli ou ti capave sorti en dehors ou parda (voile) et vine zoine nous. Si ou envi ou capave faire sa renconte la divant ene groupe dimoune.

Normalement nous reponne dimoune pou dimoune la comprend. Mais nous pas pe trouve ou sa qualité dimoune la. Akoze sa ou traitement trouve dans vine zoine nous. Si vraiment ou envi comprend.

Miscellaneous
1255

Question

Assalamu alaikum

mo ena 2 questions

1. concernant Aqeedah:
ou ti capav done mwa 1 detail lor ki ban Aqeedah nu besoin ena concernant"Shafa'at" et ki-ki ban person pu gagne faveur pu intercede pu les autre
1 dimoune dir mwa dan quran ena ki "person pa pu capav intercedé devan Allah sans ki Allah oulé" et nu, nu dir ki ban hafiz, alim, prophetes, dimoune pieux etc. pu intercede pu ban ki pu ale dan l'enfer.

2. concernant Namaz:

eski ena kit hadith ki mentione leve l'index au moment "laa ilaaha" et baisse li au moment "Illallahu"?
sa dimoune la dir mwa ki hadith dir ki le prophete ti pe fer signe avec le doigt dans attahiyyaat.. pas dir ki kan arriv cote la ilaaha illallah.

ou ti capav eclairsi imP lor sa 2 question la pu mwa s'il vous plait.

jazakallah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

1. Dans hadice ena ki Nabi (sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) pou faire shafaa'at pou entier so Ummat. D'après hadice banne Ulama, banne Huffaaz et banne croyants aussi pou faire. et tous sa la pou arrivé par permission Allah ta'aala.

2. Dans hadice ena ki Nabi (sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) ti pe faire signe. Couma li ti pe faire signe, sa li pas claire. C'est banne fuqahaa (Juristes) ki fine déduire de par zotte ijtihaad (compréhension). Etant donné signe ti pe faire pou montré unicité d'Allah ta'aala, alors ena banne fuqahaa dire ki quand nous pe déjà dire " laa ilaaha " avec la bouche nous faire signe ki ena ene seule Allah et quand nous dire " illallaah) nous baissé.

Aqeedah
1256
Muh*** asks:

Question

As salaamualaikum
Ki duah ena pu lire avant et apres qurbani....
Jazaakallah

1257

Question

asslmkm.
how to improve eyesight for someone already wearing glasses?

1258

Question

aslm,
Is it permissible to get eyelash extentions?

Jazakallah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Not permissible, because it implies taghyeerul khlaq i.e to change the form that Allah ta'aala has created us, which is forbidden and qualified as satanic inspiration. In this case we should look for proof of permissibility and there is none according to us.

Female Issues

Mo question c'est :

Est ce qui Imaam Abu Hanifah ti ena ene council de 40 scholars ??

Jazaak Allah Khayr

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh

Oui

Taqleed-Mazhab
1260
120*** asks:

Question

assalamualaikum.
Ou fine dire bizin rey tire linteret. letemp mo ti tire dexieme fois linteret lavence 2 mile,premier linteret 2 mile lavence la ti deja fini rentre lor compte.bay combien mo bizin rey tiret 2 mile ou 4 mile.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Si ou fine deja fini tire 2 miles quand sa 2 miles la ti rente dans ou compte alors tire 2 miles encore. Comme principe pas tiret avant ou gagne l'interet dans ou compte.

1262

Question

Ki mark fish ball cpv manger?

Frozen Products
1263
zai***@yahoo.co.uk asks:

Question

Al Salaam Alaikum

Referring to the fast of Arafah, I want to have some clear answers. In Mauritius we are having the 9th Zul Hijjah on Friday while in Arabia it falls on Thursday which clearly depicts that Arafah is on Thursday and not Friday. So how come we are fasting on friday despite knowing that Arafah is on Thursday. Deliberately fasting on Eid day is forbidden. Sighting of the moon is important as we all know and we need to follow the laws of the native. However nowadays we don't have lack of communication as it was the case long ago where people were unaware of what was happening in other places.Please clarify.

Jazak Allah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam.

By saying day of Arafah, according to us it was not the intention of Nabi (sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) to fast on the day when the Haaji would be in Arafaat, as it was practically almost impossible in those days. The Sahabah did not understand it as such. Therefore the day of Arafah means the 9th of Zul-Hijjah and it will be decided according to the sighting of the moon in the concerned place. This explanation is in accordance with what Hazrat Aisha (Radhiyallaahu anha) explained to Hazrat Masrooq (Radhiyallaahu anhu).

Sounnah-Nafl
1265

Question

Assalamualaikum
Can l go Umrah with my brother or i should go with my parents!?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

A lady should be accompanied by her mahram while contracting a journey of 48 miles and above. It comprises the journey of Hajj, Umrah etc. Brother in included in mahram. So he can accompany you if he is of age, sound minded and a responsible person.

Umrah

Answer

N.B. Nous fine modifié ou question akoz so langage pas ti approprié. Toujours nous faire ene requête avec nous banne frère et sœur pour pose zotte question dans ene façon respectable. Jazaakumullahu khairaa.

Assaalaamualaikum

Mufti shb Muhammad Rafeeq Meerun et respectueux ulaama,

A propos certaine banne remarque et question vraiment deguelass et degoutant envers jamaatul ulama e haq de certain soi-disant daai dans le noble travail jamaat qui pe prend ene ampleur de bidah.

Comment nou pu encourage dimoune surtout qui ignorant avec banne basic de Dine pu sorti dans jammat avec ca banne quelques jaahil qui pe pose zot meme comme banne daa'i et connaisseur , Mufti shb?

Mo ena deux questions concernant nous grand Imaam, Imaam Abu Hanifah (rahimahullah):

1) Est ce qui li ene Taabei oubien li ene Tabei Tabein ?

2) Est ce qui li fine apprendre avec bans Swahaabah, cad est ce qui li ti zelev de bans Swahaabah ?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh

Oui li ene Tabi'ee parceki li fine trouve ene deux banne Sahabah (Radhiyallaahu anhum), mias li pas zotte z'eleve.

1279
dja***@yahoo.co.uk asks:

Question

Aslm.. regarding qurbani if a person passed away just before zul hija n he said to his children to make his qurbani n for his mother in his money. should we do it after his death in his 1/3 burial expenses. or his word fall away? may mufti saheb explain wat is the exception thing to do for a deceased in his money before giving to the heirs.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. If he left enough money for two qourbani, so his request should be executed to the extent of one third of his estate.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam.

We do not have any information regarding those ones over there. But the local ones also are not certified by us. As a principle we do not give any halal certificate without thorough verification. We did request them for inspection but they refused.

1290
Taz*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum.

Je suis une convertie et je me suis mariée avec un homme musulman déjà marié. Et je vis seule à Maurice parce que lui il vit avec sa première femme. De temps en temps il vient à Maurice pour venir me voir. Alors quand on se marié mes parents était très en colère ils n'étaient pas content parce qu'il était âgé et déjà marié alors que moi j'étais encr jeune mais je les ai pas écouté je me suis marié.jusqu'à maintenant ma famille n'aime pas sa mais ils ne disent rien. J'ai beaucoup fait souffrir ma famille et je les ai déçu.je vous expliquer tous sa pour que vous puissiez comprendre ou je veux en venir. Ma grande soeur vit à l'étranger et ma mère y est pour quelque temps et ma mère me dit de venir à l'étranger pour a peu près six mois pour les aider travailler etfaire des études tout sa. Elle veut que je fasse quelque chose de ma vie et non rester seule à Maurice à attend un homme qui vient me voir tous les mois ou 2 mois.et parfois je pense à ça si un jour mon mari meurt comment je vais faire comment je vais me nourrir ou vivre parce qu'il ne sera plus la pour m'aider.

Ma question est que dois je faire satisfaire les désirs de ma famille? De ne pas les decevoir encore une fois?

Ou toujours rester à maurice à attendre?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Votre situation, comme vous l'aviez décrite, comporte plusieurs facettes dont on ne peut traiter ici.

Nous vous proposons, trois options:

1. nous pouvons vous recommander à des Aalimaat pour résoudre les problèmes et vous conseiller, en collaboration avec les Ulama.

2. Contactez-nous par téléphone sur le numéro du JUM. (2400439 / 58622015)

3. Venez en personne mais accompagnée d'un proche au bureau du JUM pour pouvoir discuter du problème sous tous ses angles.

Nikah
1291
swa***@gmail.com asks:

Question

Plusieurs fois Qaariy Mansoor finn refute tabligh jamaat (par causerie oubien en ecrit) et finn même challenge zotte pour debat.Mais jamais zotte finn reponne li.

1.Eski li ena raison lor ceki li dire contre tabligh jamaat?

2.Eski zotte finn deja invite li pou ene rencontre? Merci.

Answer

Al-Jamiat aussi fine deja fini reponne ene quantité objection. Capave ou pas au courant. Sinon JUM pena l'habitude pou invite dimoune pou faire debat.

Quand kikene envi comprend ene kikchose, Nou la par l'ordre d'Allah pour eclairci li. Zordi jour public content mette debat pou guette tamasa. Li pas bon ditout.

Si ou pas comprend certaine kikchose, ou capave vine guette nou. Nou la pou explique ou.

1295
ezz***@gmail.com asks:

Question

Assalamualaikoum Mufti saab. Please advise on the following:
Dans le passe ti ena ene group connue comme "Dromme vide". Sa group la ti p fer tapaz ki bizin suivre zis Quraan et Hadith et ti p donne le public l'inpression ki suivre le 4 imam li haraam. Azordi le mem group fine vire mam. zot p vinne avek tou kalite reference de ban sheikh ki le public mem jamais fine tende zot nom. Chaque lane zot change change sheikh kuma pantalon chemise. vuet dir saki mon conprend ki, saki zot fine donne linpression dan le passe c'est ene pir mensonge de sa group "dromme vid" la so part.

Question 1:Eski les 4 imam zot lavi ti dapre Quraan et Hadith?
Question 2:Eski zot fiqh li base lor Quraan et Hadith?
Question 3:Eski ena kit Ayat Quraan ki autorise ene personne suivre ene lot personne dans deen kan li pas conne?
Question 4:Ene zelev normalment li place so confience dan so professeur college et li suivre li aveuglement akoz ki li ena M.A ou B.A et le but cest ene resulta cambridge dan dunya. Mais, moi mo fikar cest akhirat et mo p suivre ene parmi le 4 akoz so Taqwwa, Sagesse, et conaissance et inteligence profonde ki li ti ena et fine devlope. eski kan mo p place mo confience dans ene imam et mo suivre so explication mem aveuglement mo p contradie Quraan et Hadith?
Question 5: Eski ena kit Ayat Quraan ou mem ene Hadith faible ki fine empeche suivre ene Imam si ou satisfait avek so explication fiqh?

JazakAllah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Reponse 1: Les 4 Imaams ti banne personnage de tres haute calibre dans connaissance et pieté. Li bien grave pou pensé ki zotte la vie pas ti d'apres Quraan et Hadice.

Reponse 2: Definitivement oui. Pena doute la dans. C'est ene arrogant ou ene dernier imbecile ki capave pretanne le contraire.

Reponse 3: Li tellement claire ki li pas necessaire aukene refferrence. Le verset 7 Surah 21 capave servi pou prouve sa. Nous ena ene livre " Ijtihaad et Taqleed lor sa sujet la.

Reponse 4: Sans suivre kikene ni ou pour comprend Quraan ni Hadice ni deen. Banne ki dire pas bizin suive la meme ki suive banne ki pas bizin suive et sa aussi aveuglement. Par exemple zotte empeche suive banne imaam de mazhab mais zotte pas hesité suive banne sheikh. Eski zotte capave qualifié ene hadice de sahih ou faible sans suive kikene?

Reponse 5: Banne Sahabah ti pe suive banne Sahaabah ki ti pli conné. Sa montré ki li tout a fait normal et legal.

Taqleed-Mazhab
1296
Muz*** asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum, mo 1 jeunesse de Qartier militaire. kan mo al uriner, kan mo fini lavé tou, mo al faire wazou mo senti gout urine in desan dan mo sou vêtement... mais malgré mo rechange moi et mo re lav moi, mais la aussi pareille mem...& ou ti kav explique moi? mo pa fouti fr naniE, mo ggn traka tension mo wazou ek mo namaz pa conte

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. C'est ene probleme plitot psycologique. Quand ou fine lave ou apres avoir uriné ou trempoe ou la main et ou tappe tappe li dans ou sou vetement. Et apres sa pas prend compte quand meme ou senti kikchose pe dessanne.
Impurity

1299
arm***@hotmail.com asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum,

I would like to ask you a question:

Is it necessary that a Christian woman needs to Convert to Islam to have Nikah with a Muslim man?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. According to Quraan and Hadith it is not necessary to convert christian or Jew lady for the validity of nikaah. But since it has been proven to be very dangerous for one's Imaan and Deen the Ulama had to prohibit this kind of nikaah. You may refer to our article in french on this subject: http://www.jamiat-ul-ulama.org/node/2075
Nikah
1300
127*** asks:

Question

assalamualaikum. Mo pa pe comprend.esqui pour capave rembource mo frere so dete avec linteret la. sinon avec qui caliter persone capave donne linteret la. par fois ena persone malgrais li ena ene la paye fin du mois,mais au millier du mois li pena narrien.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. Nous pa pe comprend kifaire ou envie servi la monnaie l'interet meme pou aide ou frere. La monnaie l'interet li plis grave ki la viande pork sa. Aide li avek la monnaie halal et zakaat. Ou capave gagne plis details concernat l'interet lor sa link la: http://www.jamiat-ul-ulama.org/node/1881

1301
psa***@gmail.com asks:

Question

Assalamoualaykoum Warahmatullahi Wa Barakaatuh Mufti Saab..

Mufti saab, certains personnes mauriciens pe alle faire la marche en faveur de nous bans freres et soeurs dans Burma.. est ce qui sa action la li d'apres Sunnah sa ?

Dans place faire la marche etc qui mo penser d'apres moi, les 3 premiers generations pas ti lor sa.. li pas ti pour meilleur si sa bans personne la demande Du'a dans Swalaat en Jamaat ?

Ene eclaicissement lor sa Mufti saab et apres ene conseil à bans qui pe participe dans sa la marche la !

Baarak Allahu Feek.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam warahmatullahi wabarakaatuh

Pli grand kikchose c'est dimoune la même li reste lor Shariat et suive Sunnat de Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) après sa li faire doa.

Astere si nous trouvé parfois ki sa banne activités la li capave mette pression pou gagne saki nous pe rodé alors li tolérable, mais seulement bizin pas faire li mix. Pas faire li dans l'heure namaz. Sinon nou conné ki ene quantité ki pas faire namaz, pas observe la loi de Shariat et ki pas pe vive bien avec zotte frère, voisin et famille pe faire sa. Sa signifie ki pas pe tape la porte ki bizin tapé. La porte ki bizin tapé dans difficulté 'est la porte Allah.

Miscellaneous

Li pareil couma sajdah tilaawat dans tous so banne condition. Donc bizin faire li dans direction Qiblah avec tahaarat.

Aslm.... Is it permissible to pluck the hair between the eyebrows for men and women?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam If it is too long that it may cause harm to the eyes then it will be permissible.
Miscellaneous
1309
Sal*** asks:

Question

check mo video apre reply si ou kpv!!!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EO-nZ45G

Answer

Nous deja fini reponne sa. Nous pas capave pli claire ki sa.

Ou capave refere ou a sa lien la: http://jamiat-ul-ulama.org/node/1657

Sinon li paret ki ou pena ene la tete pou comprend et sa ti pou etonne nous si ou ti comprend. Li tout a fait normal si ou pas pe comprend.

Aster si ou envie comprend, nous disposé faire ou comprend. Be ranne ene service ou vine dans nous bureau pou comprend.

Ki Allah ta'aala donne nous fahm-e-saleem.

Bidati

1311
she***@hotmail.com asks:

Question

Couma le coeur musalmane capav vine ain seul et saitwaan pas vine parmi nous.

Eski li pas important nous consious pu redress nous saff droite et epaul avec epaul quand nous faire namaz?

Answer

Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) fine dire sa meme saki ou fine dire.

Banne Imaam aussi de temps en temps zotte faire l'appelle avec banne musalli avant namaaz dibouté.

Ena encore banne lezot facteur ki ammene envers la dissension. Sa aussi bizin prend compte.

Nous bizin faire travail d'apres nous capacité, mais resultat li pas dans nous la main.

Daily
1312
Nad*** asks:

Question

Assalam I wanted to know why many people consider the month Safar to be "mofine" and bad luck etc. Or they don't get engaged or marry in this month? I wanted to know the real meaning of this month. Thank you very much

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. To think like this regarding this month is superstition and it is prohibited in Islam. The origin of such thing was from the Arabs. Therefore, Nabi (sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) prohibited them from it. So this month has nothing to do with "mofine"
Miscellaneous
1313
Yas*** asks:

Question

Assalam mufti saab.

I wanted to know what is the principle according to Quran and Sunnah for a boy or a girl to observe when proposing someone to marry.

JazakAllah in advance.

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam. According to sunnah it is advisable to have a look to the person before proceeding with nikaah. If possible it is better to do it without anybody knowing it. otherwise one may get an idea about the girl by a reliable and appropriate person.
Nikah

Answer

D'apres principe ki nous adopté quand nous dire "Ash-hadou Al laa ilaaha" nous leve l'index et Quand nous dire "Illallaah" nous bessé.

1317
Moh*** asks:

Question

Mufti Saab Assalamualaikum.

Mufti eski masjid abadi vrement bane sahaba ti p fer?

cot ti p pren bne iman-dale ) ti p amen dan masjid pou donne dawat de iman. 1 dimoune ine mention sa ek moi. Ou c 1 virus ki p faner sa???

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Systeme amene dimoune dans masjid pou enseigne zotte deen li ene bon kikchose. Coumca meme ene dimoune li capave faire lecture nerporte ki livre ki corecte comme ta'leem.

Mais pou garde banne saathi sou controle, Ml Ilyaas (rahimahullah) fine fixé banne livre ki banne saathi bizin faire so lecture. Coumca meme li fine mette banne reglement et banne principe pou donne da'wat.

Sa systeme masjid abaadi la, li pas trouve dans systeme ki Ml Ilyaas (Rahimahullah) ti fixe et ki ti continié ziska Ml In'aamulk Hassan (Rahimahullah)

Dawah-Tabligh
1318
moj***@gmail.com asks:

Question

Eski li necessaire pou ene dimoune donne so madame 3 talaaq pou madame la kapave marier avek ene lot?

Answer

Pas necessaire. Ene seule talaaq li suffit pou libere ene madame. Madame-la capave re faire so l'avenir, li marier ene lot apres avoir observe Iddat de 3 haiz.
Talaaq
1319
Muz***@yahoo.com asks:

Question

mo ena 2 question.

1. ki aqeedah plis bon sunnat jamaat ou tabligh jamaat ? lakel ki pou gagn jannah )

2. eski li permet pou al kot 1 qabr waliullah pou passe par so intermediare et deman ek Allah? ou mem ek ban sahabah (ra). kav al devant zot tomb ek passe par zot intermediare pou diman mo rabb?

Answer

1. Sunnat Jamaat veut dire ene jamaat ki pe suive tareeqah ( model) de Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam). Tableegh jamaat ki suive model de Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) li forme parti dans sunnat jamaat. D'apres hadith sa jamaat ki suive model de Nabi (Sallallaahu alaihi wasallam) et banne Sahabah -e kiraam (Radhiyallaahu anhum) c'est li meme ki pou alle dans jannat.

2. Zordizour faudrait pas faire li parceki dimoune capave tombe dans shirk.

Other Sects
1320
Muj***@yahoo.com asks:

Question

Eski li permissible pou participe dan 1 mariaz kt 1 proche p marier avc 1 gars kadiani?

Answer

Non. Sa nikaah la li haraam. Li pas coné. Tous les temps zotte pou vive dans haraam. Nous pas gagne droit temoigne ene kitsoz ki haraam.
Other Sects
1321
she***@hotmail.com asks:

Question

Will we have sawaab for reading Quran on t.v?

Answer

Quraan Kareem should be recited in due respect and in an appropriate manner. Reading it on T.V is not an appropriate way. Because it is a device which is mainly used for illicit programs. Quraan kareem should be kept far away from this kind of device.
Quraan
1322
faw***@hotmail.com asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum, I have given my wife the first talaq. The following week, I gave her a second talaq. Now, my wife, who is still in her iddat,wants to return back to me. If I want to take her back, do I have to do nikkah again since I have already pronounced 2 talaqs?. Grateful if my question remains confidential and is answered promptly. Thanking you. JazakAllah

Answer

wa alaikumus salaam In case your wife wishes to return before her 3 menses are over after the first talaaq was issued then you can resume conjugal life without the needs to renew the nikaah.
Talaaq

1326
she***@hotmail.com asks:

Question

Aslm,

1:Is t.v haram to see. If no okay.

2. If yes, will someone have sawaab for reading quaran on t.v?

Jazakallah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

1. It is more harmful than useful. So it is forbiden. The Ulama and Qaris should keep away from using these kind of devices because it will lead people to justify watching T.V.

2. Quraan Kareem should be recited in due respect and in an appropriate manner. Reading it on T.V is not an appropriate way. Because it is a device which is mainly used for illicit programs. Quraan kareem should be kept far away from this kind of device.

Quraan

1330
cma***@gmail.com asks:

Question

Aslm mufti Saab,

Eski kan ou casse ene roza Ramadan intentionelment, ou bisin remplace 60 roza comme punition.

Merci

Jazak Allah

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Oui ena kaffaarah quand casse ene roza dans Ramadwan avec connaissance sans aukene raison valabe.

Kaffaarah la li couma lamane sa. Sa lamane la dans context actuel garde 60 roza consecutivement, si sa pas capave lerla donne 60 pauvre 2 repas mangé ou donne chaque ene la valeur ene fitrah.

Valeur fitrah pou sa l'année la (2017) li environs Rs 80.

Ramadhaan
1331
muz***@yahoo.com asks:

Question

1. Eski gagn droit tanD ou lire surah kan pena wazou ou ghusal ?

2. Eski gagn droit fer zikr lor ou lalangue si ou pena wazou ou ghusal ?

3. Li 1 pechE si pena wzou ou ghusal pou fr ibadat ? Si pena ghusal ou wazou si fr ibadah pa pou gagn recompense ??

Answer

1. San wazou gagne droit tendé et gagne droit lire aussi sans touché. Sans ghussal gagne droit tendé mais pas gagne droit lire ni youché.

2. Oui

3. Pou faire namaaz, pou faire tawaaf bizin ena wazou et ghussal. Li ene peché si faire li sans Tahaarat (propreté).
Capave lire Quraan sans wazou mais pas gagne droit touché et si perna ghussal pas pou gagne droit lire aussi.
Dua et Zikr capave faire sans wazou et sans ghussal.

Woudhou
1332
muz***@yahoo.com asks:

Question

Eski si craz fourmi si nu pan trV li 1 pechE?? Et si nun trV si nun craz zot par expre, li 1 pechE ??

Answer

Pas gagne droit touye fourmi ni aukene creature sans ene raison valabe. Si fine arrive li ene cout manqué be dimoune la pas en tord.

she***@hotmail.com asks:

Answer

1334
sam***@gmail.com asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum
what is our maslak regarding the following?

Q 4: Does rolling up the sleeves count as part of the tucking up that is not allowed during Salah?If it is part of that tucking up, does the ruling differ if I start praying with my sleeves rolled up, meaning, I do not roll them up during the Salah, or does it make no difference?

A: It is not permissible to roll up the sleeves or to fold them up before the Salah or during it to avoid that they will touch the ground when performing Sujud (prostration), because the Prophet (peace be upon him) said, I have been commanded to pray on seven bones and not to tuck up my hair or my clothes. [Narrated by Al-Bukhari and Muslim].

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

It is an undesirable manner to perform salaat with the elbows uncovered.

Daily
1335
Ibr*** asks:

Question

Aslmkum

I want you to debate this. It’s really controversial. Please back it up with either Hadith or Qur’an.

Here we goA Muslim sister in a certain Islamic community got pregnant, the Islamic leaders decided to discipline her since she was not married. When the elders of the Community met her, she told them that she has stayed in the religion for years and no one is marrying her and she is getting to the age were she can't get pregnant if married. So she went and did artificial insemination since she wants a child. She provided the medical documents that showed that she has done the artificial insemination. The Sister is pregnant without committing fornication nor adultery. Not so? BUT,COULD THIS BE A SIN? If YES or NO.

Give your reasons for your answer. If possible Back it with Scripture, so dat we can learn. Also send to your Muslim contacts and groups and see their position on the matter. A serious matter here....What's your position?

Answer

Wa alaikumus salaam

Artificial insemination is prohibited in Islam because it necessitates the exhibition of the private part without necessity. Shariat does not consider having child as a necessity. (You may refer to verse 50 of Surah 42)

More over it necessitates bringing alteration in the methods set up by Allah ta'aala for pregnancy ( you may refer to verse 119 of Surah 4 about alteration in the creation of Allah)

It also implies the problem of parenthood of the child as it will be without nikaah.

Female Issues
1336
dem***@hotmail.com asks:

Question

Assalamualaikum I got a problem wirh my wife and she provoked me to say 3 talaq and said 3 talaat in one go but in an insane anger without releasing what I was saying, but I did some research in Fiqr Book and with some imaam and mufti.. at the end I did not get any verdict either my nikkah is still valid or not, soem says 3 in one go is 1 ansld some says 3 is 3 and also some told me if I was that insane angry without realising what I said, talaq does not count at all, thats why im still confuse and do not know what to do" and I did some more reseaech and found this.... " If you uttered the words of divorce at a moment of intense anger and without realizing it, and you could not control yourself, because of her bad words and insults etc., and you did that at a moment of intense anger and without realizing it, and she acknowledges that, or you have a witness of good character, then divorce has not taken place, because the shar’i evidence indicates that divorce does not take place if the words are spoken at a moment of intense anger – and if it is accompanied by not realizing what is happening then the ruling applies even more so. " Anger may be of three types: 1 – When a person is angry and is no longer aware of what he is doing. This is likened to the insane, so divorce does not take place according to all scholars. 2 – Where a person is very angry but is still aware of what is going on, but his anger is so intense that it makes him say the words of divorce. In this case too, divorce does not take place according to the correct scholarly opinion. 3 – The ordinary type of anger which is not very intense. In this case, divorce takes place, according to all the scholars. From Fataawa al-Talaaq, pp. 19-21, compiled by Dr. ‘Abd-Allaah al-Tayyaar and Muhammad al-Moosa. the type of anger i was in was the 1st type. I even asked the imaam who did my nikkah, he told me to get in contact with his mufti, I called him and explained everything to him and he said he can not say anything about it, only me know the truth of how anger I was . and also said if I want him to give a fatwa and verdict..I need.to consult a psycologue to get a report either my anger was intence or not. and the problem is that, the incident happened last year, and aster realisin what happened, we looked and saw that 3 talaq in one go count one in a hadith..so we thought we are still married..but recently 4-5 months ago, her parents got to know about the incident and interfered..that is when we went looking for different mufti and imaam.. and end up with the mufti who told me to look for a PSY but consulting a psycologue wont help much because how I was last year and today..is different, but still I booked an appointment with a psycologue on next thursday. I went to MFC today and explained them, then they referred me here. I am just really confused and really afraid that my nikkah is invalid, but Allah know the best and I hope to get an answer from you soon In Cha Allah assalamualaikum

Answer

Talaaq uttered in a state of anger is effective. 3 Talaaq given in one go is considered as 3. Talaaq of an insane is null and void. Choose yourself which of these 3 cases apply to you.
Talaaq
1337
